00492 
00493 
00494 // NB hack:  if an item appears in this array with an item class of IC_MISC,
00495 // it is a slot used for noting the skill check required for a merge or multi-item attachment
00496

00498 //{

01096 //    {RDX,                                     C1,                                                         C4,                                                               EXPLOSIVE},

01098 //    {C1,                                      RDX,                                                  C4,                                                               EXPLOSIVE},
01099 //
01100 //    {STRING,                            TIN_CAN,                                        STRING_TIED_TO_TIN_CAN, EASY_MERGE},
01101 //    {TIN_CAN,                           STRING,                                               STRING_TIED_TO_TIN_CAN, EASY_MERGE},
01102 //
01103 //    {FLASH_DEVICE,          DISPLAY_UNIT,                             XRAY_DEVICE,                                    ELECTRONIC_MERGE},
01104 //    {DISPLAY_UNIT,          FLASH_DEVICE,                             XRAY_DEVICE,                                    ELECTRONIC_MERGE},
01105 //
01106 //    {0, 0, 0, 0}
01107 //};
01108 
01109 
01110 ComboMergeInfoStruct AttachmentComboMerge[MAXITEMS+1];// =
01111 //{
01112 //    // base item                                          attach 1                                              attach 2                                   result                                                           
01113 //    {ALUMINUM_ROD,                                  {SPRING,                                              NOTHING},                                 SPRING_AND_BOLT_UPGRADE },
01114 //    {STEEL_ROD,                                           {QUICK_GLUE,                                    DUCT_TAPE},                         GUN_BARREL_EXTENDER },
01115 //    {FUMBLE_PAK,                                          {XRAY_BULB,                                     CHEWING_GUM},                       FLASH_DEVICE },   
01116 //    {LAME_BOY,                                            {COPPER_WIRE,                                   NOTHING},                                 DISPLAY_UNIT },
01117 //    {GOLDWATCH,                               {COPPER_WIRE,                                               NOTHING},                                 DETONATOR},
01118 //    {NOTHING,                                                   {NOTHING,                                             NOTHING},                                 NOTHING },
01119 //};
01120 
01121 
01122 UINT16 IncompatibleAttachments[MAXATTACHMENTS][2];// =
01123 //{
01124 //    {BIPOD,UNDER_GLAUNCHER},
01125 //    {UNDER_GLAUNCHER,BIPOD},
01126 //    {DETONATOR,REMDETONATOR},
01127 //    {REMDETONATOR,DETONATOR},
01128 //    {SNIPERSCOPE,REFLEX_SCOPED},
01129 //    {REFLEX_SCOPED,SNIPERSCOPE},
01130 //    {REFLEX_SCOPED,REFLEX_UNSCOPED},
01131 //    {REFLEX_UNSCOPED,REFLEX_SCOPED},
01132 //    {SILENCER,FLASH_SUPPRESSOR},
01133 //    {FLASH_SUPPRESSOR,SILENCER},
01134 //    {LASERSCOPE,REFLEX_UNSCOPED},
01135 //    {REFLEX_UNSCOPED,LASERSCOPE},
01136 //};
01137 
01138 UINT16 ReplacementGuns[][2] =
01139 {
01140       { BARRACUDA,            DESERTEAGLE },
01141       { M1911,                      GLOCK_17          },
01142       { GLOCK_18,             BERETTA_93R },
01143       { BERETTA_92F,    GLOCK_17          },
01144       { TYPE85,                     BERETTA_93R },
01145       {     THOMPSON,               MP5K                    },
01146       {     MP53,                         MP5K                    },
01147       { SPAS15,                     M870                    },
01148       { AKSU74,                     MAC10                   },
01149       { SKS,                              MINI14                  },
01150       {     AKM,                          G41                           },
01151       { G3A3,                             G41                           },
01152       { AK74,                             G41                           },
01153       {     DRAGUNOV,               M24                           },
01154       { FAMAS,                      M14                           },
01155       { AUG,                              C7                            },
01156       { RPK74,                      MINIMI                  },
01157       { HK21E,                      MINIMI                  },
01158       { 0,                                0                                   }
01159 };
01160 
01161 UINT16 ReplacementAmmo[][2] =
01162 {
01163       { CLIP545_30_AP,        CLIP556_30_AP  },
01164       { CLIP545_30_HP,        CLIP556_30_HP  },
01165       { CLIP762W_10_AP,       CLIP762N_5_AP  },
01166       { CLIP762W_30_AP,       CLIP762N_20_AP },
01167       { CLIP762W_10_HP,       CLIP762N_5_HP  },
01168       { CLIP762W_30_HP,       CLIP762N_20_HP },
01169       { 0,                                            0                                          }
01170 };
01171 
01172 BOOLEAN ItemIsLegal( UINT16 usItemIndex )
01173 {
01174       //if the user has selected the reduced gun list
01175       if ( Item[usItemIndex].ubCoolness == 0 )
01176             return FALSE;
01177 
01178       if( !gGameOptions.fGunNut )
01179       {
01180             //if the item is a gun, or ammo
01181             //if( (Item[ usItemIndex ].usItemClass == IC_GUN) || (Item[ usItemIndex ].usItemClass == IC_AMMO )) //Madd: restriction removed
01182             {
01183                   // and the item is only available with the extended guns
01184                   if( Item[usItemIndex].biggunlist )
01185                   {
01186                         return(FALSE);
01187                   }
01188             }
01189       }
01190 
01191       if ( gGameOptions.ubGameStyle != STYLE_SCIFI && Item[usItemIndex].scifi )
01192       {
01193             return FALSE;
01194       }
01195 
01196 
01197       return(TRUE);
01198 } 
01199 
01200 // also used for ammo
01201 BOOLEAN ExtendedGunListGun( UINT16 usGun )
01202 {
01203 //    return( (Item[ usGun ].fFlags & ITEM_BIGGUNLIST) != 0 );
01204       return( (Item[ usGun ].biggunlist ) != 0 );
01205 } 
01206 
01207 UINT16 StandardGunListReplacement( UINT16 usGun )
01208 {
01209       UINT8 ubLoop;
01210 
01211       if ( ExtendedGunListGun( usGun ) )
01212       {
01213             ubLoop = 0;
01214             while ( ReplacementGuns[ ubLoop ][ 0 ] != 0 )
01215             {
01216                   if ( ReplacementGuns[ ubLoop ][ 0 ] == usGun )
01217                   {
01218                         return( ReplacementGuns[ ubLoop ][ 1 ] );
01219                   }
01220                   ubLoop++;
01221             }
01222             // ERROR!
01223             AssertMsg( 0, String( "Extended gun with no replacement %d, CC:0", usGun ) );
01224             return( NOTHING );
01225       }
01226       else
01227       {
01228             return( NOTHING );
01229       }
01230 }
01231 
01232 UINT16 StandardGunListAmmoReplacement( UINT16 usAmmo )
01233 {
01234       UINT8 ubLoop;
01235 
01236       if ( ExtendedGunListGun( usAmmo ) )
01237       {
01238             ubLoop = 0;
01239             while ( ReplacementAmmo[ ubLoop ][ 0 ] != 0 )
01240             {
01241                   if ( ReplacementAmmo[ ubLoop ][ 0 ] == usAmmo )
01242                   {
01243                         return( ReplacementAmmo[ ubLoop ][ 1 ] );
01244                   }
01245                   ubLoop++;
01246             }
01247             // ERROR!
01248             AssertMsg( 0, String( "Extended gun with no replacement %d, CC:0", usAmmo ) );
01249             return( NOTHING );
01250       }
01251       else
01252       {
01253             return( NOTHING );
01254       }
01255 }
01256 
01257 BOOLEAN WeaponInHand( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
01258 {
01259       if ( Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].usItemClass & (IC_WEAPON | IC_THROWN) )
01260       {
01261             if (Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].fingerprintid )
01262             {
01263                   if (pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].ubImprintID != NO_PROFILE)
01264                   {
01265                         if (pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && pSoldier->ubProfile != MADLAB )
01266                         {
01267                               if (pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].ubImprintID != pSoldier->ubProfile)
01268                               {
01269                                     return( FALSE );
01270                               }
01271                         }
01272                         else
01273                         {
01274                               if (pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].ubImprintID != (NO_PROFILE + 1) )
01275                               {
01276                                     return( FALSE );
01277                               }
01278                         }
01279                   }
01280             }
01281             if (pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].bGunStatus >= USABLE)
01282             {
01283                   return( TRUE );
01284             }
01285       }
01286       // return -1 or some "broken" value if weapon is broken?
01287       return( FALSE );
01288 }
01289 
01290 UINT8 ItemSlotLimit( UINT16 usItem, INT8 bSlot )
01291 {
01292       UINT8 ubSlotLimit;
01293 
01294       if ( bSlot < BIGPOCK1POS )
01295       {
01296             return( 1 );
01297       }
01298       else
01299       {
01300             ubSlotLimit = Item[usItem].ubPerPocket;
01301             if (bSlot >= SMALLPOCK1POS && ubSlotLimit > 1)
01302             {
01303                   ubSlotLimit /= 2;
01304             }
01305             return( ubSlotLimit );
01306       }
01307 }
01308 
01309 UINT32 MoneySlotLimit( INT8 bSlot )
01310 {
01311       if ( bSlot >= SMALLPOCK1POS )
01312       {
01313             return( MAX_MONEY_PER_SLOT / 2 );
01314       }
01315       else
01316       {
01317             return( MAX_MONEY_PER_SLOT );
01318       }
01319 }
01320 
01321 
01322 INT8 FindObj( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT16 usItem )
01323 {
01324       INT8 bLoop;
01325 
01326       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_INV_SLOTS; bLoop++)
01327       {
01328             if (pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem == usItem)
01329             {
01330                   return( bLoop );
01331             }
01332       }
01333       return( NO_SLOT );
01334 }
01335 
01336 INT8 FindMetalDetector( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
01337 {
01338       INT8 bLoop;
01339 
01340       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_INV_SLOTS; bLoop++)
01341       {
01342             if (Item[pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem].metaldetector )
01343             {
01344                   return( bLoop );
01345             }
01346       }
01347       return( NO_SLOT );
01348 }
01349 
01350 INT8 FindLockBomb( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
01351 {
01352       INT8 bLoop;
01353 
01354       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_INV_SLOTS; bLoop++)
01355       {
01356             if (Item[pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem].lockbomb )
01357             {
01358                   return( bLoop );
01359             }
01360       }
01361       return( NO_SLOT );
01362 }
01363 
01364 INT8 FindUsableObj( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT16 usItem )
01365 {
01366       INT8 bLoop;
01367 
01368       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_INV_SLOTS; bLoop++)
01369       {
01370             if ( pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem == usItem && pSoldier->inv[bLoop].bStatus[0] >= USABLE )
01371             {
01372                   return( bLoop );
01373             }
01374       }
01375       return( NO_SLOT );
01376 }
01377 
01378 
01379 INT8 FindObjExcludingSlot( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT16 usItem, INT8 bExcludeSlot )
01380 {
01381       INT8 bLoop;
01382 
01383       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_INV_SLOTS; bLoop++)
01384       {
01385             if (bLoop == bExcludeSlot)
01386             {
01387                   continue;
01388             }
01389             if (pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem == usItem)
01390             {
01391                   return( bLoop );
01392             }
01393       }
01394       return( NO_SLOT );
01395 }
01396 
01397 INT8 FindExactObj( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
01398 {
01399       INT8 bLoop;
01400 
01401       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_INV_SLOTS; bLoop++)
01402       {
01403             if ( (pObj == &(pSoldier->inv[bLoop])) && (memcmp( &(pSoldier->inv[bLoop]), pObj, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) ) == 0) )
01404             {
01405                   return( bLoop );
01406             }
01407       }
01408       return( NO_SLOT );
01409 }
01410 
01411 
01412 INT8 FindObjWithin( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT16 usItem, INT8 bLower, INT8 bUpper )
01413 {
01414       INT8  bLoop;
01415 
01416       for (bLoop = bLower; bLoop <= bUpper; bLoop++)
01417       {
01418             if (pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem == usItem)                  
01419             {
01420                   return( bLoop );
01421             }
01422       }
01423       return( ITEM_NOT_FOUND );
01424 }
01425 
01426 INT8 FindObjInObjRange( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT16 usItem1, UINT16 usItem2 )
01427 {
01428       INT8        bLoop;
01429       UINT16      usTemp;
01430 
01431       if (usItem1 > usItem2 )
01432       {
01433             // swap the two...
01434             usTemp = usItem2;
01435             usItem2 = usItem1;
01436             usItem1 = usTemp;
01437       }
01438 
01439       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_INV_SLOTS; bLoop++)
01440       {
01441             usTemp = pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem;
01442             if ( usTemp >= usItem1 && usTemp <= usItem2 )
01443             {
01444                   return( bLoop );
01445             }
01446       }
01447 
01448       return( ITEM_NOT_FOUND );
01449 }
01450 
01451 
01452 INT8 FindObjClass( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier,      UINT32 usItemClass )
01453 {
01454       INT8 bLoop;
01455 
01456       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_INV_SLOTS; bLoop++)
01457       {
01458             if (Item[pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem].usItemClass & usItemClass)
01459             {
01460                   return( bLoop );
01461             }
01462       }
01463       return( NO_SLOT );
01464 }
01465 
01466 INT8 FindObjClassAfterSlot( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT8 bStartAfter, UINT32 usItemClass )
01467 {
01468       INT8 bLoop;
01469 
01470       for (bLoop = bStartAfter + 1; bLoop < NUM_INV_SLOTS; bLoop++)
01471       {
01472             if (Item[pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem].usItemClass == usItemClass)
01473             {
01474                   return( bLoop );
01475             }
01476       }
01477       return( NO_SLOT );
01478 }
01479 
01480 INT8 FindAIUsableObjClass( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier,    UINT32 usItemClass )
01481 {
01482       // finds the first object of the specified class which does NOT have
01483       // the "unusable by AI" flag set.
01484 
01485       // uses & rather than == so that this function can search for any weapon
01486       INT8 bLoop;
01487 
01488       // This is for the AI only so:
01489 
01490       // Do not consider tank cannons or rocket launchers to be "guns"
01491 
01492       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_INV_SLOTS; bLoop++)
01493       {
01494             if ( (Item[pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem].usItemClass & usItemClass) && !(pSoldier->inv[bLoop].fFlags & OBJECT_AI_UNUSABLE) && (pSoldier->inv[bLoop].bStatus[0] >= USABLE ) )
01495             {
01496                   if ( usItemClass == IC_GUN && EXPLOSIVE_GUN( pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem ) )
01497                   {
01498                         continue;
01499                   }
01500                   return( bLoop );
01501             }
01502       }
01503       return( NO_SLOT );
01504 }
01505 
01506 INT8 FindAIUsableObjClassWithin( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier,    UINT32 usItemClass, INT8 bLower, INT8 bUpper )
01507 {
01508       INT8 bLoop;
01509 
01510       // This is for the AI only so:
01511       // Do not consider tank cannons or rocket launchers to be "guns"
01512 
01513       for (bLoop = bLower; bLoop <= bUpper; bLoop++)
01514       {
01515             if ( (Item[pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem].usItemClass & usItemClass) && !(pSoldier->inv[bLoop].fFlags & OBJECT_AI_UNUSABLE) && (pSoldier->inv[bLoop].bStatus[0] >= USABLE ) )
01516             {
01517                   if ( usItemClass == IC_GUN && EXPLOSIVE_GUN( pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem ) )
01518                   {
01519                         continue;
01520                   }
01521                   return( bLoop );
01522             }
01523       }
01524       return( NO_SLOT );
01525 }
01526 
01527 INT8 FindEmptySlotWithin( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT8 bLower, INT8 bUpper )
01528 {
01529       INT8  bLoop;
01530 
01531       for (bLoop = bLower; bLoop <= bUpper; bLoop++)
01532       {
01533             if (pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem == 0)
01534             {
01535 //                if (bLoop == SECONDHANDPOS && Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].fFlags & ITEM_TWO_HANDED)
01536                   if (bLoop == SECONDHANDPOS && Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].twohanded )
01537                   {
01538                         continue;
01539                   }
01540                   else
01541                   {
01542                         return( bLoop );
01543                   }
01544             }
01545       }
01546       return( ITEM_NOT_FOUND );
01547 }
01548 
01549 BOOLEAN GLGrenadeInSlot(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bSlot )
01550 {
01551       if (Item[pSoldier->inv[bSlot].usItem].glgrenade)
01552             return TRUE;
01553       else
01554             return FALSE;
01555       //switch (pSoldier->inv[bSlot].usItem)
01556       //{
01557       //    case GL_HE_GRENADE:
01558       //    case GL_TEARGAS_GRENADE:
01559       //    case GL_STUN_GRENADE:
01560       //    case GL_SMOKE_GRENADE:
01561       //          return(TRUE);
01562       //    default:
01563       //          return(FALSE);
01564       //}
01565 }
01566 
01567 // for grenade launchers
01568 INT8 FindGLGrenade( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
01569 {
01570       INT8 bLoop;
01571 
01572       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_INV_SLOTS; bLoop++)
01573       {
01574             if (GLGrenadeInSlot( pSoldier, bLoop ))
01575             {
01576                   return( bLoop );
01577             }
01578       }
01579       return( NO_SLOT );
01580 }
01581 
01582 INT8 FindThrowableGrenade( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
01583 {
01584       INT8 bLoop;
01585       BOOLEAN fCheckForFlares = FALSE;
01586 
01587       // JA2Gold: give some priority to looking for flares when at night
01588       // this is AI only so we can put in some customization for night
01589       if (GetTimeOfDayAmbientLightLevel() == NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_NIGHT)
01590       {
01591             if (pSoldier->bLife > (pSoldier->bLifeMax / 2))
01592             {
01593                   fCheckForFlares = TRUE;
01594             }
01595       }
01596       if (fCheckForFlares)
01597       {
01598             // Do a priority check for flares first
01599             for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_INV_SLOTS; bLoop++)
01600             {
01601                   if ( Item[pSoldier->inv[ bLoop ].usItem].flare )
01602                   {
01603                         return( bLoop );
01604                   }
01605             }
01606       }
01607       
01608       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_INV_SLOTS; bLoop++)
01609       {
01610             if ( (Item[ pSoldier->inv[ bLoop ].usItem ].usItemClass & IC_GRENADE) && !GLGrenadeInSlot( pSoldier, bLoop ) )
01611             {
01612                   return( bLoop );
01613             }
01614       }
01615       return( NO_SLOT );
01616 }
01617 
01618 INT8 FindAttachment( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, UINT16 usItem )
01619 {
01620       INT8  bLoop;
01621 
01622       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
01623       {
01624             if (pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop] == usItem)
01625             {
01626                   return( bLoop );
01627             }
01628       }
01629       return( ITEM_NOT_FOUND );
01630 }
01631 
01632 INT8 FindAttachmentByClass( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, UINT32 uiItemClass )
01633 {
01634       INT8  bLoop;
01635 
01636       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
01637       {
01638             if (Item[ pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop] ].usItemClass == uiItemClass)
01639             {
01640                   return( bLoop );
01641             }
01642       }
01643       return( ITEM_NOT_FOUND );
01644 }
01645 
01646 INT8 FindLaunchable( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT16 usWeapon )
01647 {
01648       INT8  bLoop;
01649       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("FindLaunchable: weapon=%d",usWeapon));
01650       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_INV_SLOTS; bLoop++)
01651       {
01652             if ( ValidLaunchable( pSoldier->inv[ bLoop ].usItem , usWeapon ) )
01653             {
01654                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("FindLaunchable: returning slot %d",bLoop));
01655                   return( bLoop );
01656             }
01657       }
01658 
01659       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("FindLaunchable: item not found"));
01660       return( ITEM_NOT_FOUND );
01661 }
01662 
01663 INT8 FindNonSmokeLaunchable( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT16 usWeapon )
01664 {
01665       INT8  bLoop;
01666       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("FindNonSmokeLaunchable: weapon=%d",usWeapon));
01667       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_INV_SLOTS; bLoop++)
01668       {
01669             if ( ValidLaunchable( pSoldier->inv[ bLoop ].usItem , usWeapon ) && Explosive[Item[pSoldier->inv[ bLoop ].usItem].ubClassIndex].ubType != EXPLOSV_SMOKE )
01670             {
01671                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("FindNonSmokeLaunchable: returning slot %d",bLoop));
01672                   return( bLoop );
01673             }
01674       }
01675 
01676       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("FindNonSmokeLaunchable: item not found, so find items including smoke"));
01677       return( FindLaunchable(pSoldier,usWeapon) );
01678 }
01679 
01680 INT8 FindLaunchableAttachment( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, UINT16 usWeapon )
01681 {
01682       INT8        bLoop;
01683 
01684       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("FindLaunchableAttachment: weapon=%d",usWeapon));
01685       for ( bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++ )
01686       {
01687             if ( pObj->usAttachItem[ bLoop ] != NOTHING && ValidLaunchable( pObj->usAttachItem[ bLoop ], usWeapon ) )
01688             {
01689                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("FindLaunchableAttachment: returning slot %d",bLoop));
01690                   return( bLoop );
01691             }
01692       }
01693 
01694       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("FindLaunchableAttachment: item not found"));
01695       return( ITEM_NOT_FOUND );
01696 }
01697 
01698 INT8 FindNonSmokeLaunchableAttachment( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, UINT16 usWeapon )
01699 {
01700       INT8        bLoop;
01701 
01702       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("FindNonSmokeLaunchableAttachment: weapon=%d",usWeapon));
01703       for ( bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++ )
01704       {
01705             if ( pObj->usAttachItem[ bLoop ] != NOTHING && ValidLaunchable( pObj->usAttachItem[ bLoop ], usWeapon ) && Explosive[Item[pObj->usAttachItem[ bLoop ]].ubClassIndex].ubType != EXPLOSV_SMOKE )
01706             {
01707                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("FindNonSmokeLaunchableAttachment: returning slot %d",bLoop));
01708                   return( bLoop );
01709             }
01710       }
01711 
01712       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("FindNonSmokeLaunchableAttachment: item not found"));
01713       return( FindLaunchableAttachment(pObj,usWeapon) );
01714 }
01715 
01716 
01717 //Simple check to see if the item has any attachments
01718 BOOLEAN ItemHasAttachments( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
01719 {
01720       if ((pObj->usAttachItem[0] == NOTHING) && (pObj->usAttachItem[1] == NOTHING) && (pObj->usAttachItem[2] == NOTHING) && (pObj->usAttachItem[3] == NOTHING))
01721       {
01722             return( FALSE );
01723       }
01724       return( TRUE );
01725 }
01726 
01727 // Determine if it is possible to add this attachment to the CLASS of this item
01728 // (i.e. to any item in the class)
01729 BOOLEAN ValidAttachmentClass( UINT16 usAttachment, UINT16 usItem )
01730 {
01731       INT32 iLoop = 0;
01732       while( 1 )
01733       {
01734             // see comment for AttachmentInfo array for why we skip IC_NONE
01735             if ( AttachmentInfo[ iLoop ].uiItemClass != IC_NONE )
01736             {
01737                   if ( AttachmentInfo[ iLoop ].usItem == usAttachment )
01738                   {
01739                         if ( AttachmentInfo[ iLoop ].uiItemClass == Item[ usItem ].usItemClass )
01740                         {
01741                               return( TRUE );
01742                         }
01743                   }
01744             }
01745             iLoop++;
01746             if (AttachmentInfo[iLoop].usItem == 0)
01747             {
01748                   // end of the array
01749                   break;
01750             }
01751       }
01752       return( FALSE );  
01753 }
01754 
01755 INT8 GetAttachmentInfoIndex( UINT16 usItem )
01756 {
01757       INT32 iLoop = 0;
01758 
01759       while( 1 )
01760       {
01761             if ( AttachmentInfo[ iLoop ].usItem == usItem )
01762             {
01763                   return( (INT8) iLoop );
01764             }
01765             iLoop++;
01766             if (AttachmentInfo[iLoop].usItem == 0)
01767             {
01768                   // end of the array
01769                   break;
01770             }
01771       }
01772       return( -1 );
01773 }
01774 
01775 //Determine if it is possible to add this attachment to the item.
01776 BOOLEAN internalValidAttachment( UINT16 usAttachment, UINT16 usItem, UINT8 * pubAPCost )
01777 {
01778       INT32 iLoop = 0;
01779       *pubAPCost = (UINT8)AP_RELOAD_GUN; //default value
01780 
01781       // look for the section of the array pertaining to this attachment...
01782       while( 1 )
01783       {
01784             if (Attachment[iLoop][0] == usAttachment)
01785             {
01786                   break;
01787             }
01788             iLoop++;
01789             if (Attachment[iLoop][0] == 0)
01790             {
01791                   // the proposed item cannot be attached to anything!
01792                   return( FALSE );
01793             }
01794       }
01795       // now look through this section for the item in question
01796       while( 1 )
01797       {
01798             if (Attachment[iLoop][1] == usItem)
01799             {
01800                   *pubAPCost = (UINT8)Attachment[iLoop][2]; //Madd: get ap cost of attaching items :)
01801                   break;
01802             }
01803             iLoop++;
01804             if (Attachment[iLoop][0] != usAttachment)
01805             {
01806                   // the proposed item cannot be attached to the item in question
01807                   return( FALSE );
01808             }
01809       }
01810       return( TRUE );
01811 }
01812 
01813 //Determine if it is possible to add this attachment to the item.
01814 BOOLEAN ValidAttachment( UINT16 usAttachment, UINT16 usItem )
01815 {
01816       UINT8 ubAPCost;
01817 
01818       return internalValidAttachment( usAttachment, usItem, &ubAPCost);
01819 }
01820 UINT8 AttachmentAPCost( UINT16 usAttachment, UINT16 usItem )
01821 {
01822       UINT8 ubAPCost;
01823 
01824       internalValidAttachment( usAttachment, usItem, &ubAPCost);
01825 
01826       return ubAPCost;
01827 }
01828 
01829 //Determine if this item can receive this attachment.  This is different, in that it may
01830 //be possible to have this attachment on this item, but may already have an attachment on
01831 //it which doesn't work simultaneously with the new attachment (like a silencer and duckbill).
01832 BOOLEAN ValidItemAttachment( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, UINT16 usAttachment, BOOLEAN fAttemptingAttachment )
01833 {
01834       return ValidItemAttachment ( pObj, usAttachment, fAttemptingAttachment, TRUE );
01835 }
01836 BOOLEAN ValidItemAttachment( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, UINT16 usAttachment, BOOLEAN fAttemptingAttachment, BOOLEAN fDisplayMessage )
01837 {
01838       BOOLEAN           fSameItem = FALSE, fSimilarItems = FALSE;
01839       UINT16            usSimilarItem = NOTHING;
01840 
01841       if ( !ValidAttachment( usAttachment, pObj->usItem ) )
01842       {
01843             // check for an underslung grenade launcher attached to the gun
01844             if ( (IsGrenadeLauncherAttached ( pObj ) ) && ValidLaunchable( usAttachment, GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher( pObj ) ) )
01845             {
01846                   return ( TRUE );
01847                   /*
01848                   if ( fAttemptingAttachment )
01849                   {
01850                         // if there is no other grenade attached already, then we can attach it
01851                         if (FindAttachmentByClass( pObj, IC_GRENADE) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND)
01852                         {
01853                               return( FALSE );
01854                         }
01855                         // keep going, it can be attached to the grenade launcher
01856                   }
01857                   else
01858                   {
01859                         // logically, can be added
01860                         return( TRUE );
01861                   }
01862                   */
01863             }
01864             else
01865             {
01866                   if ( fAttemptingAttachment && ValidAttachmentClass( usAttachment, pObj->usItem ) )
01867                   {
01868                         // well, maybe the player thought he could
01869                         UINT16      zTemp[ 100 ];
01870                         
01871                         swprintf( zTemp, Message[ STR_CANT_ATTACH ], ItemNames[ usAttachment ], ItemNames[ pObj->usItem ] );
01872                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, zTemp );
01873                   }
01874 
01875                   return( FALSE );
01876             }
01877       }
01878       // special conditions go here
01879       // can't have two of the same attachment on an item
01880       /*
01881       if (FindAttachment( pObj, usAttachment ) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND)
01882       {
01883             fSameItem = TRUE;
01884       }
01885       */
01886 
01887       for(int i = 0;i<sizeof(IncompatibleAttachments);i++)
01888       {
01889             if ( IncompatibleAttachments[i][0] == NONE )
01890                   break;
01891       
01892             if ( IncompatibleAttachments[i][0] == usAttachment && FindAttachment (pObj,IncompatibleAttachments[i][1]) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
01893             {
01894                   fSimilarItems = TRUE;
01895                   usSimilarItem = IncompatibleAttachments[i][1];
01896                   break;
01897             }
01898       }
01899 
01900 
01901       //// special code for items which won't attach if X is present
01902       //switch( usAttachment )
01903       //{
01904       //    case BIPOD:
01905       //          if ( FindAttachment( pObj, UNDER_GLAUNCHER) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
01906       //          {
01907       //                fSimilarItems = TRUE;
01908       //                usSimilarItem = UNDER_GLAUNCHER;
01909       //          }
01910       //          break;
01911       //    case UNDER_GLAUNCHER:
01912       //          if ( FindAttachment( pObj, BIPOD ) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
01913       //          {
01914       //                fSimilarItems = TRUE;
01915       //                usSimilarItem = BIPOD;
01916       //          }
01917       //          break;
01918       ///*
01919       //    case LASERSCOPE:
01920       //          if (FindAttachment( pObj, SNIPERSCOPE ) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND)
01921       //          {
01922       //                return( FALSE );
01923       //          }
01924       //          break;
01925       //    case SNIPERSCOPE:
01926       //          if (FindAttachment( pObj, LASERSCOPE ) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND)
01927       //          {
01928       //                return( FALSE );
01929       //          }
01930       //          break;
01931       //          */
01932       //    case DETONATOR:
01933       //          if( FindAttachment( pObj, REMDETONATOR ) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
01934       //          {
01935       //                fSameItem = TRUE;
01936       //          }
01937       //          break;
01938       //    case REMDETONATOR:
01939       //          if( FindAttachment( pObj, DETONATOR ) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
01940       //          {
01941       //                fSameItem = TRUE;
01942       //          }
01943       //          break;
01944       //    case SNIPERSCOPE:
01945       //          if( FindAttachment( pObj, REFLEX_SCOPED ) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
01946       //          {
01947       //                fSimilarItems = TRUE;
01948       //                usSimilarItem = REFLEX_SCOPED;
01949       //          }
01950       //          break;
01951       //    case REFLEX_SCOPED:
01952       //          if( FindAttachment( pObj, SNIPERSCOPE ) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
01953       //          {
01954       //                fSimilarItems = TRUE;
01955       //                usSimilarItem = SNIPERSCOPE;
01956       //          }
01957       //          if( FindAttachment( pObj, REFLEX_UNSCOPED ) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
01958       //          {
01959       //                fSimilarItems = TRUE;
01960       //                usSimilarItem = REFLEX_UNSCOPED;
01961       //          }
01962       //          break;
01963       //    case REFLEX_UNSCOPED:
01964       //          if( FindAttachment( pObj, REFLEX_SCOPED ) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
01965       //          {
01966       //                fSimilarItems = TRUE;
01967       //                usSimilarItem = REFLEX_SCOPED;
01968       //          }
01969       //          break;
01970       //    case SILENCER:
01971       //          if( FindAttachment( pObj, FLASH_SUPPRESSOR  ) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
01972       //          {
01973       //                fSimilarItems = TRUE;
01974       //                usSimilarItem = FLASH_SUPPRESSOR;
01975       //          }
01976       //          break;
01977       //    case FLASH_SUPPRESSOR:
01978       //          if( FindAttachment( pObj, SILENCER  ) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
01979       //          {
01980       //                fSimilarItems = TRUE;
01981       //                usSimilarItem = SILENCER;
01982       //          }
01983       //          break;
01984       //}
01985 
01986       if (fAttemptingAttachment)    
01987       {
01988             if (fSameItem)
01989             {
01990                   if (fDisplayMessage) ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, Message[ STR_ATTACHMENT_ALREADY ] );
01991                   return( FALSE );
01992             } 
01993             else if (fSimilarItems)
01994             {
01995                   if (fDisplayMessage) ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, Message[ STR_CANT_USE_TWO_ITEMS ], ItemNames[ usSimilarItem ], ItemNames[ usAttachment ] );
01996                   return( FALSE );
01997             }
01998       }
01999 
02000       return( TRUE );
02001 }
02002 
02003 //Determines if it is possible to equip this weapon with this ammo.
02004 BOOLEAN ValidAmmoType( UINT16 usItem, UINT16 usAmmoType )
02005 {
02006       if (Item[usItem].usItemClass == IC_GUN && Item[usAmmoType].usItemClass == IC_AMMO)
02007       {
02008             if (Weapon[usItem].ubCalibre == Magazine[Item[usAmmoType].ubClassIndex].ubCalibre)
02009             {
02010                   return( TRUE );
02011             }
02012       }
02013       return( FALSE );
02014 }
02015 
02016 BOOLEAN CompatibleFaceItem( UINT16 usItem1, UINT16 usItem2 )
02017 {
02018       INT32 iLoop = 0;
02019 
02020       // look for the section of the array pertaining to this attachment...
02021       while( 1 )
02022       {
02023             if (CompatibleFaceItems[iLoop][0] == usItem1)
02024             {
02025                   break;
02026             }
02027             iLoop++;
02028             if (CompatibleFaceItems[iLoop][0] == 0)
02029             {
02030                   // the proposed item cannot fit with anything!
02031                   return( FALSE );
02032             }
02033       }
02034       // now look through this section for the item in question
02035       while( 1 )
02036       {
02037             if (CompatibleFaceItems[iLoop][1] == usItem2)
02038             {
02039                   break;
02040             }
02041             iLoop++;
02042             if (CompatibleFaceItems[iLoop][0] != usItem1)
02043             {
02044                   // the proposed item cannot be attached to the item in question
02045                   return( FALSE );
02046             }
02047       }
02048       return( TRUE );
02049 }
02050 
02051 
02052 //Determines if this item is a two handed item.
02053 BOOLEAN TwoHandedItem( UINT16 usItem )
02054 {
02055 //    if (Item[usItem].fFlags & ITEM_TWO_HANDED)
02056       if (Item[usItem].twohanded )
02057       {
02058             return( TRUE );
02059       }
02060       return FALSE;
02061 }
02062 
02063 BOOLEAN ValidLaunchable( UINT16 usLaunchable, UINT16 usItem )
02064 {
02065       INT32 iLoop = 0;
02066       //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("ValidLaunchable: launchable=%d, item=%d",usLaunchable,usItem));
02067       // look for the section of the array pertaining to this launchable item...
02068       while( 1 )
02069       {
02070             if (Launchable[iLoop][0] == usLaunchable)
02071             {
02072                   break;
02073             }
02074             iLoop++;
02075             if (Launchable[iLoop][0] == 0)
02076             {
02077                   // the proposed item cannot be attached to anything!
02078                   //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("ValidLaunchable: launchable=%d, item=%d, return FALSE, launchable not found",usLaunchable,usItem));
02079                   return( FALSE );
02080             }
02081       }
02082       // now look through this section for the item in question
02083       while( 1 )
02084       {
02085             if (Launchable[iLoop][1] == usItem)
02086             {
02087                   break;
02088             }
02089             iLoop++;
02090             if (Launchable[iLoop][0] != usLaunchable)
02091             {
02092                   // the proposed item cannot be attached to the item in question
02093                   //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("ValidLaunchable: launchable=%d, item=%d, return FALSE, item not found",usLaunchable,usItem));
02094                   return( FALSE );
02095             }
02096       }
02097       //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("ValidLaunchable: launchable=%d, item=%d, return TRUE",usLaunchable,usItem));
02098       return( TRUE );
02099 }
02100 
02101 BOOLEAN ValidItemLaunchable( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, UINT16 usAttachment )
02102 {
02103       if ( !ValidLaunchable( usAttachment, pObj->usItem ) )
02104       {
02105             return( FALSE );
02106       }
02107       // if we can find another of the same class as the attachment, it's not possible
02108       if ( FindAttachmentByClass( pObj, Item[ usAttachment ].usItemClass ) != NO_SLOT )
02109       {
02110             return( FALSE );
02111       }
02112       return( TRUE );
02113 }
02114 
02115 
02116 UINT16 GetLauncherFromLaunchable( UINT16 usLaunchable )
02117 {
02118       INT32 iLoop = 0;
02119       UINT16 usItem = NOTHING;
02120 
02121       // look for the section of the array pertaining to this launchable item...
02122       while( 1 )
02123       {
02124             if (Launchable[iLoop][0] == usLaunchable)
02125             {
02126                   break;
02127             }
02128             iLoop++;
02129             if (Launchable[iLoop][0] == 0)
02130             {
02131                   // the proposed item cannot be attached to anything!
02132                   return( NOTHING );
02133             }
02134       }
02135 
02136       return( Launchable[iLoop][1] );
02137 }
02138 
02139 
02140 
02141 BOOLEAN EvaluateValidMerge( UINT16 usMerge, UINT16 usItem, UINT16 * pusResult, UINT16 * pusResult2, UINT8 * pubType, UINT8 * pubAPCost )
02142 {
02143       // NB "usMerge" is the object being merged with (e.g. compound 18)
02144       // "usItem" is the item being merged "onto" (e.g. kevlar vest)
02145       INT32 iLoop = 0;
02146 
02147       if (usMerge == usItem && Item[ usItem ].usItemClass == IC_AMMO)
02148       {
02149             *pusResult = usItem;
02150             *pubType = COMBINE_POINTS;
02151             return( TRUE );
02152       }
02153       // look for the section of the array pertaining to this Merge...
02154       while( 1 )
02155       {
02156             if (Merge[iLoop][0] == usMerge)
02157             {
02158                   break;
02159             }
02160             iLoop++;
02161             if (Merge[iLoop][0] == 0)
02162             {
02163                   // the proposed item cannot be merged with anything!
02164                   return( FALSE );
02165             }
02166       }
02167       // now look through this section for the item in question
02168       while( 1 )
02169       {
02170             if (Merge[iLoop][1] == usItem)
02171             {
02172                   break;
02173             }
02174             iLoop++;
02175             if (Merge[iLoop][0] != usMerge)
02176             {
02177                   // the proposed item cannot be merged with the item in question
02178                   return( FALSE );
02179             }
02180       }
02181       *pusResult = Merge[iLoop][2];
02182       *pusResult2 = Merge[iLoop][3];
02183       *pubType = (UINT8) Merge[iLoop][4];
02184       *pubAPCost = (UINT8) Merge[iLoop][5];
02185       return( TRUE );
02186 }
02187 
02188 BOOLEAN ValidMerge( UINT16 usMerge, UINT16 usItem )
02189 {
02190       UINT16      usIgnoreResult, usIgnoreResult2;
02191       UINT8       ubIgnoreType, ubIgnoreAPCost;
02192       return( EvaluateValidMerge( usMerge, usItem, &usIgnoreResult, &usIgnoreResult2, &ubIgnoreType, &ubIgnoreAPCost ) );
02193 }
02194 
02195 UINT8 CalculateObjectWeight( OBJECTTYPE *pObject )
02196 {
02197       INT32 cnt;
02198       UINT16 usWeight;
02199       INVTYPE * pItem;
02200 
02201       pItem = &(Item[ pObject->usItem ]);
02202 
02203       // Start with base weight
02204       usWeight = pItem->ubWeight;
02205 
02206       if ( pItem->ubPerPocket < 2 && pItem->usItemClass != IC_AMMO )
02207       {
02208 
02209             // account for any attachments
02210             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; cnt++ )
02211             {
02212                   if (pObject->usAttachItem[cnt] != NOTHING )
02213                   {
02214                         usWeight += Item[ pObject->usAttachItem[cnt] ].ubWeight;
02215                   }
02216             }
02217 
02218             // add in weight of ammo
02219             if (Item[ pObject->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN && pObject->ubGunShotsLeft > 0)
02220             {
02221                   if( gGameExternalOptions.fAmmoDynamicWeight == TRUE )
02222                   {
02223                         //Pulmu:
02224                         //Temporary calculation for minWeight
02225                         UINT32 uiMinWeight = (UINT32)((Item[ pObject->usGunAmmoItem].ubWeight / 5.0) + 0.5);
02226                         if( uiMinWeight < 1 || uiMinWeight > Item[ pObject->usGunAmmoItem].ubWeight)
02227                         {
02228                               uiMinWeight = 1;
02229                         }
02230 
02231                         if( uiMinWeight == Item[ pObject->usGunAmmoItem].ubWeight )
02232                         {
02233                               usWeight += uiMinWeight;
02234                         }
02235                         else
02236                         {
02237                               double weight = (double)uiMinWeight + (( (double)pObject->ubGunShotsLeft / (double)Weapon[pObject->usItem].ubMagSize) * ( (double)Item[ pObject->usGunAmmoItem].ubWeight - (double)uiMinWeight )) + 0.5; //Pulmu: Account for number of rounds left.
02238                               usWeight += (UINT16)weight;
02239                         }
02240                   }
02241                   else
02242                   {
02243                         usWeight += Item[ pObject->usGunAmmoItem ].ubWeight;
02244                   }
02245             }
02246       }
02247       else if ( pItem->usItemClass == IC_AMMO && gGameExternalOptions.fAmmoDynamicWeight == TRUE )//Pulmu: added weight allowance for ammo not being full
02248       {
02249             usWeight = 0;
02250             //Temporary calculation for minWeight. 0.2*ubWeight rounded correctly 
02251             UINT32 uiMinWeight = (UINT32)((Item[pObject->usItem].ubWeight / 5.0) + 0.5);
02252             if( uiMinWeight < 1 || uiMinWeight > Item[pObject->usItem].ubWeight)
02253             {
02254                   uiMinWeight = 1;
02255             }
02256 
02257             double weight = 0.0;
02258             
02259             for( cnt = 0; cnt < pObject->ubNumberOfObjects; cnt++ )
02260             {
02261                   if(pObject->ubShotsLeft[cnt] > 0)
02262                   {
02263                         if( uiMinWeight == Item[pObject->usItem].ubWeight )
02264                         {
02265                               weight += (double)uiMinWeight;
02266                         }
02267                         else
02268                         {
02269                               weight += (double)uiMinWeight + (( (double)pObject->ubShotsLeft[cnt] / (double)Magazine[ Item[ pObject->usItem].ubClassIndex ].ubMagSize) * ( (double)Item[pObject->usItem].ubWeight - (double)uiMinWeight ));
02270                         }
02271                   }
02272             }
02273             weight += 0.5; //Pulmu:To round correctly
02274             usWeight = (UINT16)weight;
02275             //Pulmu end
02276       }
02277 
02278 
02279       // make sure it really fits into that UINT8, in case we ever add anything real heavy with attachments/ammo
02280       Assert(usWeight <= 255);
02281 
02282       if ( usWeight > 255 )
02283             usWeight = 255; //Madd: limit to 255 to prevent negative weights, at least until we can change the OBJECTTYPE structure
02284 
02285       return( (UINT8) usWeight );
02286 }
02287 
02288 UINT32 CalculateCarriedWeight( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
02289 {
02290       UINT32      uiTotalWeight = 0;
02291       UINT32      uiPercent;
02292       UINT8       ubLoop;
02293       UINT16  usWeight;
02294       UINT8       ubStrengthForCarrying;
02295 
02296       //Pulmu: Changes for dynamic ammo weight
02297       for( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < NUM_INV_SLOTS; ubLoop++)
02298       {
02299             usWeight = pSoldier->inv[ubLoop].ubWeight;
02300             if (Item[ pSoldier->inv[ubLoop].usItem ].ubPerPocket > 1 && (Item[ pSoldier->inv[ubLoop].usItem].usItemClass != IC_AMMO || gGameExternalOptions.fAmmoDynamicWeight == FALSE))
02301             {
02302                   // account for # of items
02303                   usWeight *= pSoldier->inv[ubLoop].ubNumberOfObjects;
02304             }
02305             uiTotalWeight += usWeight;
02306 
02307       }
02308       // for now, assume soldiers can carry 1/2 their strength in KGs without penalty.
02309       // instead of multiplying by 100 for percent, and then dividing by 10 to account 
02310       // for weight units being in 10ths of kilos, not kilos... we just start with 10 instead of 100!
02311       ubStrengthForCarrying = EffectiveStrength( pSoldier );
02312       if ( ubStrengthForCarrying > 80 ) 
02313       {
02314             ubStrengthForCarrying += (ubStrengthForCarrying - 80);
02315       }
02316       uiPercent = (10 * uiTotalWeight) / ( ubStrengthForCarrying / 2 );
02317       return( uiPercent );
02318 
02319 }
02320 
02321 void DeleteObj(OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
02322 {
02323       memset( pObj, 0, sizeof(OBJECTTYPE) );
02324 }
02325 
02326 void CopyObj( OBJECTTYPE * pSourceObj, OBJECTTYPE * pTargetObj )
02327 {
02328       memcpy( pTargetObj, pSourceObj, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
02329 }
02330 
02331 void SwapObjs( OBJECTTYPE * pObj1, OBJECTTYPE * pObj2 )
02332 {
02333       OBJECTTYPE        Temp;
02334 
02335       memcpy( &Temp, pObj1, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
02336       memcpy( pObj1, pObj2, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
02337       memcpy( pObj2, &Temp, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
02338 /*
02339       //if we are in the shop keeper interface, switch the items
02340       if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
02341       {
02342             memset( &gMoveingItem, 0, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
02343             gMoveingItem.fActive = TRUE;
02344             gMoveingItem.sItemIndex = pObj1->usItem;
02345 
02346             gMoveingItem.ubLocationOfObject = PLAYERS_INVENTORY;
02347             gMoveingItem.ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem = gpItemPointerSoldier->ubProfile;
02348 
02349             //Get the item from the slot.
02350             memcpy( &gMoveingItem.ItemObject, &pObj1, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
02351 
02352       }
02353 */
02354 }
02355 
02356 void RemoveObjFrom( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, UINT8 ubRemoveIndex )
02357 {
02358       // remove 1 object from an OBJECTTYPE, starting at index bRemoveIndex
02359       UINT8 ubLoop;
02360 
02361       if (pObj->ubNumberOfObjects < ubRemoveIndex)
02362       {
02363             // invalid index!
02364             return;
02365       }
02366       else if (pObj->ubNumberOfObjects == 1)
02367       {
02368             // delete!
02369             DeleteObj( pObj );
02370       } 
02371       else
02372       {
02373             // shift down all the values that should be down
02374             for (ubLoop = ubRemoveIndex + 1; ubLoop < pObj->ubNumberOfObjects; ubLoop++)
02375             {
02376                   pObj->bStatus[ubLoop - 1] = pObj->bStatus[ubLoop];
02377             }
02378             // and set the upper value to 0
02379             pObj->bStatus[pObj->ubNumberOfObjects - 1] = 0;
02380             // make the number of objects recorded match the array
02381             pObj->ubNumberOfObjects--;
02382       }
02383 }
02384 
02385 void RemoveObjs( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, UINT8 ubNumberToRemove )
02386 {
02387       // remove a certain number of objects from an OBJECTTYPE, starting at index 0
02388       UINT8 ubLoop;
02389 
02390       if (ubNumberToRemove == 0)
02391       {
02392             return;
02393       }
02394       if (ubNumberToRemove >= pObj->ubNumberOfObjects)
02395       {
02396             // delete!
02397             DeleteObj( pObj );
02398       }
02399       else
02400       {
02401             for (ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < ubNumberToRemove; ubLoop++)
02402             {
02403                   RemoveObjFrom( pObj, 0 );
02404             }
02405             pObj->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( pObj );
02406       }
02407 }
02408 
02409 void GetObjFrom( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, UINT8 ubGetIndex, OBJECTTYPE * pDest )
02410 {
02411       if (!pDest || ubGetIndex >= pObj->ubNumberOfObjects)
02412       {
02413             return;
02414       }
02415       if (pObj->ubNumberOfObjects == 1)
02416       {
02417             memcpy( pDest, pObj, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
02418             DeleteObj( pObj );      
02419       }
02420       else
02421       {
02422             pDest->usItem = pObj->usItem;
02423             pDest->bStatus[0] = pObj->bStatus[ubGetIndex];
02424             pDest->ubNumberOfObjects = 1;
02425             pDest->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( pDest );
02426             RemoveObjFrom( pObj, ubGetIndex );
02427             pObj->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( pObj );
02428       }
02429 }
02430 
02431 void SwapWithinObj( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, UINT8 ubIndex1, UINT8 ubIndex2 )
02432 {
02433       INT8 bTemp;
02434 
02435       if (pObj->ubNumberOfObjects >= ubIndex1 || pObj->ubNumberOfObjects >= ubIndex1)
02436       {
02437             return;
02438       }
02439       
02440       bTemp = pObj->bStatus[ubIndex1];
02441       pObj->bStatus[ubIndex1] = pObj->bStatus[ubIndex2];
02442       pObj->bStatus[ubIndex2] = bTemp;
02443 }
02444 
02445 void DamageObj( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, INT8 bAmount )
02446 {
02447       if (bAmount >= pObj->bStatus[0])
02448       {
02449             pObj->bStatus[0] = 1;
02450       }
02451       else
02452       {
02453             pObj->bStatus[0] -= bAmount;
02454       }
02455 }
02456 
02457 void StackObjs( OBJECTTYPE * pSourceObj, OBJECTTYPE * pTargetObj, UINT8 ubNumberToCopy )
02458 {
02459       UINT8       ubLoop;
02460 
02461       // copy over N status values
02462       for (ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < ubNumberToCopy; ubLoop++)
02463       {
02464             pTargetObj->bStatus[ubLoop + pTargetObj->ubNumberOfObjects] = pSourceObj->bStatus[ubLoop ];
02465       }
02466 
02467       // now in the source object, move the rest down N places
02468       for (ubLoop = ubNumberToCopy; ubLoop < pSourceObj->ubNumberOfObjects; ubLoop++)
02469       {
02470             pSourceObj->bStatus[ubLoop - ubNumberToCopy] = pSourceObj->bStatus[ubLoop];
02471       }
02472 
02473       pTargetObj->ubNumberOfObjects += ubNumberToCopy;
02474       RemoveObjs( pSourceObj, ubNumberToCopy );
02475       pSourceObj->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( pSourceObj );
02476       pTargetObj->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( pTargetObj );
02477 }
02478 
02479 void CleanUpStack( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, OBJECTTYPE * pCursorObj )
02480 {
02481       INT8  bLoop, bLoop2;
02482       INT8  bMaxPoints, bPointsToMove;
02483 
02484       if ( !(Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_AMMO || Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_KIT || Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_MEDKIT  || Item[pObj->usItem].canteen ) )
02485       {
02486             return;
02487       }
02488 
02489       if ( Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_AMMO )
02490       {
02491             bMaxPoints = Magazine[ Item[ pObj->usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubMagSize;
02492       }
02493       else
02494       {
02495             bMaxPoints = 100;
02496       }
02497 
02498       if ( pCursorObj && pCursorObj->usItem == pObj->usItem )
02499       {
02500             for ( bLoop = (INT8) pCursorObj->ubNumberOfObjects - 1; bLoop >= 0; bLoop-- )
02501             {
02502                   if ( pCursorObj->bStatus[ bLoop ] > 0 )
02503                   {
02504                         // take the points here and distribute over the lower #d items
02505                         for ( bLoop2 = pObj->ubNumberOfObjects - 1; bLoop2 >= 0; bLoop2-- )
02506                         {
02507                               if ( pObj->bStatus[ bLoop2 ] < bMaxPoints )
02508                               {
02509                                     bPointsToMove = bMaxPoints - pObj->bStatus[ bLoop2 ];
02510                                     bPointsToMove = __min( bPointsToMove, pCursorObj->bStatus[ bLoop ] );
02511 
02512                                     pObj->bStatus[ bLoop2 ] += bPointsToMove;
02513 
02514                                     pCursorObj->bStatus[ bLoop ] -= bPointsToMove;
02515                                     if ( pCursorObj->bStatus[ bLoop ] == 0 )
02516                                     {
02517                                           // done!
02518                                           pCursorObj->ubNumberOfObjects--;
02519                                           break;
02520                                     }
02521                               }
02522                         }
02523                   }
02524             }
02525       }
02526 
02527       for ( bLoop = (INT8) pObj->ubNumberOfObjects - 1; bLoop >= 0; bLoop-- )
02528       {
02529             if ( pObj->bStatus[ bLoop ] > 0 )
02530             {
02531                   // take the points here and distribute over the lower #d items
02532                   for ( bLoop2 = bLoop - 1; bLoop2 >= 0; bLoop2-- )
02533                   {
02534                         if ( pObj->bStatus[ bLoop2 ] < bMaxPoints )
02535                         {
02536                               bPointsToMove = bMaxPoints - pObj->bStatus[ bLoop2 ];
02537                               bPointsToMove = __min( bPointsToMove, pObj->bStatus[ bLoop ] );
02538 
02539                               pObj->bStatus[ bLoop2 ] += bPointsToMove;
02540 
02541                               pObj->bStatus[ bLoop ] -= bPointsToMove;
02542                               if ( pObj->bStatus[ bLoop ] == 0 )
02543                               {
02544                                     // done!
02545                                     pObj->ubNumberOfObjects--;
02546                                     break;
02547                               }
02548                         }
02549                   }
02550             }
02551       }
02552 
02553 }
02554 
02555 
02556 BOOLEAN PlaceObjectAtObjectIndex( OBJECTTYPE * pSourceObj, OBJECTTYPE * pTargetObj, UINT8 ubIndex )
02557 {
02558       INT8 bTemp;
02559 
02560       if (pSourceObj->usItem != pTargetObj->usItem)
02561       {
02562             return( TRUE );
02563       }
02564       if (ubIndex < pTargetObj->ubNumberOfObjects)
02565       {
02566             // swap
02567             bTemp = pSourceObj->bStatus[0];
02568             pSourceObj->bStatus[0] = pTargetObj->bStatus[ubIndex];
02569             pTargetObj->bStatus[ubIndex] = bTemp;
02570             return( TRUE );
02571       }
02572       else
02573       {
02574             // add to end
02575             StackObjs( pSourceObj, pTargetObj, 1 );
02576             return( FALSE );
02577       }
02578 }
02579 
02580 #define RELOAD_NONE 0
02581 #define RELOAD_PLACE 1
02582 #define RELOAD_SWAP 2
02583 #define RELOAD_TOPOFF 3
02584 #define RELOAD_AUTOPLACE_OLD 4
02585 
02586 BOOLEAN ReloadGun( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, OBJECTTYPE * pGun, OBJECTTYPE * pAmmo )
02587 {
02588       OBJECTTYPE  OldAmmo;
02589       UINT8                   ubBulletsToMove;
02590       INT8                    bAPs;
02591       UINT16                  usReloadSound;
02592       BOOLEAN                 fSameAmmoType;
02593       BOOLEAN                 fSameMagazineSize;
02594       BOOLEAN                 fReloadingWithStack;
02595       BOOLEAN                 fEmptyGun;
02596       INT8                    bReloadType;
02597       UINT16                  usNewAmmoItem;
02598 
02599       if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
02600       {
02601             bAPs = GetAPsToReloadGunWithAmmo( pGun, pAmmo );
02602             if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, bAPs, 0,TRUE ) )
02603             {
02604                   return( FALSE );
02605             }
02606 
02607       }
02608 
02609       if ( Item[ pGun->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER || Item[pGun->usItem].cannon )
02610       {
02611             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("ReloadGun: Loading launcher - new ammo type = %d, weight = %d", pAmmo->usItem,pAmmo->ubWeight  ) );
02612             pGun->usGunAmmoItem = pAmmo->usItem;
02613             if ( AttachObject( pSoldier, pGun, pAmmo ) == FALSE )
02614             {
02615                   pGun->usGunAmmoItem = NONE;
02616                   // abort
02617                   return( FALSE );
02618             }
02619       }
02620       else
02621       {
02622             fEmptyGun = (pGun->ubGunShotsLeft == 0);
02623             fReloadingWithStack = (pAmmo->ubNumberOfObjects > 1);
02624             fSameAmmoType = ( pGun->ubGunAmmoType == Magazine[Item[pAmmo->usItem].ubClassIndex].ubAmmoType );
02625             fSameMagazineSize = ( Magazine[ Item[ pAmmo->usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubMagSize == GetMagSize( pGun));
02626 
02627             if (fEmptyGun)
02628             {
02629                   bReloadType = RELOAD_PLACE;
02630             }
02631             else
02632             {
02633                   // record old ammo
02634                   memset( &OldAmmo, 0, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ));
02635                   OldAmmo.usItem = pGun->usGunAmmoItem;
02636                   OldAmmo.ubNumberOfObjects = 1;
02637                   OldAmmo.ubShotsLeft[0] = pGun->ubGunShotsLeft;
02638       
02639                   if (fSameMagazineSize)
02640                   {
02641                         if (fSameAmmoType)
02642                         {
02643                               if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) && Weapon[pGun->usItem].swapClips )
02644                               {
02645                                     bReloadType = RELOAD_SWAP;
02646                               }
02647                               else
02648                               {
02649                                     bReloadType = RELOAD_TOPOFF;
02650                               }
02651                         }
02652                         else
02653                         {
02654                               if (!fReloadingWithStack)
02655                               {
02656                                     bReloadType = RELOAD_SWAP;
02657                               }
02658                               else
02659                               {
02660                                     bReloadType = RELOAD_AUTOPLACE_OLD;
02661                               }
02662                         }
02663                   }
02664                   else  // diff sized magazines
02665                   {
02666                         if (fSameAmmoType)
02667                         {
02668                               bReloadType = RELOAD_TOPOFF;
02669                         }
02670                         else
02671                         {
02672                               bReloadType = RELOAD_AUTOPLACE_OLD;
02673                         }
02674                   }
02675             }
02676 
02677             if (fSameMagazineSize)
02678             {
02679                   // record new ammo item for gun
02680                   usNewAmmoItem = pAmmo->usItem;
02681 
02682                   if (bReloadType == RELOAD_TOPOFF)
02683                   {
02684                         ubBulletsToMove = __min( pAmmo->ubShotsLeft[0], GetMagSize(pGun) - pGun->ubGunShotsLeft );
02685                   }
02686                   else
02687                   {
02688                         ubBulletsToMove = pAmmo->ubShotsLeft[0];
02689                   }
02690 
02691             }
02692             else if (Magazine[Item[pAmmo->usItem].ubClassIndex].ubMagSize > GetMagSize(pGun))
02693             {
02694 //MADD MARKER
02695                   //usNewAmmoItem = pAmmo->usItem - 1;
02696                   usNewAmmoItem = FindReplacementMagazine(Weapon[pGun->usItem].ubCalibre ,GetMagSize(pGun),Magazine[Item[pAmmo->usItem].ubClassIndex].ubAmmoType);
02697                   if (bReloadType == RELOAD_TOPOFF)
02698                   {
02699                         ubBulletsToMove = __min( pAmmo->ubShotsLeft[0], GetMagSize(pGun) - pGun->ubGunShotsLeft );
02700                   }
02701                   else
02702                   {
02703                         ubBulletsToMove = __min( pAmmo->ubShotsLeft[0], GetMagSize(pGun) );
02704                   }
02705             }
02706             else // mag is smaller than weapon mag
02707             {
02708 //MADD MARKER
02709                   //usNewAmmoItem = pAmmo->usItem + 1;
02710                   usNewAmmoItem = FindReplacementMagazine(Weapon[pGun->usItem].ubCalibre ,GetMagSize(pGun),Magazine[Item[pAmmo->usItem].ubClassIndex].ubAmmoType);
02711                   if (bReloadType == RELOAD_TOPOFF)
02712                   {
02713                         ubBulletsToMove = __min( pAmmo->ubShotsLeft[0], GetMagSize(pGun) - pGun->ubGunShotsLeft );
02714                   }
02715                   else
02716                   {
02717                         ubBulletsToMove = __min( pAmmo->ubShotsLeft[0], GetMagSize(pGun));
02718                   }
02719             }
02720 
02721 
02722             switch( bReloadType )
02723             {
02724 
02725                   case RELOAD_PLACE:
02726                         pGun->ubGunShotsLeft = ubBulletsToMove;
02727                         pGun->ubGunAmmoType = Magazine[Item[pAmmo->usItem].ubClassIndex].ubAmmoType;
02728                         pGun->usGunAmmoItem = usNewAmmoItem;
02729                         break;
02730 
02731                   case RELOAD_SWAP:
02732                         pGun->ubGunShotsLeft = ubBulletsToMove;
02733                         pGun->ubGunAmmoType = Magazine[Item[pAmmo->usItem].ubClassIndex].ubAmmoType;
02734                         pGun->usGunAmmoItem = usNewAmmoItem;
02735                         if (fReloadingWithStack)
02736                         {
02737                               // add to end of stack
02738                               StackObjs( &OldAmmo, pAmmo, 1 );
02739                         }
02740                         else
02741                         {
02742                               // Copying the old ammo to the cursor in turnbased could screw up for the player
02743                               // (suppose his inventory is full!)
02744 
02745                               if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) && !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, (INT8) (bAPs + AP_PICKUP_ITEM), 0, FALSE ) )
02746                               {
02747                                     // try autoplace
02748                                     if ( !AutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, &OldAmmo, FALSE ) )
02749                                     {
02750                                           // put it on the ground
02751                                           AddItemToPool( pSoldier->sGridNo, &OldAmmo, 1, pSoldier->bLevel, 0 , -1 );
02752                                     }
02753                                     // delete the object now in the cursor
02754                                     DeleteObj( pAmmo );
02755                               }
02756                               else
02757                               {
02758                                     // copy the old ammo to the cursor
02759                                     memcpy( pAmmo, &OldAmmo, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
02760                               }
02761                         }
02762                         break;
02763                   case RELOAD_AUTOPLACE_OLD:
02764                         if ( !AutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, &OldAmmo, TRUE ) )
02765                         {
02766                               // error msg!
02767                               return( FALSE );
02768                         }
02769                         // place first ammo in gun
02770                         pGun->ubGunShotsLeft = ubBulletsToMove;
02771                         pGun->ubGunAmmoType = Magazine[Item[pAmmo->usItem].ubClassIndex].ubAmmoType;
02772                         pGun->usGunAmmoItem = usNewAmmoItem;
02773 
02774                         break;
02775 
02776                   case RELOAD_TOPOFF:
02777                         // ADD that many bullets to gun
02778                         pGun->ubGunShotsLeft += ubBulletsToMove;
02779                         break;
02780 
02781             }
02782 
02783             if ( ! ( bReloadType == RELOAD_SWAP && !fReloadingWithStack ) )
02784             {
02785                   // remove # of bullets, delete 1 object if necessary
02786 
02787                   pAmmo->ubShotsLeft[0] -= ubBulletsToMove;
02788                   if (pAmmo->ubShotsLeft[0] == 0)
02789                   {
02790                         RemoveObjs( pAmmo, 1 );                         
02791                   }
02792 
02793             }
02794       }
02795 
02796       // OK, let's play a sound of reloading too...
02797       // If this guy is visible...
02798       if ( pSoldier->bVisible != -1 )
02799       {
02800             // Play some effects!
02801             usReloadSound     = Weapon[ pGun->usItem ].sReloadSound;
02802 
02803             if ( usReloadSound != 0 && !IsAutoResolveActive() )
02804             {
02805                   PlayJA2Sample( usReloadSound, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );   
02806             }
02807       }
02808 
02809       if (pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum)
02810       {
02811             // spit out a message if this is one of our folks reloading
02812             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, Message[STR_PLAYER_RELOADS], pSoldier->name );
02813       }
02814 
02815       DeductPoints( pSoldier, bAPs, 0 );
02816       pGun->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( pGun );
02817 
02818       if ( pGun->bGunAmmoStatus >= 0 )
02819       {
02820             // make sure gun ammo status is 100, if gun isn't jammed
02821             pGun->bGunAmmoStatus = 100;
02822       }
02823 
02824       pGun->ubGunState |= GS_CARTRIDGE_IN_CHAMBER; // Madd: reloading should automatically put cartridge in chamber
02825 
02826       return( TRUE );
02827 }
02828 
02829 BOOLEAN EmptyWeaponMagazine( OBJECTTYPE * pWeapon, OBJECTTYPE *pAmmo )
02830 {
02831       UINT16 usReloadSound;
02832 
02833       CHECKF( pAmmo != NULL );
02834 
02835       if ( pWeapon->ubGunShotsLeft > 0 )
02836       {
02837             // start by erasing ammo item, just in case...
02838             DeleteObj( pAmmo );
02839 
02840             pAmmo->ubGunAmmoType = pWeapon->ubGunAmmoType ;
02841             pAmmo->ubShotsLeft[0]               = pWeapon->ubGunShotsLeft;
02842             pAmmo->usItem                                         = pWeapon->usGunAmmoItem;
02843             pAmmo->ubNumberOfObjects      = 1;
02844 
02845             pWeapon->ubGunShotsLeft       = 0;
02846             pWeapon->ubGunAmmoType    = 0;
02847             //pWeapon->usGunAmmoItem            = 0; // leaving the ammo item the same for auto-reloading purposes
02848 
02849             // Play some effects!
02850             usReloadSound     = Weapon[ pWeapon->usItem ].sReloadSound;
02851 
02852             if ( usReloadSound != 0 )
02853             {
02854                   PlayJA2Sample( usReloadSound, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );   
02855             }
02856 
02857             pWeapon->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( pWeapon );
02858             // Pulmu bugfix:
02859             pAmmo->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( pAmmo );
02860             // Pulmu end:
02861             return( TRUE );
02862       }
02863       else
02864       {
02865             return( FALSE );
02866       }
02867 }
02868 
02869 /*
02870 BOOLEAN ReloadLauncher( OBJECTTYPE * pLauncher, OBJECTTYPE * pAmmo )
02871 {
02872       BOOLEAN                 fOldAmmo;
02873       OBJECTTYPE  OldAmmo;
02874 
02875       if (pLauncher->ubGunShotsLeft == 0)
02876       {
02877             fOldAmmo = FALSE;
02878       }
02879       else
02880       {
02881             if (pAmmo->ubNumberOfObjects > 1)
02882             {
02883                   // can't do the swap out to the cursor
02884                   return( FALSE );
02885             }
02886             // otherwise temporarily store the launcher's old ammo
02887             memset( &OldAmmo, 0, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ));
02888             fOldAmmo = TRUE;
02889             OldAmmo.usItem = pLauncher->usGunAmmoItem;
02890             OldAmmo.ubNumberOfObjects = 1;
02891             OldAmmo.bStatus[0] = pLauncher->bGunAmmoStatus;
02892       }
02893 
02894       // put the new ammo in the gun
02895       pLauncher->usGunAmmoItem = pAmmo->usItem;
02896       pLauncher->ubGunShotsLeft = 1;
02897       pLauncher->ubGunAmmoType = AMMO_GRENADE;
02898       pLauncher->bGunAmmoStatus = pAmmo->bStatus[0];
02899 
02900 
02901       if (fOldAmmo)
02902       {
02903             // copy the old ammo back to the item in the cursor
02904             memcpy( pAmmo, &OldAmmo, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
02905       }
02906       else
02907       {
02908             // reduce the number of objects in the cursor by 1
02909             RemoveObjs( pAmmo, 1 );
02910       }
02911       return( TRUE );
02912 }
02913 */
02914 
02915 INT8 FindAmmo( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT8 ubCalibre, UINT8 ubMagSize, INT8 bExcludeSlot )
02916 {
02917       INT8                    bLoop;
02918       INVTYPE *         pItem;
02919 
02920       for (bLoop = HANDPOS; bLoop < NUM_INV_SLOTS; bLoop++)
02921       {
02922             if (bLoop == bExcludeSlot)
02923             {
02924                   continue;
02925             }
02926             pItem = &(Item[pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem]);
02927             if (pItem->usItemClass == IC_AMMO)
02928             {
02929                   if (Magazine[pItem->ubClassIndex].ubCalibre == ubCalibre && (Magazine[pItem->ubClassIndex].ubMagSize == ubMagSize || ubMagSize == ANY_MAGSIZE))
02930                   {
02931                         return( bLoop );
02932                   }
02933             }
02934       }
02935       return( NO_SLOT );
02936 }
02937 
02938 
02939 INT8 FindAmmoToReload( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT8 bWeaponIn, INT8 bExcludeSlot )
02940 {
02941       OBJECTTYPE *      pObj;
02942       INT8                          bSlot;
02943 
02944       if (pSoldier == NULL)
02945       {
02946             return( NO_SLOT );
02947       }
02948       pObj = &(pSoldier->inv[bWeaponIn]);
02949 
02950 //<SB> manual recharge
02951       if (pObj->ubGunShotsLeft && !(pObj->ubGunState & GS_CARTRIDGE_IN_CHAMBER) )
02952             return bWeaponIn;
02953 //</SB>
02954 
02955       if ( Item[pObj->usItem].usItemClass == IC_GUN && !Item[pObj->usItem].cannon )
02956       {
02957             // look for same ammo as before
02958             bSlot = FindObjExcludingSlot( pSoldier, pObj->usGunAmmoItem, bExcludeSlot );
02959             if (bSlot != NO_SLOT)
02960             {
02961                   // reload using this ammo!
02962                   return( bSlot );
02963             }
02964             // look for any ammo that matches which is of the same calibre and magazine size
02965             bSlot = FindAmmo( pSoldier, Weapon[pObj->usItem].ubCalibre, GetMagSize(pObj), bExcludeSlot );
02966             if (bSlot != NO_SLOT)
02967             {
02968                   return( bSlot );
02969             }
02970             else
02971             {
02972                   // look for any ammo that matches which is of the same calibre (different size okay)
02973                   return( FindAmmo( pSoldier, Weapon[pObj->usItem].ubCalibre, ANY_MAGSIZE, bExcludeSlot ) );
02974             }
02975       }
02976       else
02977       {
02978             for(int i=0;i<MAXITEMS;i++)
02979             {
02980                   if ( Launchable[i][0] == 0 && Launchable[i][1] == 0)
02981                         break;
02982 
02983                   if ( pObj->usItem == Launchable[i][1] )
02984                   {
02985                         bSlot = FindObj( pSoldier, Launchable[i][0] );
02986 
02987                         if ( bSlot != NO_SLOT )
02988                               return bSlot;
02989                   }
02990             }
02991             return NO_SLOT;
02992 
02993             //switch( pObj->usItem )
02994             //{
02995             //    case RPG7: // TODO: madd fix this
02996             //          return( FindObjInObjRange( pSoldier, RPG_HE_ROCKET, RPG_FRAG_ROCKET ) );
02997             //    case MORTAR:
02998             //          return( FindObj( pSoldier, MORTAR_SHELL ) );
02999             //    case TANK_CANNON:
03000             //          return( FindObj( pSoldier, TANK_SHELL ) );
03001             //    case GLAUNCHER:
03002             //    case UNDER_GLAUNCHER:
03003             //          return( FindObjInObjRange( pSoldier, GL_HE_GRENADE, GL_SMOKE_GRENADE ) );
03004             //    default:
03005             //          return( NO_SLOT );
03006             //}
03007       }
03008 }
03009 
03010 BOOLEAN AutoReload( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
03011 {
03012       OBJECTTYPE *pObj, *pObj2;
03013       INT8        bSlot, bAPCost;
03014       BOOLEAN           fRet;
03015 
03016       CHECKF( pSoldier );
03017       pObj = &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]);
03018 
03019 //<SB> manual recharge
03020       if (pObj->ubGunShotsLeft && !(pObj->ubGunState & GS_CARTRIDGE_IN_CHAMBER) )
03021       {
03022             pObj->ubGunState |= GS_CARTRIDGE_IN_CHAMBER;
03023 
03024             DeductPoints(pSoldier, Weapon[Item[(pObj)->usItem].ubClassIndex].APsToReloadManually, 0);
03025 
03026             PlayJA2Sample( Weapon[ Item[pObj->usItem].ubClassIndex ].ManualReloadSound, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );
03027 
03028             if ( IsValidSecondHandShot( pSoldier ) )
03029             {
03030                   pObj2 = &(pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS]);
03031 
03032                   if (pObj2->ubGunShotsLeft && !(pObj2->ubGunState & GS_CARTRIDGE_IN_CHAMBER) )
03033                   {                       
03034                         pObj2->ubGunState |= GS_CARTRIDGE_IN_CHAMBER;
03035                         PlayJA2Sample( Weapon[ Item[pObj2->usItem].ubClassIndex ].ManualReloadSound, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );
03036                   }
03037             }
03038 
03039             return TRUE;
03040       }
03041       else
03042       {
03043             if ( IsValidSecondHandShot( pSoldier ) )
03044             {
03045                   pObj2 = &(pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS]);
03046 
03047                   if (pObj2->ubGunShotsLeft && !(pObj2->ubGunState & GS_CARTRIDGE_IN_CHAMBER) )
03048                   {
03049                         pObj2->ubGunState |= GS_CARTRIDGE_IN_CHAMBER;
03050 
03051                         DeductPoints(pSoldier, Weapon[Item[(pObj2)->usItem].ubClassIndex].APsToReloadManually, 0);
03052 
03053                         PlayJA2Sample( Weapon[ Item[pObj2->usItem].ubClassIndex ].ManualReloadSound, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );
03054 
03055                         return TRUE;
03056                   }
03057             }
03058       }
03059 //</SB>
03060 
03061       if (Item[pObj->usItem].usItemClass == IC_GUN || Item[pObj->usItem].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER)
03062       {
03063             bSlot = FindAmmoToReload( pSoldier, HANDPOS, NO_SLOT );
03064             if (bSlot != NO_SLOT)
03065             {
03066                   // reload using this ammo!
03067                   fRet = ReloadGun( pSoldier, pObj, &(pSoldier->inv[bSlot]) );
03068                   // if we are valid for two-pistol shooting (reloading) and we have enough APs still
03069                   // then do a reload of both guns!
03070                   if ( (fRet == TRUE) && IsValidSecondHandShotForReloadingPurposes( pSoldier ) )
03071                   {
03072                         pObj = &(pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS]);
03073                         bSlot = FindAmmoToReload( pSoldier, SECONDHANDPOS, NO_SLOT );
03074                         if (bSlot != NO_SLOT)
03075                         {
03076                               // ce would reload using this ammo!
03077                               bAPCost = GetAPsToReloadGunWithAmmo( pObj, &(pSoldier->inv[bSlot] ) );
03078                               if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, (INT16) bAPCost, 0, FALSE ) )
