03079                               {
03080                                     // reload the 2nd gun too
03081                                     fRet = ReloadGun( pSoldier, pObj, &(pSoldier->inv[bSlot]) );
03082                               }
03083                               else
03084                               {                                   
03085                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, Message[ STR_RELOAD_ONLY_ONE_GUN ], pSoldier->name );
03086                               }
03087                         }
03088                   }
03089 
03090                   DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
03091                   return( fRet );
03092             }
03093       }
03094 
03095       // couldn't reload
03096       return( FALSE );
03097 }
03098 
03099 INT8 GetAttachmentComboMerge( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
03100 {
03101       INT8        bIndex = 0;
03102       INT8        bAttachLoop, bAttachPos;
03103 
03104       while( AttachmentComboMerge[ bIndex ].usItem != NOTHING )
03105       {
03106             if ( pObj->usItem == AttachmentComboMerge[ bIndex ].usItem )
03107             {
03108                   // search for all the appropriate attachments 
03109                   for ( bAttachLoop = 0; bAttachLoop < 2; bAttachLoop++ )
03110                   {
03111                         if ( AttachmentComboMerge[ bIndex ].usAttachment[ bAttachLoop ] == NOTHING )
03112                         {
03113                               continue;
03114                         }
03115 
03116                         bAttachPos = FindAttachment( pObj, AttachmentComboMerge[ bIndex ].usAttachment[ bAttachLoop ] );
03117                         if ( bAttachPos == -1 )
03118                         {
03119                               // didn't find something required
03120                               return( -1 );
03121                         }
03122                   }
03123                   // found everything required!
03124                   return( bIndex );
03125             }
03126 
03127             bIndex++;
03128       }
03129 
03130       return( -1 );
03131 }
03132 
03133 void PerformAttachmentComboMerge( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, INT8 bAttachmentComboMerge )
03134 {
03135       INT8        bAttachLoop, bAttachPos;
03136       UINT32      uiStatusTotal = 0;
03137       INT8        bNumStatusContributors = 0;
03138 
03139       // This object has been validated as available for an attachment combo merge.
03140       // - find all attachments in list and destroy them
03141       // - status of new object should be average of items including attachments
03142       // - change object
03143 
03144       for ( bAttachLoop = 0; bAttachLoop < 2; bAttachLoop++ )
03145       {
03146             if ( AttachmentComboMerge[ bAttachmentComboMerge ].usAttachment[ bAttachLoop ] == NOTHING )
03147             {
03148                   continue;
03149             }
03150 
03151             bAttachPos = FindAttachment( pObj, AttachmentComboMerge[ bAttachmentComboMerge ].usAttachment[ bAttachLoop ] );
03152             AssertMsg( bAttachPos != -1, String( "Attachment combo merge couldn't find a necessary attachment" ) );
03153             
03154             uiStatusTotal += pObj->bAttachStatus[ bAttachPos ];
03155             bNumStatusContributors++;
03156 
03157             pObj->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ] = NOTHING;
03158             pObj->bAttachStatus[ bAttachPos ] = 0;
03159       }
03160 
03161       uiStatusTotal += pObj->bStatus[ 0 ];
03162       bNumStatusContributors++;
03163 
03164       pObj->usItem = AttachmentComboMerge[ bAttachmentComboMerge ].usResult;
03165       pObj->bStatus[ 0 ] = (INT8) (uiStatusTotal / bNumStatusContributors );
03166 }
03167 BOOLEAN AttachObject( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, OBJECTTYPE * pTargetObj, OBJECTTYPE * pAttachment )
03168 {
03169       return AttachObject( pSoldier, pTargetObj, pAttachment, TRUE );
03170 }
03171 BOOLEAN AttachObject( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, OBJECTTYPE * pTargetObj, OBJECTTYPE * pAttachment, BOOLEAN playSound )
03172 {
03173       INT8        bAttachPos, bSecondAttachPos;//, bAbility, bSuccess;
03174       UINT16            usResult, usResult2;
03175       INT8        bLoop;
03176       UINT8       ubType, ubLimit, ubAPCost;
03177       INT32       iCheckResult;
03178       INT8        bAttachInfoIndex = -1, bAttachComboMerge;
03179       BOOLEAN     fValidLaunchable = FALSE;
03180 
03181       fValidLaunchable = ValidLaunchable( pAttachment->usItem, pTargetObj->usItem );
03182 
03183       if ( fValidLaunchable || ValidItemAttachment( pTargetObj, pAttachment->usItem, TRUE ) )
03184       {
03185             OBJECTTYPE  TempObj = {0};
03186 
03187             // find an attachment position... 
03188             // second half of this 'if' is for attaching GL grenades to a gun
03189             if ( fValidLaunchable || Item[pAttachment->usItem].glgrenade )
03190             {
03191                   // try replacing if possible
03192                   bAttachPos = FindAttachmentByClass( pTargetObj, Item[ pAttachment->usItem ].usItemClass );
03193                   if ( bAttachPos != NO_SLOT )
03194                   {
03195                         // we can only do a swap if there is only 1 grenade being attached
03196                         if ( pAttachment->ubNumberOfObjects > 1 )
03197                         {
03198                               return( FALSE );
03199                         }
03200                   }
03201                   else
03202                   {
03203                         bAttachPos = FindAttachment( pTargetObj, NOTHING );
03204                   }
03205             }
03206             else
03207             {
03208                   // try replacing if possible
03209                   bAttachPos = FindAttachment( pTargetObj, pAttachment->usItem );
03210                   if ( bAttachPos == NO_SLOT )
03211                   {
03212                         bAttachPos = FindAttachment( pTargetObj, NOTHING );
03213                   }
03214             }
03215 
03216             if (bAttachPos == ITEM_NOT_FOUND)
03217             {
03218                   return( FALSE );
03219             }
03220             else
03221             {
03222                   if ( pSoldier )
03223                   {
03224                         bAttachInfoIndex = GetAttachmentInfoIndex( pAttachment->usItem );
03225                         // in-game (not behind the scenes) attachment
03226                         if ( bAttachInfoIndex != -1 && AttachmentInfo[ bAttachInfoIndex ].bAttachmentSkillCheck != NO_CHECK )
03227                         {
03228                               iCheckResult = SkillCheck( pSoldier, AttachmentInfo[ bAttachInfoIndex ].bAttachmentSkillCheck, AttachmentInfo[ bAttachInfoIndex ].bAttachmentSkillCheckMod );
03229                               if (iCheckResult < 0)         
03230                               {
03231                                     // the attach failure damages both items
03232                                     DamageObj( pTargetObj, (INT8) -iCheckResult );
03233                                     DamageObj( pAttachment, (INT8) -iCheckResult );
03234                                     // there should be a quote here!
03235                                     DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_CURSE1 );
03236                                     if ( gfInItemDescBox )
03237                                     {
03238                                           DeleteItemDescriptionBox();
03239                                     }
03240                                     return( FALSE );
03241                               }
03242                         }
03243 
03244                         if ( ValidItemAttachment( pTargetObj, pAttachment->usItem, TRUE ) && playSound ) // not launchable
03245                         {
03246                               // attachment sounds
03247                               if ( Item[ pTargetObj->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_WEAPON )
03248                               {
03249                                     PlayJA2Sample( ATTACH_TO_GUN, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( MIDVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );
03250                               }
03251                               else if ( Item[ pTargetObj->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_ARMOUR )
03252                               {
03253                                     PlayJA2Sample( ATTACH_CERAMIC_PLATES, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( MIDVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );
03254                               }
03255                               else if ( Item[ pTargetObj->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_BOMB )
03256                               {
03257                                     PlayJA2Sample( ATTACH_DETONATOR, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( MIDVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );
03258                               }
03259                         }
03260                   }
03261 
03262                   if ( pTargetObj->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ] != NOTHING )
03263                   {
03264                         CreateItem( pTargetObj->usAttachItem[bAttachPos], pTargetObj->bAttachStatus[bAttachPos], &TempObj );
03265                   }
03266 
03267                   pTargetObj->usAttachItem[bAttachPos] = pAttachment->usItem;
03268                   pTargetObj->bAttachStatus[bAttachPos] = pAttachment->bStatus[0];
03269 
03270                   if (Item[pAttachment->usItem].grenadelauncher )
03271                   {
03272                         // transfer any attachment (max 1) from the grenade launcher to the gun
03273                         if (pAttachment->usAttachItem[0] != NOTHING)
03274                         {
03275                               bSecondAttachPos = FindAttachment( pTargetObj, NOTHING );
03276                               if (bSecondAttachPos == ITEM_NOT_FOUND)
03277                               {
03278                                     // not enough room for all attachments - cancel!!
03279                                     pTargetObj->usAttachItem[bAttachPos] = NOTHING;
03280                                     pTargetObj->bAttachStatus[bAttachPos] = 0;
03281                                     return( FALSE );
03282                               }
03283                               else
03284                               {
03285                                     pTargetObj->usAttachItem[bSecondAttachPos] = pAttachment->usAttachItem[0];
03286                                     pTargetObj->bAttachStatus[bSecondAttachPos] = pAttachment->bAttachStatus[0];
03287                                     pAttachment->usAttachItem[0] = NOTHING;
03288                                     pAttachment->bAttachStatus[0] = 0;
03289                               }
03290                         }
03291                   }
03292 
03293                   if ( TempObj.usItem != NOTHING )
03294                   {
03295                         // overwrite/swap!
03296                         CopyObj( &TempObj, pAttachment );
03297                   }
03298                   else
03299                   {
03300                         RemoveObjs( pAttachment, 1 );
03301                   }
03302 
03303                   // Check for attachment merge combos here
03304                   bAttachComboMerge = GetAttachmentComboMerge( pTargetObj );
03305                   if ( bAttachComboMerge != -1 )
03306                   {
03307                         PerformAttachmentComboMerge( pTargetObj, bAttachComboMerge );
03308                         if ( bAttachInfoIndex != -1 && AttachmentInfo[ bAttachInfoIndex ].bAttachmentSkillCheckMod < 20 )
03309                         {
03310                               StatChange( pSoldier, MECHANAMT, (INT8) ( 20 - AttachmentInfo[ bAttachInfoIndex ].bAttachmentSkillCheckMod ), FALSE );
03311                               StatChange( pSoldier, WISDOMAMT, (INT8) ( 20 - AttachmentInfo[ bAttachInfoIndex ].bAttachmentSkillCheckMod ), FALSE );
03312                         }
03313                   }
03314 
03315                   pTargetObj->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( pTargetObj );
03316 
03317                   if ( pSoldier != NULL )
03318                         ApplyEquipmentBonuses(pSoldier);
03319 
03320                   return( TRUE );
03321             }
03322       }
03323       // check for merges
03324       else if (EvaluateValidMerge( pAttachment->usItem, pTargetObj->usItem, &usResult, &usResult2, &ubType, &ubAPCost ))      
03325       {
03326             if ( ubType != COMBINE_POINTS )
03327             {
03328                   if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, ubAPCost, 0, TRUE ) )
03329                   {
03330                         return( FALSE );
03331                   }
03332 
03333                   DeductPoints( pSoldier, ubAPCost, 0 );
03334             }
03335 
03336             switch( ubType )
03337             {
03338                   case USE_ITEM:
03339                   case USE_ITEM_HARD:
03340                         // the merge will combine the two items
03341                         if ( pSoldier )
03342                         {
03343                               if ( ubType == USE_ITEM_HARD )
03344                               {
03345                                     // requires a skill check, and gives experience                         
03346                                     iCheckResult = SkillCheck( pSoldier, ATTACHING_SPECIAL_ITEM_CHECK, -30 );
03347                                     if (iCheckResult < 0)
03348                                     {
03349                                           // could have a chance of detonation
03350                                           // for now, damage both objects
03351                                           DamageObj( pTargetObj, (INT8) -iCheckResult );
03352                                           DamageObj( pAttachment, (INT8) -iCheckResult );
03353                                           DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_CURSE1 );
03354                                           return( FALSE );
03355                                     }                       
03356                                     StatChange( pSoldier, MECHANAMT, 25, FALSE );
03357                                     StatChange( pSoldier, WISDOMAMT, 5, FALSE );
03358                               }
03359 
03360 
03361                               //Madd: note that use_item cannot produce two different items!!! so it doesn't use usResult2
03362 
03363                               //Madd: unload guns after merge if ammo caliber or mag size don't match
03364                               if ( Item[pTargetObj->usItem].usItemClass == IC_GUN && pTargetObj->usGunAmmoItem != NONE && pTargetObj->ubGunShotsLeft > 0 )
03365                               {
03366                                     if ( Item[usResult].usItemClass != IC_GUN || Weapon[Item[usResult].ubClassIndex].ubCalibre != Weapon[Item[pTargetObj->usItem].ubClassIndex].ubCalibre || pTargetObj->ubGunShotsLeft > Weapon[Item[usResult].ubClassIndex].ubMagSize )
03367                                     { // item types/calibers/magazines don't match, spit out old ammo
03368                                           OBJECTTYPE newObj;
03369                                           CreateItem(pTargetObj->usGunAmmoItem, 100, &newObj);
03370                                           newObj.ubShotsLeft[0] = pTargetObj->ubGunShotsLeft;
03371                                           pTargetObj->ubGunShotsLeft = 0;
03372                                           pTargetObj->usGunAmmoItem = NONE;
03373                                           if ( !AutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, &newObj, FALSE ) )
03374                                           {   // put it on the ground
03375                                                 AddItemToPool( pSoldier->sGridNo, &newObj, 1, pSoldier->bLevel, 0 , -1 );
03376                                           }
03377                                     }
03378                               }
03379 
03380                               //Madd: remove any prohibited attachments
03381                               for (bAttachPos = 0; bAttachPos < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bAttachPos++)
03382                               {
03383                                     if (pTargetObj->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ] != NOTHING && !ValidAttachment(pTargetObj->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ],usResult) && !ValidLaunchable(pTargetObj->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ],usResult) )
03384                                     {
03385                                           if ( !Item[pTargetObj->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ]].inseparable )
03386                                           {//remove it
03387                                                 OBJECTTYPE newObj;
03388                                                 RemoveAttachment(pTargetObj,bAttachPos,&newObj);
03389                                                 if ( !AutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, &newObj, FALSE ) )
03390                                                 {   // put it on the ground
03391                                                       AddItemToPool( pSoldier->sGridNo, &newObj, 1, pSoldier->bLevel, 0 , -1 );
03392                                                 }
03393                                           }
03394                                           else
03395                                           {//destroy it
03396                                                 pTargetObj->usAttachItem[bAttachPos] = NOTHING;
03397                                                 pTargetObj->bAttachStatus[bAttachPos] = 0;
03398                                           }
03399                                     }
03400                               }
03401 
03402                               pTargetObj->usItem = usResult;
03403                               //AutoPlaceObject( pAttachment );
03404                               pTargetObj->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( pTargetObj );
03405                               if (pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum)
03406                               {
03407                                     DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_COOL1 );
03408                               }
03409                               ApplyEquipmentBonuses(pSoldier);
03410                               return TRUE;
03411                         }
03412                         else
03413                               return FALSE;
03414                   case COMBINE_POINTS:
03415                         // transfer points...
03416                         if ( Item[ pTargetObj->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_AMMO )
03417                         {
03418                               ubLimit = Magazine[ Item[ pTargetObj->usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubMagSize;
03419                         }
03420                         else
03421                         {
03422                               ubLimit = 100;
03423                         }
03424 
03425                         // count down through # of attaching items and add to status of item in position 0
03426                         for (bLoop = pAttachment->ubNumberOfObjects - 1; bLoop >= 0; bLoop--)
03427                         {
03428                               if (pTargetObj->bStatus[0] + pAttachment->bStatus[bLoop] <= ubLimit)
03429                               {
03430                                     // consume this one totally and continue
03431                                     pTargetObj->bStatus[0] += pAttachment->bStatus[bLoop];
03432                                     RemoveObjFrom( pAttachment, bLoop );
03433                                     // reset loop limit
03434                                     bLoop = pAttachment->ubNumberOfObjects; // add 1 to counteract the -1 from the loop
03435                               }
03436                               else
03437                               {
03438                                     // add part of this one and then we're done
03439                                     pAttachment->bStatus[bLoop] -= (ubLimit - pTargetObj->bStatus[0]);
03440                                     pTargetObj->bStatus[0] = ubLimit;
03441                                     break;
03442                               }
03443                         }
03444                         break;
03445                   case DESTRUCTION:
03446                         // the merge destroyed both items!
03447                         DeleteObj( pTargetObj );
03448                         DeleteObj( pAttachment );
03449                         DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_CURSE1 );
03450                         break;
03451                   case ELECTRONIC_MERGE:
03452                         if ( pSoldier ) 
03453                         {
03454                               iCheckResult = SkillCheck( pSoldier, ATTACHING_SPECIAL_ELECTRONIC_ITEM_CHECK, -30 );
03455                               if ( iCheckResult < 0 )
03456                               {
03457                                     DamageObj( pTargetObj, (INT8) -iCheckResult );
03458                                     DamageObj( pAttachment, (INT8) -iCheckResult );
03459                                     DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_CURSE1 );
03460                                     return( FALSE );
03461                               }
03462                               // grant experience!
03463                         }
03464                         // fall through
03465                   case EXPLOSIVE:
03466                         if ( ubType == EXPLOSIVE ) /// coulda fallen through
03467                         {
03468                               if (pSoldier)
03469                               {
03470                                     // requires a skill check, and gives experience                         
03471                                     iCheckResult = SkillCheck( pSoldier, ATTACHING_DETONATOR_CHECK, -30 );
03472                                     if (iCheckResult < 0)
03473                                     {
03474                                           // could have a chance of detonation
03475                                           // for now, damage both objects
03476                                           DamageObj( pTargetObj, (INT8) -iCheckResult );
03477                                           DamageObj( pAttachment, (INT8) -iCheckResult );
03478                                           DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_CURSE1 );
03479                                           return( FALSE );
03480                                     }                       
03481                                     StatChange( pSoldier, EXPLODEAMT, 25, FALSE );
03482                                     StatChange( pSoldier, WISDOMAMT, 5, FALSE );
03483                               }
03484                         }
03485                         // fall through
03486                   default:
03487                         // the merge will combine the two items
03488                         //Madd: usResult2 only works for standard merges -> item1 + item2 = item3 + item4
03489 
03490                         //Madd: unload guns after merge if ammo caliber or mag size don't match
03491                         if ( Item[pTargetObj->usItem].usItemClass == IC_GUN && pTargetObj->usGunAmmoItem != NONE && pTargetObj->ubGunShotsLeft > 0 )
03492                         {
03493                               if ( Item[usResult].usItemClass != IC_GUN || Weapon[Item[usResult].ubClassIndex].ubCalibre != Weapon[Item[pTargetObj->usItem].ubClassIndex].ubCalibre || pTargetObj->ubGunShotsLeft > Weapon[Item[usResult].ubClassIndex].ubMagSize )
03494                               { // item types/calibers/magazines don't match, spit out old ammo
03495                                     OBJECTTYPE newObj;
03496                                     CreateItem(pTargetObj->usGunAmmoItem, 100, &newObj);
03497                                     newObj.ubShotsLeft[0] = pTargetObj->ubGunShotsLeft;
03498                                     pTargetObj->ubGunShotsLeft = 0;
03499                                     pTargetObj->usGunAmmoItem = NONE;
03500                                     if ( !AutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, &newObj, FALSE ) )
03501                                     {   // put it on the ground
03502                                           AddItemToPool( pSoldier->sGridNo, &newObj, 1, pSoldier->bLevel, 0 , -1 );
03503                                     }
03504                               }
03505                         }
03506 
03507                         //Madd: remove any prohibited attachments
03508                         for (bAttachPos = 0; bAttachPos < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bAttachPos++)
03509                         {
03510                               if (pTargetObj->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ] != NOTHING && !ValidAttachment(pTargetObj->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ],usResult) && !ValidLaunchable(pTargetObj->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ],usResult) )
03511                               {
03512                                     if ( !Item[pTargetObj->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ]].inseparable )
03513                                     {//remove it
03514                                           OBJECTTYPE newObj;
03515                                           RemoveAttachment(pTargetObj,bAttachPos,&newObj);
03516                                           if ( !AutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, &newObj, FALSE ) )
03517                                           {   // put it on the ground
03518                                                 AddItemToPool( pSoldier->sGridNo, &newObj, 1, pSoldier->bLevel, 0 , -1 );
03519                                           }
03520                                     }
03521                                     else
03522                                     {//destroy it
03523                                           pTargetObj->usAttachItem[bAttachPos] = NOTHING;
03524                                           pTargetObj->bAttachStatus[bAttachPos] = 0;
03525                                     }
03526                               }
03527                         }
03528 
03529                         pTargetObj->usItem = usResult;
03530                         if ( ubType != TREAT_ARMOUR )
03531                         {
03532                               pTargetObj->bStatus[0] = (pTargetObj->bStatus[0] + pAttachment->bStatus[0]) / 2;
03533                         }
03534 
03535                         pTargetObj->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( pTargetObj );
03536 
03537                         if ( usResult2 != NOTHING )
03538                         {
03539                               //Madd: usResult2 is what the original attachment/source item turns into
03540 
03541                               //Madd: unload guns after merge if ammo caliber or mag size don't match
03542                               if ( Item[pAttachment->usItem].usItemClass == IC_GUN && pAttachment->usGunAmmoItem != NONE && pAttachment->ubGunShotsLeft > 0 )
03543                               {
03544                                     if ( Item[usResult2].usItemClass != IC_GUN || Weapon[Item[usResult2].ubClassIndex].ubCalibre != Weapon[Item[pAttachment->usItem].ubClassIndex].ubCalibre || pAttachment->ubGunShotsLeft > Weapon[Item[usResult2].ubClassIndex].ubMagSize )
03545                                     { // item types/calibers/magazines don't match, spit out old ammo
03546                                           OBJECTTYPE newObj;
03547                                           CreateItem(pAttachment->usGunAmmoItem, 100, &newObj);
03548                                           newObj.ubShotsLeft[0] = pAttachment->ubGunShotsLeft;
03549                                           pAttachment->ubGunShotsLeft = 0;
03550                                           pAttachment->usGunAmmoItem = NONE;
03551                                           if ( !AutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, &newObj, FALSE ) )
03552                                           {   // put it on the ground
03553                                                 AddItemToPool( pSoldier->sGridNo, &newObj, 1, pSoldier->bLevel, 0 , -1 );
03554                                           }
03555                                     }
03556                               }
03557 
03558                               //Madd: remove any prohibited attachments
03559                               for (bAttachPos = 0; bAttachPos < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bAttachPos++)
03560                               {
03561                                     if (pAttachment->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ] != NOTHING && !ValidAttachment(pAttachment->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ],usResult2) && !ValidLaunchable(pAttachment->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ],usResult2) )
03562                                     {
03563                                           if ( !Item[pAttachment->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ]].inseparable )
03564                                           {//remove it
03565                                                 OBJECTTYPE newObj;
03566                                                 RemoveAttachment(pAttachment,bAttachPos,&newObj);
03567                                                 if ( !AutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, &newObj, FALSE ) )
03568                                                 {   // put it on the ground
03569                                                       AddItemToPool( pSoldier->sGridNo, &newObj, 1, pSoldier->bLevel, 0 , -1 );
03570                                                 }
03571                                           }
03572                                           else
03573                                           {//destroy it
03574                                                 pAttachment->usAttachItem[bAttachPos] = NOTHING;
03575                                                 pAttachment->bAttachStatus[bAttachPos] = 0;
03576                                           }
03577                                     }
03578                               }
03579 
03580 
03581 
03582                               pAttachment->usItem = usResult2;
03583                               if ( ubType != TREAT_ARMOUR )
03584                               {
03585                                     pAttachment->bStatus[0] = (pAttachment->bStatus[0] + pTargetObj->bStatus[0]) / 2;
03586                               }
03587                               pAttachment->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( pAttachment );
03588                         }
03589                         else  
03590                               DeleteObj( pAttachment );
03591 
03592                         if (pSoldier && pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum)
03593                         {
03594                               DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_COOL1 );
03595                         }
03596                         break;
03597                   }
03598                   if ( pSoldier != NULL )
03599                         ApplyEquipmentBonuses(pSoldier);
03600                   return( TRUE );
03601       }
03602       return( FALSE );
03603 }
03604 
03605 
03606 BOOLEAN CanItemFitInPosition( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, OBJECTTYPE *pObj, INT8 bPos, BOOLEAN fDoingPlacement )
03607 {
03608       UINT8                         ubSlotLimit;
03609       INT8                          bNewPos;
03610 
03611       switch( bPos )
03612       {
03613             case SECONDHANDPOS:
03614 //                if (Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].fFlags & ITEM_TWO_HANDED)
03615                   if (Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].twohanded )
03616                   {
03617                         return( FALSE );
03618                   }
03619                   break;
03620             case HANDPOS:
03621 //                if (Item[ pObj->usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_TWO_HANDED)
03622                   if (Item[ pObj->usItem ].twohanded )
03623                   {
03624                         if (pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem != NOTHING && pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS].usItem != NOTHING)
03625                         {
03626                               // two items in hands; try moving the second one so we can swap 
03627                               if (Item[pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS].usItem].ubPerPocket == 0)
03628                               {
03629                                     bNewPos = FindEmptySlotWithin( pSoldier, BIGPOCK1POS, BIGPOCK4POS );
03630                               }
03631                               else
03632                               {
03633                                     bNewPos = FindEmptySlotWithin( pSoldier, BIGPOCK1POS, SMALLPOCK8POS );
03634                               }
03635                               if (bNewPos == NO_SLOT)
03636                               {
03637                                     // nowhere to put second item
03638                                     return( FALSE );
03639                               }
03640 
03641                               if ( fDoingPlacement )
03642                               {
03643                                     // otherwise move it.
03644                                     CopyObj( &(pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS]), &(pSoldier->inv[bNewPos]) );
03645                                     DeleteObj( &(pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS]) );
03646                               }
03647                         }
03648                   }
03649                   break;
03650             case VESTPOS:
03651             case HELMETPOS:
03652             case LEGPOS:
03653                   if (Item[pObj->usItem].usItemClass != IC_ARMOUR)
03654                   {
03655                         return( FALSE );
03656                   }
03657                   switch (bPos)
03658                   {
03659                         case VESTPOS:
03660                               if (Armour[Item[pObj->usItem].ubClassIndex].ubArmourClass != ARMOURCLASS_VEST)
03661                               {
03662                                     return( FALSE );
03663                               }           
03664                               break;
03665                         case HELMETPOS:
03666                               if (Armour[Item[pObj->usItem].ubClassIndex].ubArmourClass != ARMOURCLASS_HELMET)
03667                               {
03668                                     return( FALSE );
03669                               }           
03670                               break;
03671                         case LEGPOS:
03672                               if (Armour[Item[pObj->usItem].ubClassIndex].ubArmourClass != ARMOURCLASS_LEGGINGS)
03673                               {
03674                                     return( FALSE );
03675                               }           
03676                               break;
03677                         default:
03678                               break;
03679                   }
03680                   break;
03681             case HEAD1POS:
03682             case HEAD2POS:
03683                   if (Item[pObj->usItem].usItemClass != IC_FACE)
03684                   {
03685                         return( FALSE );
03686                   }
03687             default:
03688                   break;
03689       }
03690 
03691       ubSlotLimit = ItemSlotLimit( pObj->usItem, bPos );
03692       if (ubSlotLimit == 0 && bPos >= SMALLPOCK1POS )
03693       {
03694             // doesn't fit!
03695             return( FALSE );
03696       }
03697 
03698       return( TRUE );
03699 }
03700 
03701 
03702 BOOLEAN DropObjIfThereIsRoom( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT8 bPos, OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
03703 {
03704       // try autoplacing item in bSlot elsewhere, then do a placement
03705       BOOLEAN fAutoPlacedOld;
03706 
03707       fAutoPlacedOld = AutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, &(pSoldier->inv[bPos]), FALSE );
03708       if ( fAutoPlacedOld )
03709       {
03710             return( PlaceObject( pSoldier, bPos, pObj ) );
03711       }
03712       else
03713       {
03714             return( FALSE );
03715       }
03716 }
03717 
03718 
03719 BOOLEAN PlaceObject( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT8 bPos, OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
03720 {
03721       // returns object to have in hand after placement... same as original in the
03722       // case of error
03723 
03724       UINT8                         ubSlotLimit, ubNumberToDrop, ubLoop;
03725       OBJECTTYPE *      pInSlot;
03726       BOOLEAN                       fObjectWasRobotRemote = FALSE;
03727 
03728       if ( Item[pObj->usItem].robotremotecontrol )
03729       {
03730             fObjectWasRobotRemote = TRUE;
03731       }
03732 
03733       if ( !CanItemFitInPosition( pSoldier, pObj, bPos, TRUE ) )
03734       {
03735             return( FALSE );
03736       }
03737 
03738       // If the position is either head slot, then the item must be IC_FACE (checked in
03739       // CanItemFitInPosition).
03740       if ( bPos == HEAD1POS )
03741       {
03742             if ( !CompatibleFaceItem( pObj->usItem, pSoldier->inv[ HEAD2POS ].usItem ) )
03743             {
03744                   UINT16      zTemp[ 150 ];
03745 
03746                   swprintf( zTemp, Message[ STR_CANT_USE_TWO_ITEMS ], ItemNames[ pObj->usItem ], ItemNames[ pSoldier->inv[ HEAD2POS ].usItem ] );
03747                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, zTemp );
03748                   return( FALSE );
03749             }
03750       }
03751       else if ( bPos == HEAD2POS )
03752       {
03753             if ( !CompatibleFaceItem( pObj->usItem, pSoldier->inv[ HEAD1POS ].usItem ) )
03754             {
03755                   UINT16      zTemp[ 150 ];
03756 
03757                   swprintf( zTemp, Message[ STR_CANT_USE_TWO_ITEMS ], ItemNames[ pObj->usItem ], ItemNames[ pSoldier->inv[ HEAD1POS ].usItem ] );
03758                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, zTemp );
03759                   return( FALSE );
03760             }
03761       }
03762 
03763       if ( Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_KEY && pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC )
03764       {
03765             if ( KeyTable[ pObj->ubKeyID ].usDateFound == 0 )
03766             {
03767                   KeyTable[ pObj->ubKeyID ].usDateFound = (UINT16) GetWorldDay();
03768                   KeyTable[ pObj->ubKeyID ].usSectorFound = SECTOR( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY );
03769             }
03770       }
03771 
03772     // Lesh: bugfix - replacing weapon in auto with another weapon w/o auto-mode 
03773     if (bPos == HANDPOS && Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN)
03774     {
03775             //Madd: added code for nosemiauto tag
03776             if (!Weapon[ Item[pObj->usItem].ubClassIndex ].NoSemiAuto)
03777             {
03778                   pSoldier->bWeaponMode = WM_NORMAL;
03779                   pSoldier->bDoBurst = FALSE;
03780                   pSoldier->bDoAutofire = FALSE;
03781             }
03782             else
03783             {
03784                   pSoldier->bWeaponMode = WM_AUTOFIRE;
03785                   pSoldier->bDoBurst = TRUE;
03786                   pSoldier->bDoAutofire = TRUE;
03787             }
03788     }
03789     // Lesh: end
03790 
03791       ubSlotLimit = ItemSlotLimit( pObj->usItem, bPos );
03792 
03793       pInSlot = &(pSoldier->inv[bPos]);
03794 
03795       if (pInSlot->ubNumberOfObjects == 0)
03796       {
03797             // placement in an empty slot
03798             ubNumberToDrop = pObj->ubNumberOfObjects;
03799 
03800             if (ubNumberToDrop > __max( ubSlotLimit, 1 ) )
03801             {
03802                   // drop as many as possible into pocket
03803                   ubNumberToDrop = __max( ubSlotLimit, 1 );
03804             }
03805 
03806             // could be wrong type of object for slot... need to check...
03807             // but assuming it isn't
03808             memcpy( pInSlot, pObj, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
03809 /*
03810             //if we are in the shopkeeper interface
03811             if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
03812             {
03813                   memset( &gMoveingItem, 0, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
03814                   SetSkiCursor( CURSOR_NORMAL );
03815             }
03816 */
03817 
03818             if (ubNumberToDrop != pObj->ubNumberOfObjects)
03819             {
03820                   // in the InSlot copy, zero out all the objects we didn't drop
03821                   for (ubLoop = ubNumberToDrop; ubLoop < pObj->ubNumberOfObjects; ubLoop++)
03822                   {
03823                         pInSlot->bStatus[ubLoop] = 0;
03824                   }
03825             }
03826             pInSlot->ubNumberOfObjects = ubNumberToDrop;
03827 
03828             // remove a like number of objects from pObj
03829             RemoveObjs( pObj, ubNumberToDrop );
03830             if (pObj->ubNumberOfObjects == 0)
03831             {
03832                   // dropped everything
03833 //                if (bPos == HANDPOS && Item[pInSlot->usItem].fFlags & ITEM_TWO_HANDED)
03834                   if (bPos == HANDPOS && Item[pInSlot->usItem].twohanded )
03835                   {
03836                         // We just performed a successful drop of a two-handed object into the
03837                         // main hand
03838                         if (pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS].usItem != 0)
03839                         {
03840                               // swap what WAS in the second hand into the cursor
03841                               SwapObjs( pObj, &(pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS]));
03842                         }
03843                   }
03844              }
03845 
03846       }
03847       else
03848       {
03849             // replacement/reloading/merging/stacking 
03850             // keys have an additional check for key ID being the same
03851             if ( (pObj->usItem == pInSlot->usItem) && ( Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass != IC_KEY || pObj->ubKeyID == pInSlot->ubKeyID ) )
03852             {
03853                   if (Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_MONEY)
03854                   {
03855       
03856                         UINT32 uiMoneyMax = MoneySlotLimit( bPos );
03857 
03858                         // always allow money to be combined!
03859                         // IGNORE STATUS!
03860 
03861                         if (pInSlot->uiMoneyAmount + pObj->uiMoneyAmount > uiMoneyMax)
03862                         {
03863                               // remove X dollars
03864                               pObj->uiMoneyAmount -= (uiMoneyMax - pInSlot->uiMoneyAmount);
03865                               // set in slot to maximum
03866                               pInSlot->uiMoneyAmount = uiMoneyMax;
03867                         }
03868                         else
03869                         {
03870                               pInSlot->uiMoneyAmount += pObj->uiMoneyAmount;
03871                               DeleteObj( pObj );
03872 /*
03873                               if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
03874                               {
03875                                     memset( &gMoveingItem, 0, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
03876                                     SetSkiCursor( CURSOR_NORMAL );
03877                               }
03878 */
03879                         }
03880                   }
03881                   else if ( ubSlotLimit == 1 || (ubSlotLimit == 0 && bPos >= HANDPOS && bPos <= BIGPOCK4POS ) )
03882                   {
03883                         if (pObj->ubNumberOfObjects <= 1)
03884                         {
03885                               // swapping
03886                               SwapObjs( pObj, pInSlot );
03887                         }
03888                         else
03889                         {
03890                               return( DropObjIfThereIsRoom( pSoldier, bPos, pObj ) );
03891                         }
03892                   }
03893                   else if (ubSlotLimit == 0) // trying to drop into a small pocket
03894                   {
03895                         return( DropObjIfThereIsRoom( pSoldier, bPos, pObj ) );
03896                   }
03897                   else
03898                   {
03899                         // stacking
03900                         ubNumberToDrop = ubSlotLimit - pInSlot->ubNumberOfObjects;
03901                         if (ubNumberToDrop > pObj->ubNumberOfObjects)
03902                         {
03903                               ubNumberToDrop = pObj->ubNumberOfObjects;
03904                         }
03905                         StackObjs( pObj, pInSlot, ubNumberToDrop );
03906                   }
03907             }
03908             else
03909             {
03910                   // replacement, unless reloading... 
03911                   switch (Item[pInSlot->usItem].usItemClass)
03912                   {
03913                         case IC_GUN:
03914                               if (Item[pObj->usItem].usItemClass == IC_AMMO)
03915                               {
03916                                     if (Weapon[pInSlot->usItem].ubCalibre == Magazine[Item[pObj->usItem].ubClassIndex].ubCalibre)
03917                                     {
03918                                           // reload... 
03919                                           return( ReloadGun( pSoldier, pInSlot, pObj ) );
03920                                     }
03921                                     else
03922                                     {
03923                                           // invalid ammo
03924                                           break;
03925                                           //return( FALSE );
03926                                     }
03927                               }
03928                               break;
03929                         case IC_LAUNCHER:
03930                         {                 
03931                               if ( ValidLaunchable( pObj->usItem, pInSlot->usItem ) )
03932                               {
03933                                     // reload...                                    
03934                                     return( ReloadGun( pSoldier, pInSlot, pObj ) );
03935                               }
03936                         }
03937                         break;
03938                   }
03939 
03940 //                if ( (Item[pObj->usItem].fFlags & ITEM_TWO_HANDED) && (bPos == HANDPOS) )
03941                   if ( (Item[pObj->usItem].twohanded ) && (bPos == HANDPOS) )
03942                   {
03943                         if (pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS].usItem != 0)
03944                         {
03945                               // both pockets have something in them, so we can't swap
03946                               return( FALSE );
03947                         }
03948                         else
03949                         {
03950                               SwapObjs( pObj, pInSlot );    
03951                         }
03952                   }
03953                   else if (pObj->ubNumberOfObjects <= __max( ubSlotLimit, 1 ) )
03954                   {
03955                         // swapping
03956                         SwapObjs( pObj, pInSlot );
03957                   }
03958                   else
03959                   {
03960                         return( DropObjIfThereIsRoom( pSoldier, bPos, pObj ) );
03961                   }
03962 
03963             }
03964       }
03965 
03966       // ATE: Put this in to see if we should update the robot, if we were given a controller...
03967       if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && fObjectWasRobotRemote )
03968       {
03969             UpdateRobotControllerGivenController( pSoldier );
03970       }
03971       
03972       ApplyEquipmentBonuses(pSoldier);
03973       //Pulmu bugfix
03974       pInSlot->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight(pInSlot);
03975       //Pulmu end
03976       return( TRUE );
03977 }
03978 
03979 BOOLEAN InternalAutoPlaceObject( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, OBJECTTYPE * pObj, BOOLEAN fNewItem, INT8 bExcludeSlot )
03980 {
03981       INT8              bSlot;
03982       INVTYPE     * pItem;
03983       UINT8             ubPerSlot;
03984 
03985       // statuses of extra objects would be 0 if the # exceeds the maximum
03986       Assert( pObj->ubNumberOfObjects <= MAX_OBJECTS_PER_SLOT);
03987 
03988       //Pulmu bugfix          
03989       pObj->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( pObj);
03990       pItem = &(Item[pObj->usItem]);
03991       ubPerSlot = pItem->ubPerPocket;
03992 
03993       // Overrides to the standard system: put guns in hand, armour on body (if slot empty)
03994       switch (pItem->usItemClass)
03995       {
03996             case IC_GUN:
03997             case IC_BLADE:
03998             case IC_LAUNCHER:
03999             case IC_BOMB:
04000             case IC_GRENADE:
04001 //                if (!(pItem->fFlags & ITEM_TWO_HANDED))
04002                   if (!(pItem->twohanded))
04003                   {
04004                         if (pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem == NONE)
04005                         {
04006                               // put the one-handed weapon in the guy's hand...
04007                               PlaceObject( pSoldier, HANDPOS, pObj );
04008                               SetNewItem( pSoldier, HANDPOS, fNewItem );
04009                               if ( pObj->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
04010                               {
04011                                     return( TRUE );
04012                               }
04013                         }
04014 //                      else if ( !(Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].fFlags & ITEM_TWO_HANDED) && pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS].usItem == NONE)
04015                         else if ( !(Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].twohanded ) && pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS].usItem == NONE)
04016                         {
04017                               // put the one-handed weapon in the guy's 2nd hand...
04018                               PlaceObject( pSoldier, SECONDHANDPOS, pObj );
04019                               SetNewItem( pSoldier, SECONDHANDPOS, fNewItem );
04020                               if ( pObj->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
04021                               {
04022                                     return( TRUE );
04023                               }
04024                         }
04025                   }
04026                   // two-handed objects are best handled in the main loop for large objects,
04027                   // which checks the hands first anyhow                
04028                   break;
04029 
04030             case IC_ARMOUR:
04031                   switch (Armour[Item[pObj->usItem].ubClassIndex].ubArmourClass)
04032                   {
04033                         case ARMOURCLASS_VEST:
04034                               if (pSoldier->inv[VESTPOS].usItem == NONE)
04035                               {
04036                                     // put on the armour!
04037                                     PlaceObject( pSoldier, VESTPOS, pObj );
04038                                     SetNewItem( pSoldier, VESTPOS, fNewItem );
04039                                     if ( pObj->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
04040                                     {
04041                                           return( TRUE );
04042                                     }
04043                               }
04044                               break;
04045                         case ARMOURCLASS_LEGGINGS:
04046                               if (pSoldier->inv[LEGPOS].usItem == NONE)
04047                               {
04048                                     // put on the armour!
04049                                     PlaceObject( pSoldier, LEGPOS, pObj );
04050                                     SetNewItem( pSoldier, LEGPOS, fNewItem );
04051                                     if ( pObj->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
04052                                     {
04053                                           return( TRUE );
04054                                     }
04055                               }
04056                               break;
04057                         case ARMOURCLASS_HELMET:
04058                               if (pSoldier->inv[HELMETPOS].usItem == NONE)
04059                               {
04060                                     // put on the armour!
04061                                     PlaceObject( pSoldier, HELMETPOS, pObj );
04062                                     SetNewItem( pSoldier, HELMETPOS, fNewItem );
04063                                     if ( pObj->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
04064                                     {
04065                                           return( TRUE );
04066                                     }
04067                               }
04068                               break;
04069                         default:
04070                               break;
04071                   }
04072                   // otherwise stuff it in a slot somewhere
04073                   break;
04074             case IC_FACE:
04075                   if ( (pSoldier->inv[HEAD1POS].usItem == NOTHING) && CompatibleFaceItem( pObj->usItem, pSoldier->inv[HEAD2POS].usItem ) )
04076                   {
04077                         PlaceObject( pSoldier, HEAD1POS, pObj );
04078                         SetNewItem( pSoldier, HEAD1POS, fNewItem );
04079                         if ( pObj->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
04080                         {
04081                               return( TRUE );
04082                         }
04083                   }
04084                   else if ( (pSoldier->inv[HEAD2POS].usItem == NOTHING) && CompatibleFaceItem( pObj->usItem, pSoldier->inv[HEAD1POS].usItem ) )
04085                   {
04086                         PlaceObject( pSoldier, HEAD2POS, pObj );
04087                         SetNewItem( pSoldier, HEAD2POS, fNewItem );
04088                         if ( pObj->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
04089                         {
04090                               return( TRUE );
04091                         }
04092                   }
04093                   break;
04094             default:
04095                   break;
04096       }
04097 
04098       if (ubPerSlot == 0)
04099       {
04100             // Large object; look for an empty hand/large pocket and dump it in there
04101             // FindObjWithin with 0 will search for empty slots!
04102             // Madd
04103             //bSlot = HANDPOS;
04104             //while (1) 
04105             for( bSlot = HANDPOS; bSlot <= BIGPOCK4POS; bSlot++)
04106             {     
04107                   bSlot = FindEmptySlotWithin( pSoldier, bSlot, BIGPOCK4POS );
04108                   if (bSlot == ITEM_NOT_FOUND)
04109                   {
04110                         return( FALSE );
04111                   }
04112                   if (bSlot == SECONDHANDPOS)
04113                   {
04114                         if (pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem != NONE)
04115                         {
04116 //                            bSlot++;
04117                               continue;
04118                         }
04119                   }
04120                   // this might fail if we're trying to place in HANDPOS,
04121                   // and SECONDHANDPOS is full
04122                   PlaceObject( pSoldier, bSlot, pObj );
04123                   SetNewItem( pSoldier, bSlot, fNewItem );
04124                   if (pObj->ubNumberOfObjects == 0)
04125                   {
04126                         return( TRUE );
04127                   }
04128 //                bSlot++;
04129             } 
04130       }
04131       else
04132       {
04133             // Small items; don't allow stack/dumping for keys right now as that
04134             // would require a bunch of functions for finding the same object by two values...
04135             if ( ubPerSlot > 1 || Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_KEY || Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_MONEY )
04136             {
04137                   // First, look for slots with the same object, and dump into them.
04138                   bSlot = HANDPOS;
04139                   while (1) 
04140                   {
04141                         bSlot = FindObjWithin( pSoldier, pObj->usItem, bSlot, SMALLPOCK8POS );
04142                         if (bSlot == ITEM_NOT_FOUND)
04143                         {
04144                               break;
04145                         }
04146                         if ( bSlot != bExcludeSlot )
04147                         {
04148                               if ( ( (Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_MONEY) && pSoldier->inv[ bSlot ].uiMoneyAmount < MoneySlotLimit( bSlot ) ) || (Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass != IC_MONEY && pSoldier->inv[bSlot].ubNumberOfObjects < ItemSlotLimit( pObj->usItem, bSlot ) ) )
04149                               {
04150                                     // NEW: If in SKI, don't auto-place anything into a stackable slot that's currently hatched out!  Such slots
04151                                     // will disappear in their entirety if sold/moved, causing anything added through here to vanish also!
04152                                     if( !( ( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE ) && ShouldSoldierDisplayHatchOnItem( pSoldier->ubProfile, bSlot ) ) )
04153                                     {
04154                                           PlaceObject( pSoldier, bSlot, pObj );
04155                                           SetNewItem( pSoldier, bSlot, fNewItem );
04156                                           if (pObj->ubNumberOfObjects == 0)
04157                                           {
04158                                                 return( TRUE );
04159                                           }
04160                                     }
04161                               }
04162                         }
04163                         bSlot++;
04164                   }
04165             }
04166             // Search for empty slots to dump into, starting with small pockets
04167             bSlot = SMALLPOCK1POS;
04168             while( 1 )
04169             {
04170                   bSlot = FindEmptySlotWithin( pSoldier, bSlot, SMALLPOCK8POS );
04171                   if (bSlot == ITEM_NOT_FOUND)
04172                   {
04173                         break;
04174                   }
04175                   PlaceObject( pSoldier, bSlot, pObj );
04176                   SetNewItem( pSoldier, bSlot, fNewItem );
04177                   if (pObj->ubNumberOfObjects == 0)
04178                   {
04179                         return( TRUE );
04180                   }
04181                   bSlot++;
04182             }
04183             // now check hands/large pockets
04184             bSlot = HANDPOS;
04185             while (1)         
04186             {
04187                   bSlot = FindEmptySlotWithin( pSoldier, bSlot, BIGPOCK4POS );
04188                   if (bSlot == ITEM_NOT_FOUND)
04189                   {
04190                         break;
04191                   }
04192                   PlaceObject( pSoldier, bSlot, pObj );
04193                   SetNewItem( pSoldier, bSlot, fNewItem );
04194                   if (pObj->ubNumberOfObjects == 0)
04195                   {
04196                         return( TRUE );
04197                   }
04198                   bSlot++;
04199             }
04200       }
04201       return( FALSE );
04202 }
04203 
04204 BOOLEAN AutoPlaceObject( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, OBJECTTYPE * pObj, BOOLEAN fNewItem )
04205 {
04206       return( InternalAutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, pObj, fNewItem, NO_SLOT ) );
04207 }
04208 
04209 BOOLEAN RemoveObjectFromSlot( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT8 bPos, OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
04210 {
04211       CHECKF( pObj );
04212       if (pSoldier->inv[bPos].ubNumberOfObjects == 0)
04213       {
04214             return( FALSE );
04215       }
04216       else
04217       {
04218             memcpy( pObj, &(pSoldier->inv[bPos]), sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
04219             DeleteObj( &(pSoldier->inv[bPos]) );
04220             return( TRUE );
04221       }
04222 }
04223 
04224 BOOLEAN RemoveKeyFromSlot( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT8 bKeyRingPosition, OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
04225 {
04226       UINT8 ubItem = 0;
04227 
04228       CHECKF( pObj );
04229       
04230       if( ( pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubNumber == 0 ) || ( pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubKeyID == INVALID_KEY_NUMBER ) )
04231       {
04232             return( FALSE );
04233       }
04234       else
04235       {
04236             //memcpy( pObj, &(pSoldier->inv[bPos]), sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
04237             
04238             // create an object
04239             ubItem = pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubKeyID;
04240 
04241             if( pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubNumber > 1 )
04242             {
04243                   pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubNumber--;
04244             }
04245             else
04246             {
04247                   
04248                   pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubNumber = 0;
04249                   pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubKeyID = INVALID_KEY_NUMBER;
04250             }
04251 
04252             return( CreateKeyObject( pObj, 1, ubItem ) );
04253       }
04254 
04255       return( FALSE );
04256 }
04257 
04258 
04259 BOOLEAN RemoveKeysFromSlot( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT8 bKeyRingPosition, UINT8 ubNumberOfKeys ,OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
04260 {
04261       UINT8 ubItems = 0;
04262 
04263       CHECKF( pObj );
04264       
04265 
04266       if( ( pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubNumber == 0 ) || ( pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubKeyID == INVALID_KEY_NUMBER ) )
04267       {
04268             return( FALSE );
04269       }
04270       else
04271       {
04272             //memcpy( pObj, &(pSoldier->inv[bPos]), sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
04273             
04274             if( pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubNumber < ubNumberOfKeys )
04275             {
04276                   ubNumberOfKeys = pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubNumber;
04277             }
04278 
04279             
04280             ubItems = pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubKeyID;
04281             if( pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubNumber - ubNumberOfKeys > 0 )
04282             {
04283                   pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubNumber--;
04284             }
04285             else
04286             {
04287                   pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubNumber = 0;
04288                   pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubKeyID = INVALID_KEY_NUMBER;
04289             }
04290 
04291             // create an object
04292             return( CreateKeyObject( pObj, ubNumberOfKeys, ubItems ) );
04293       }
04294 }
04295 
04296 // return number added
04297 UINT8 AddKeysToSlot( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT8 bKeyRingPosition, OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
04298 {
04299       UINT8 ubNumberNotAdded = 0;
04300 
04301       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC ) // redundant but what the hey
04302       {
04303             if ( KeyTable[ pObj->ubKeyID ].usDateFound == 0 )
04304             {
04305                   KeyTable[ pObj->ubKeyID ].usDateFound = (UINT16) GetWorldDay();
04306                   KeyTable[ pObj->ubKeyID ].usSectorFound = SECTOR( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY );
04307             }
04308       }
04309 
04310       // check if we are going to far
04311       if ( ( pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubNumber + pObj->ubNumberOfObjects ) > Item[ pObj->usItem ].ubPerPocket )
04312       {
04313             // only take what we can
04314             ubNumberNotAdded = pObj->ubNumberOfObjects - ( Item[ pObj->usItem ].ubPerPocket - pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubNumber );
04315             
04316             // set to max
04317             pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubNumber = Item[ pObj->usItem ].ubPerPocket; 
04318             
04319             if( pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubNumber == 0 )
04320             {
04321                   pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubKeyID = pObj->ubKeyID;
04322             }
04323 
04324             // return number used
04325             return( pObj->ubNumberOfObjects - ubNumberNotAdded );
04326       }
04327       else 
04328       {
04329             // check 
04330             if( pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubNumber == 0 )
04331             {
04332                   pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubKeyID = pObj->ubKeyID;
04333             }
04334 
04335             pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubNumber += pObj->ubNumberOfObjects;
04336       }
04337 
04338       return( pObj->ubNumberOfObjects );
04339 }
04340 
04341 UINT8 SwapKeysToSlot( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT8 bKeyRingPosition, OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
04342 {
04343       // swap keys in keyring slot and keys in pocket
04344       UINT8 ubNumberNotAdded = 0;
04345       OBJECTTYPE  TempObj;
04346 
04347       // create temp object to hold keys currently in key ring slot
04348       CreateKeyObject( &TempObj, pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubNumber, pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubKeyID );
04349 
04350       pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubNumber = pObj->ubNumberOfObjects;
04351       pSoldier->pKeyRing[ bKeyRingPosition ].ubKeyID = pObj->ubKeyID;
04352       
04353       // swap params?
04354       CopyObj( &TempObj, pObj );
04355 
04356       return( 1 );
04357 }
04358 
04359 
04360 BOOLEAN CreateKeyObject( OBJECTTYPE * pObj , UINT8 ubNumberOfKeys, UINT8 ubKeyID )
04361 {
04362       BOOLEAN fRet;
04363 
04364       fRet = CreateItems( (UINT16) (FIRST_KEY + LockTable[ ubKeyID ].usKeyItem), 100, ubNumberOfKeys, pObj );
04365       if (fRet)
04366       {
04367             pObj->ubKeyID = ubKeyID;
04368       }
04369       //fRet = CreateItems( (UINT16)(ubKeyIdValue + FIRST_KEY) , 100, ubNumberOfKeys, pObj )
04370       //return(  );
04371       return( fRet );
04372 }
04373 
04374 
04375 BOOLEAN AllocateObject( OBJECTTYPE **pObj )
04376 {
04377       // create a key object
04378       *pObj = (OBJECTTYPE *) MemAlloc( sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
04379       Assert( pObj );
04380 
04381       return( TRUE );
04382 }
04383 
04384 BOOLEAN DeleteKeyObject( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
04385 {
04386       if( pObj == FALSE )
04387       {
04388             return( FALSE );
04389       }
04390 
04391       // free up space
04392       MemFree( pObj );
04393 
04394       return( TRUE );
04395 }
04396 
04397 UINT16 TotalPoints( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
04398 {
04399       UINT16      usPoints = 0;
04400       UINT8       ubLoop;
04401 
04402       for (ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < pObj->ubNumberOfObjects; ubLoop++)
04403       {
04404             usPoints += pObj->bStatus[ubLoop];
04405       }
04406       return( usPoints );
04407 }
04408 
04409 UINT16 UseKitPoints( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, UINT16 usPoints, SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
04410 {
04411       // start consuming from the last kit in, so we end up with fewer fuller kits rather than
04412       // lots of half-empty ones.
04413       INT8        bLoop;
04414       UINT16 usOriginalPoints = usPoints;
04415 
04416       for (bLoop = pObj->ubNumberOfObjects - 1; bLoop >= 0; bLoop--)
04417       {
04418             if (Item[pObj->usItem].percentstatusdrainreduction  > 0 && ((usPoints * (100 - Item[pObj->usItem].percentstatusdrainreduction))/100) < pObj->bStatus[bLoop] )
04419             {
04420                   pObj->bStatus[bLoop] -= (INT8) ((usPoints * (100 - Item[pObj->usItem].percentstatusdrainreduction ) )/100);
04421                   return( usOriginalPoints );
04422             }
04423             else if (usPoints < (UINT16) pObj->bStatus[bLoop])
04424             {
04425                   pObj->bStatus[bLoop] -= (INT8) usPoints;
04426                   return( usOriginalPoints );
04427             }
04428             else
04429             {
04430                   // consume this kit totally
04431                   usPoints -= pObj->bStatus[bLoop];
04432                   pObj->bStatus[bLoop] = 0;
04433 
04434                   pObj->ubNumberOfObjects--;
04435             }
04436       }
04437 
04438       // check if pocket/hand emptied..update inventory, then update panel
04439       if( pObj->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
04440       {
04441             // Delete object
04442             DeleteObj( pObj );
04443 
04444             // dirty interface panel
04445             DirtyMercPanelInterface(  pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
04446       }
04447 
04448       return( usOriginalPoints -  usPoints );
04449 }
04450

04472       extern UINT32 guiRedSeekTimeTotal, guiRedHelpTimeTotal, guiRedHideTimeTotal;
04473       extern UINT32 guiRedSeekCounter, guiRedHelpCounter; guiRedHideCounter;

04496                         }

04498                         {
04499                               DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "%S", ItemNames[ MercSlots[ uiLoop ]->inv[ HEAD2POS ].usItem ] ) );
04500                         }
04501 
04502                   }
04503             }
04504             */
04505

04507

04530                         case HISTORY_KEITH:
04531                         case HISTORY_HOWARD:
04532                         case HISTORY_PERKO:

04535                         case HISTORY_ARNOLD:

04537                         case HISTORY_RICHGUY_BALIME:
04538                         case HISTORY_JAKE:
04539                         case HISTORY_BUM_KEYCARD:
04540                         case HISTORY_WALTER:

04548                         case HISTORY_WONBATTLE:

04555                         case HISTORY_SLAUGHTEREDBLOODCATS:
04556                         case HISTORY_GAVE_CARMEN_HEAD:

04558                               AddHistoryToPlayersLog( (UINT8) uiLoop, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
04559                               break;

04562                   }

04577                         {

04579                         }
04580                   }
04581             }
04582             */

04585 
04586             for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop <= 4; uiLoop++ )
04587             {
04588                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Team %d has %d people", uiLoop, gTacticalStatus.Team[ uiLoop ].bMenInSector );
04589             }
04590             */
04591       /*
04592             UINT32      uiLoop;
04593             INT16       sGridNo;
04594             UINT32      uiStartTime, uiEndTime;
04595 
04596             if (GetMouseMapPos( &sGridNo ))
04597             {
04598                   uiStartTime = GetJA2Clock();
04599                   for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < 50000; uiLoop++)
04600                   {
04601                         FindBestPath( pSoldier, sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, WALKING, COPYROUTE );
04602                   }
04603                   uiEndTime = GetJA2Clock();
04604                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "50000 path calls from %d to %d took %ld ms", pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo, uiEndTime - uiStartTime ) );
04605             }
04606             */
04607       }
04608 #endif
04609 
04610 
04611 UINT16 MagazineClassIndexToItemType(UINT16 usMagIndex)
04612 {
04613       UINT16                        usLoop;
04614 
04615       // Note: if any ammo items in the item table are separated from the main group,
04616       // this function will have to be rewritten to scan the item table for an item
04617       // with item class ammo, which has class index usMagIndex
04618       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "MagazineClassIndexToItemType" ) );
04619       for (usLoop = FIRST_AMMO; usLoop < MAXITEMS; usLoop++)  
04620       {
04621             if ( Item[usLoop].usItemClass  == 0 )
04622             {
04623                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "MagazineClassIndexToItemType: breaking at index %d", usLoop ) );
04624                   break;
04625             }
04626             if (Item[usLoop].ubClassIndex == usMagIndex && Item[usLoop].usItemClass == IC_AMMO )
04627             {
04628                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "MagazineClassIndexToItemType: return %d", usLoop ) );
04629                   return( usLoop );
04630             }
04631       }
04632 
04633       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "MagazineClassIndexToItemType: return none, got to %d", usLoop ) );
04634       return(NONE);
04635 }
04636 
04637 
04638 UINT16 DefaultMagazine( UINT16 usItem )
04639 {
04640       WEAPONTYPE *      pWeapon;
04641       UINT16                        usLoop;
04642 
04643       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("DefaultMagazine: item = %d",usItem));
04644       if (!(Item[usItem].usItemClass & IC_GUN))
04645       {
04646             return( 0 );
04647       }
04648 
04649       pWeapon = &(Weapon[usItem]);
04650       usLoop = 0;
04651       while ( Magazine[usLoop].ubCalibre != NOAMMO )
04652       {
04653             if (Magazine[usLoop].ubCalibre == pWeapon->ubCalibre &&
04654                         Magazine[usLoop].ubMagSize == pWeapon->ubMagSize &&
04655                         AmmoTypes[ Magazine[usLoop].ubAmmoType ].standardIssue )
04656             {
04657                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("DefaultMagazine: found at index %d",usLoop));
04658                   return(MagazineClassIndexToItemType(usLoop));
04659             }
04660 
04661             usLoop++;
04662       }
04663 
04664       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("DefaultMagazine: can't find any"));
04665       return( 0 );
04666 }
04667 
04668 UINT16 FindReplacementMagazine( UINT8 ubCalibre, UINT8 ubMagSize, UINT8 ubAmmoType )
04669 {
04670       UINT16 usLoop;
04671       UINT16 usDefault;
04672       
04673       usLoop = 0;
04674       usDefault = NOTHING;
04675       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("FindReplacementMagazine: calibre = %d, Mag size = %d, ammo type = %d",ubCalibre,ubMagSize,ubAmmoType));
04676 
04677       while ( Magazine[usLoop].ubCalibre != NOAMMO )
04678       {
04679             if (Magazine[usLoop].ubCalibre == ubCalibre &&
04680                         Magazine[usLoop].ubMagSize == ubMagSize )
04681             {
04682                   if ( Magazine[usLoop].ubAmmoType == ubAmmoType )
04683                   {
04684                         DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("FindReplacementMagazine: returning item = %d",MagazineClassIndexToItemType( usLoop )));
04685                         return( MagazineClassIndexToItemType( usLoop ) );
04686                   }
04687                   else if ( usDefault == NOTHING )
04688                   {
04689                         // store this one to use if all else fails
04690                         usDefault = MagazineClassIndexToItemType( usLoop );
04691                   }
04692                   
04693             }
04694 
04695             usLoop++;
04696       }
04697 
04698       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("FindReplacementMagazine: returning default item = %d",usDefault));
04699       return( usDefault );
04700 
04701 }
04702 
04703 UINT16 FindReplacementMagazineIfNecessary( UINT16 usOldGun, UINT16 usOldAmmo, UINT16 usNewGun )
04704 {
04705       UINT16 usNewAmmo = NOTHING;
04706 
04707       if ( (Magazine[ Item[ usOldAmmo ].ubClassIndex ].ubCalibre == Weapon[ usOldGun ].ubCalibre) &&
04708                    (Magazine[ Item[ usOldAmmo ].ubClassIndex ].ubMagSize == Weapon[ usOldGun ].ubMagSize) )
04709       {
04710             // must replace this!
04711             usNewAmmo = FindReplacementMagazine( Weapon[ usNewGun ].ubCalibre, Weapon[ usNewGun ].ubMagSize, Magazine[ Item[ usOldAmmo ].ubClassIndex ].ubAmmoType );
04712       }
04713 
04714       return( usNewAmmo );
04715 }
04716 
04717 // increase this if any gun can have more types that this
04718 #define MAX_AMMO_TYPES_PER_GUN            24  // MADD MARKER
04719 
04720 UINT16 RandomMagazine( UINT16 usItem, UINT8 ubPercentStandard )
04721 {
04722       // Note: if any ammo items in the item table are separated from the main group,
04723       // this function will have to be rewritten to scan the item table for an item
04724       // with item class ammo, which has class index ubLoop
04725       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("RandomMagazine (by index)"));
04726 
04727       WEAPONTYPE *      pWeapon;
04728       UINT16                        usLoop;
04729       UINT16                        usPossibleMagIndex[ MAX_AMMO_TYPES_PER_GUN ];
04730       UINT16                        usPossibleMagCnt = 0;
04731       UINT8                         ubMagChosen;
04732 
04733       if (!(Item[usItem].usItemClass & IC_GUN))
04734       {
04735             return( 0 );
04736       }
04737 
04738       pWeapon = &(Weapon[usItem]);
04739 
04740       // find & store all possible mag types that fit this gun
04741       usLoop = 0;
04742       while ( Magazine[ usLoop ].ubCalibre != NOAMMO )
04743       {
04744             if (Magazine[usLoop].ubCalibre == pWeapon->ubCalibre &&
04745                         Magazine[usLoop].ubMagSize == pWeapon->ubMagSize && ItemIsLegal(MagazineClassIndexToItemType(usLoop)))
04746             {
04747                   // store it! (make sure array is big enough)
04748                   Assert(usPossibleMagCnt < MAX_AMMO_TYPES_PER_GUN);
04749                   // Madd: check to see if allowed by army
04750                   if ( gArmyItemChoices[ENEMYAMMOTYPES].ubChoices > 0 )
04751                   {
04752                         for ( int i=0;i<gArmyItemChoices[ENEMYAMMOTYPES].ubChoices;i++ )
04753                         {
04754                               if ( gArmyItemChoices[ENEMYAMMOTYPES].bItemNo[i] == Magazine[usLoop].ubAmmoType )
04755                               {
04756                                     usPossibleMagIndex[usPossibleMagCnt++] = usLoop;
04757                                     break;
04758                               }
04759                         }
04760                   }
04761                   else
04762                   {
04763                         usPossibleMagIndex[usPossibleMagCnt++] = usLoop;
04764                   }
04765             }
04766 
04767             usLoop++;
04768       }
04769 
04770       // no matches?
04771       if (usPossibleMagCnt == 0)
04772       {
04773             return( 0 );
04774       }
04775       else
04776       // only one match?
04777       if (usPossibleMagCnt == 1)
04778       {
04779             // use that, no choice
04780             return(MagazineClassIndexToItemType( usPossibleMagIndex[ 0 ] ));
04781       }
04782       else  // multiple choices
04783       {
04784             // Pick one at random, using supplied probability to pick the default
04785             if (Random(100) < ubPercentStandard)
04786             {
04787                   ubMagChosen = 0;
04788                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("RandomMagazine: ubMagChosen = %d",ubMagChosen ));
04789                   return( DefaultMagazine(usItem) );
