04790             }
04791             else
04792             {
04793                   // pick a non-standard type instead
04794                   ubMagChosen = ( UINT8 ) (1 + Random(( UINT32 ) ( usPossibleMagCnt - 1 )));
04795             }
04796 
04797             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("RandomMagazine: ubMagChosen = %d",ubMagChosen ));
04798             return( MagazineClassIndexToItemType(usPossibleMagIndex[ ubMagChosen ] ) );
04799       }
04800 }
04801 
04802 UINT16 RandomMagazine( OBJECTTYPE * pGun, UINT8 ubPercentStandard )
04803 {
04804       // Note: if any ammo items in the item table are separated from the main group,
04805       // this function will have to be rewritten to scan the item table for an item
04806       // with item class ammo, which has class index ubLoop
04807       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("RandomMagazine"));
04808 
04809       WEAPONTYPE *      pWeapon;
04810       UINT16                        usLoop;
04811       UINT16                        usPossibleMagIndex[ MAX_AMMO_TYPES_PER_GUN ];
04812       UINT16                        usPossibleMagCnt = 0;
04813       UINT8                         ubMagChosen;
04814 
04815       if (!(Item[pGun->usItem].usItemClass & IC_GUN))
04816       {
04817             return( 0 );
04818       }
04819 
04820       pWeapon = &(Weapon[pGun->usItem]);
04821 
04822       // find & store all possible mag types that fit this gun
04823       usLoop = 0;
04824       while ( Magazine[ usLoop ].ubCalibre != NOAMMO )
04825       {
04826             if (Magazine[usLoop].ubCalibre == pWeapon->ubCalibre &&
04827                         Magazine[usLoop].ubMagSize == GetMagSize(pGun) && ItemIsLegal(MagazineClassIndexToItemType(usLoop)))
04828             {
04829                   // store it! (make sure array is big enough)
04830                   Assert(usPossibleMagCnt < MAX_AMMO_TYPES_PER_GUN);
04831                   // Madd: check to see if allowed by army
04832                   if ( gArmyItemChoices[ENEMYAMMOTYPES].ubChoices > 0 )
04833                   {
04834                         for ( int i=0;i<gArmyItemChoices[ENEMYAMMOTYPES].ubChoices;i++ )
04835                         {
04836                               if ( gArmyItemChoices[ENEMYAMMOTYPES].bItemNo[i] == Magazine[usLoop].ubAmmoType )
04837                               {
04838                                     usPossibleMagIndex[usPossibleMagCnt++] = usLoop;
04839                                     break;
04840                               }
04841                         }
04842                   }
04843                   else
04844                   {
04845                         usPossibleMagIndex[usPossibleMagCnt++] = usLoop;
04846                   }
04847             }
04848 
04849             usLoop++;
04850       }
04851 
04852       // no matches?
04853       if (usPossibleMagCnt == 0)
04854       {
04855             return( 0 );
04856       }
04857       else
04858       // only one match?
04859       if (usPossibleMagCnt == 1)
04860       {
04861             // use that, no choice
04862             return(MagazineClassIndexToItemType(usPossibleMagIndex[ 0 ] ));
04863       }
04864       else  // multiple choices
04865       {
04866             // Pick one at random, using supplied probability to pick the default
04867             if (Random(100) < ubPercentStandard)
04868             {
04869                   ubMagChosen = 0;
04870                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("RandomMagazine: ubMagChosen = %d",ubMagChosen ));
04871                   return( DefaultMagazine(pGun->usItem) );
04872             }
04873             else
04874             {
04875                   // pick a non-standard type instead
04876                   ubMagChosen = ( UINT8 ) (1 + Random(( UINT32 ) ( usPossibleMagCnt - 1 )));
04877             }
04878 
04879             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("RandomMagazine: ubMagChosen = %d",ubMagChosen ));
04880             return( MagazineClassIndexToItemType(usPossibleMagIndex[ ubMagChosen ] ) );
04881       }
04882 }
04883 
04884 BOOLEAN CreateGun( UINT16 usItem, INT8 bStatus, OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
04885 {
04886       UINT16 usAmmo;
04887       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CreateGun: usItem = %d",usItem));
04888 
04889 
04890       Assert( pObj != NULL);
04891       if ( pObj == NULL )
04892       {
04893             return( FALSE );
04894       }
04895 
04896       memset( pObj, 0, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
04897       pObj->usItem = usItem;
04898       pObj->ubNumberOfObjects = 1;
04899       pObj->bGunStatus = bStatus;
04900       pObj->ubImprintID = NO_PROFILE;
04901       pObj->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( pObj );
04902 
04903       if (Weapon[ usItem ].ubWeaponClass == MONSTERCLASS)
04904       {
04905             pObj->ubGunShotsLeft = GetMagSize(pObj);
04906             pObj->ubGunAmmoType = AMMO_MONSTER;
04907       }
04908       else if ( EXPLOSIVE_GUN( usItem ) )
04909       {
04910             if ( Item[usItem].singleshotrocketlauncher ) 
04911             {
04912                   pObj->ubGunShotsLeft = 1;
04913             }
04914             else
04915             {
04916                   // cannon
04917                   pObj->ubGunShotsLeft = 0;
04918             }
04919             pObj->bGunAmmoStatus = 100;
04920             pObj->ubGunAmmoType = 0;
04921       }
04922       else
04923       {
04924             usAmmo = DefaultMagazine( usItem );
04925             Assert( usAmmo != 0 );
04926             if (usAmmo == 0)
04927             {
04928                   // item's calibre & mag size not found in magazine list!
04929                   return( FALSE );
04930             }
04931             else
04932             {
04933                   pObj->usGunAmmoItem = usAmmo;
04934                   pObj->ubGunAmmoType = Magazine[ Item[ usAmmo ].ubClassIndex].ubAmmoType;
04935                   pObj->bGunAmmoStatus = 100;
04936                   pObj->ubGunShotsLeft = Magazine[ Item[ usAmmo ].ubClassIndex ].ubMagSize;
04937                   pObj->ubGunState |= GS_CARTRIDGE_IN_CHAMBER; // Madd: new guns should have cartridge in chamber
04938                   /*
04939                   if (usItem == CAWS)
04940                   {
04941                         pObj->usAttachItem[0] = DUCKBILL;
04942                         pObj->bAttachStatus[0] = 100;
04943                   }
04944                   */
04945             }
04946       }
04947 
04948       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CreateGun: Done"));
04949       // succesful
04950       return( TRUE );
04951 }
04952 
04953 BOOLEAN CreateMagazine( UINT16 usItem, OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
04954 {
04955       if (pObj == NULL)
04956       {
04957             return( FALSE );
04958       }
04959       memset( pObj, 0, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
04960       pObj->usItem = usItem;
04961       pObj->ubNumberOfObjects = 1;
04962       pObj->ubShotsLeft[0] = Magazine[ Item[usItem].ubClassIndex ].ubMagSize;
04963       pObj->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( pObj );
04964       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CreateMagazine: done"));
04965 
04966       return( TRUE );
04967 }
04968 
04969 BOOLEAN CreateItem( UINT16 usItem, INT8 bStatus, OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
04970 {
04971       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CreateItem: usItem = %d",usItem));
04972       BOOLEAN fRet;
04973 
04974       memset( pObj, 0, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
04975       if (usItem >= MAXITEMS)
04976       {
04977             return( FALSE );
04978       }
04979       if (Item[ usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN)
04980       {
04981             fRet = CreateGun( usItem, bStatus, pObj );
04982       }
04983       else if (Item[ usItem ].usItemClass == IC_AMMO)
04984       {
04985             fRet = CreateMagazine( usItem, pObj );          
04986       }
04987       else
04988       {
04989             pObj->usItem = usItem;
04990             pObj->ubNumberOfObjects = 1;
04991             if (usItem == MONEY || Item[usItem].usItemClass == IC_MONEY )
04992             {
04993                   // special case... always set status to 100 when creating
04994                   // and use status value to determine amount!
04995                   pObj->bStatus[0] = 100;
04996                   pObj->uiMoneyAmount = bStatus * 50;
04997             }
04998             else
04999             {
05000                   pObj->bStatus[0] = bStatus;
05001             }
05002             pObj->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( pObj );
05003             fRet = TRUE;
05004       }
05005       if (fRet)
05006       {
05007 //          if (Item[ usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_DEFAULT_UNDROPPABLE)
05008             if (Item[ usItem ].defaultundroppable )
05009             {
05010                   pObj->fFlags |= OBJECT_UNDROPPABLE;
05011             }
05012             if (Item [ usItem ].defaultattachment > 0 )
05013             {
05014                   OBJECTTYPE Temp;
05015                   CreateItem(Item [ usItem ].defaultattachment,100,&Temp);
05016                   AttachObject(NULL,pObj,&Temp);
05017             }
05018       }
05019 
05020 
05021       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CreateItem: return %d",fRet));
05022       return( fRet );
05023 }
05024 
05025 BOOLEAN CreateItems( UINT16 usItem, INT8 bStatus, UINT8 ubNumber, OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
05026 {
05027       BOOLEAN fOk;
05028       UINT8       ubLoop;
05029 
05030       // can't create any more than this, the loop for setting the bStatus[] of others will overwrite memory!
05031       Assert( ubNumber <= MAX_OBJECTS_PER_SLOT );
05032 
05033       // ARM: to avoid whacking memory once Assertions are removed...  Items will be lost in this situation!
05034       if ( ubNumber > MAX_OBJECTS_PER_SLOT )
05035       {
05036             ubNumber = MAX_OBJECTS_PER_SLOT;
05037       }
05038 
05039       fOk = CreateItem( usItem, bStatus, pObj );
05040       if (fOk)
05041       {
05042             for (ubLoop = 1; ubLoop < ubNumber; ubLoop++)   
05043             {
05044                   // we reference status[0] here because the status value might actually be a
05045                   // # of rounds of ammo, in which case the value won't be the bStatus value 
05046                   // passed in.
05047                   pObj->bStatus[ubLoop] = pObj->bStatus[0];
05048             }
05049             pObj->ubNumberOfObjects = ubNumber;
05050             pObj->ubWeight *= ubNumber;
05051             return( TRUE );
05052       }
05053       return( FALSE );
05054 }
05055 
05056 BOOLEAN CreateMoney( UINT32 uiMoney, OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
05057 {
05058       BOOLEAN fOk; 
05059 
05060       fOk = CreateItem( MONEY, 100, pObj );
05061       if (fOk)
05062       {
05063             pObj->uiMoneyAmount = uiMoney;
05064       }
05065       return( fOk );
05066 }
05067 
05068 BOOLEAN ArmBomb( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, INT8 bSetting )
05069 {
05070       BOOLEAN fRemote = FALSE;
05071       BOOLEAN fPressure = FALSE;
05072       BOOLEAN fTimed = FALSE;
05073       BOOLEAN     fSwitch = FALSE;
05074 
05075       if (pObj->usItem == ACTION_ITEM)
05076       {
05077             switch( pObj->bActionValue )
05078             {
05079                   case ACTION_ITEM_SMALL_PIT:
05080                   case ACTION_ITEM_LARGE_PIT:
05081                         fPressure = TRUE;
05082                         break;
05083                   default:
05084                         fRemote = TRUE;
05085                         break;
05086 
05087             }
05088       }
05089       else if ( IsDetonatorAttached( pObj ) )
05090       {
05091             fTimed = TRUE;
05092       }
05093       else if ( (IsRemoteDetonatorAttached( pObj ) ) || (pObj->usItem == ACTION_ITEM) )
05094       {
05095             fRemote = TRUE;
05096       }
05097       else if ( Item[pObj->usItem].mine || pObj->usItem == TRIP_FLARE || pObj->usItem == TRIP_KLAXON || pObj->usItem == ACTION_ITEM )
05098       {
05099             fPressure = TRUE;
05100       }
05101       else if ( pObj->usItem == SWITCH )
05102       {
05103             // this makes a remote detonator into a pressure-sensitive trigger
05104             if ( bSetting == PANIC_FREQUENCY )
05105             {
05106                   // panic trigger is only activated by expending APs, not by
05107                   // stepping on it... so don't define a detonator type
05108                   fSwitch = TRUE;
05109             }
05110             else
05111             {
05112                   fPressure = TRUE;
05113             }
05114       }
05115       else
05116       {
05117             // no sorta bomb at all!
05118             return( FALSE );
05119       }
05120 
05121       if (fRemote)
05122       {
05123             pObj->bDetonatorType = BOMB_REMOTE;
05124             pObj->bFrequency = bSetting;
05125       }
05126       else if (fPressure)
05127       {
05128             pObj->bDetonatorType = BOMB_PRESSURE;
05129             pObj->bFrequency = 0;
05130       }
05131       else if (fTimed)
05132       {
05133             pObj->bDetonatorType = BOMB_TIMED;
05134             // In realtime the player could choose to put down a bomb right before a turn expires, SO
05135             // add 1 to the setting in RT
05136             pObj->bDelay = bSetting;
05137             if ( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
05138             {
05139                   pObj->bDelay++;
05140             }
05141 
05142       }
05143       else if (fSwitch)
05144       {
05145             pObj->bDetonatorType = BOMB_SWITCH;
05146             pObj->bFrequency = bSetting;
05147       }
05148       else
05149       {
05150             return( FALSE );
05151       }
05152 
05153       pObj->fFlags |= OBJECT_ARMED_BOMB;
05154       pObj->usBombItem = pObj->usItem;
05155       return( TRUE );
05156 }
05157 
05158 void RenumberAttachments( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
05159 {
05160       // loop through attachment positions and make sure we don't have any empty
05161       // attachment slots before filled ones
05162       INT8              bAttachPos;
05163       INT8              bFirstSpace;
05164       BOOLEAN           fDone = FALSE;
05165 
05166       while (!fDone)
05167       {
05168             bFirstSpace = -1;
05169             for (bAttachPos = 0; bAttachPos < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bAttachPos++)
05170             {
05171                   if (pObj->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ] == NOTHING)
05172                   {
05173                         if (bFirstSpace == -1)
05174                         {
05175                               bFirstSpace = bAttachPos;
05176                         }
05177                   }
05178                   else
05179                   {
05180                         if (bFirstSpace != -1)
05181                         {
05182                               // move the attachment!
05183                               pObj->usAttachItem[ bFirstSpace ] = pObj->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ];
05184                               pObj->bAttachStatus[ bFirstSpace ] = pObj->bAttachStatus[ bAttachPos ];
05185                               pObj->usAttachItem[ bAttachPos ] = NOTHING;
05186                               pObj->bAttachStatus[ bAttachPos ] = 0;                      
05187                               // restart loop at beginning, or quit if we reached the end of the
05188                               // attachments
05189                               break;
05190                         }
05191                   }
05192             }
05193             if (bAttachPos == MAX_ATTACHMENTS)
05194             {
05195                   // done!!
05196                   fDone = TRUE;
05197             }
05198       }
05199 
05200 }
05201 
05202 BOOLEAN RemoveAttachment( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, INT8 bAttachPos, OBJECTTYPE * pNewObj )
05203 {
05204       INT8        bGrenade;
05205 
05206       CHECKF( pObj );
05207       
05208       if (bAttachPos < 0 || bAttachPos >= MAX_ATTACHMENTS)
05209       {
05210             return( FALSE );
05211       }
05212       if (pObj->usAttachItem[bAttachPos] == NOTHING )
05213       {
05214             return( FALSE );
05215       }
05216 
05217 //    if ( Item[ pObj->usAttachItem[bAttachPos] ].fFlags & ITEM_INSEPARABLE )
05218       if ( Item[ pObj->usAttachItem[bAttachPos] ].inseparable  )
05219       {
05220             return( FALSE );
05221       }
05222 
05223       // if pNewObj is passed in NULL, then we just delete the attachment
05224       if (pNewObj != NULL)
05225       {
05226             CreateItem( pObj->usAttachItem[bAttachPos], pObj->bAttachStatus[bAttachPos], pNewObj );
05227       }
05228 
05229       pObj->usAttachItem[bAttachPos] = NOTHING;
05230       pObj->bAttachStatus[bAttachPos] = 0;
05231       
05232       if (pNewObj && Item[pNewObj->usItem].grenadelauncher )//UNDER_GLAUNCHER)
05233       {
05234             // look for any grenade; if it exists, we must make it an 
05235             // attachment of the grenade launcher
05236             bGrenade = FindAttachmentByClass( pObj, IC_GRENADE );
05237             if (bGrenade != ITEM_NOT_FOUND)
05238             {
05239                   pNewObj->usAttachItem[0] = pObj->usAttachItem[bGrenade];
05240                   pNewObj->bAttachStatus[0] = pObj->bAttachStatus[bGrenade];
05241                   pObj->usAttachItem[bGrenade] = NOTHING;
05242                   pObj->bAttachStatus[bGrenade] = 0;
05243                   pNewObj->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( pNewObj );
05244             }
05245       }
05246 
05247       RenumberAttachments( pObj );
05248 
05249       pObj->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( pObj );
05250       return( TRUE );
05251 }
05252 
05253 void SetNewItem( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubInvPos, BOOLEAN fNewItem )
05254 {
05255       if( fNewItem )
05256       {
05257             pSoldier->bNewItemCount[ ubInvPos ]                                = -1;
05258             pSoldier->bNewItemCycleCount[ ubInvPos ]               = NEW_ITEM_CYCLE_COUNT;
05259             pSoldier->fCheckForNewlyAddedItems             = TRUE;
05260       }
05261 }
05262 
05263 
05264 BOOLEAN PlaceObjectInSoldierProfile( UINT8 ubProfile, OBJECTTYPE *pObject )
05265 {
05266       INT8                    bLoop, bLoop2;
05267       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
05268       UINT16                  usItem;
05269       INT8                    bStatus;
05270       BOOLEAN                 fReturnVal = FALSE;
05271 
05272       usItem      = pObject->usItem;
05273       bStatus = pObject->bStatus[0];
05274       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubProfile, FALSE );
05275 
05276       if ( Item[ usItem ].usItemClass == IC_MONEY && gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].uiMoney > 0 )
05277       {
05278             gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].uiMoney += pObject->uiMoneyAmount;
05279             SetMoneyInSoldierProfile( ubProfile, gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].uiMoney );
05280             return( TRUE );
05281       }
05282 
05283       for (bLoop = BIGPOCK1POS; bLoop < SMALLPOCK8POS; bLoop++)
05284       {
05285             if ( gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].bInvNumber[ bLoop ] == 0 && (pSoldier == NULL || pSoldier->inv[ bLoop ].usItem == NOTHING ) )
05286             {
05287 
05288                   // CJC: Deal with money by putting money into # stored in profile
05289                   if ( Item[ usItem ].usItemClass == IC_MONEY )
05290                   {
05291                         gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].uiMoney += pObject->uiMoneyAmount;
05292                         // change any gold/silver to money
05293                         usItem = MONEY;
05294                   }
05295                   else
05296                   {
05297                         gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].inv[ bLoop ] = usItem;
05298                         gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].bInvStatus[ bLoop ] = bStatus;
05299                         gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].bInvNumber[ bLoop ] = pObject->ubNumberOfObjects;  
05300                   }
05301 
05302                   fReturnVal = TRUE;
05303                   break;
05304             }
05305       }
05306 
05307       //uiMoneyAmount
05308       if ( fReturnVal )
05309       {
05310             // ATE: Manage soldier pointer as well....
05311             //pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubProfile, FALSE );
05312 
05313             // Do we have a valid profile?
05314             if ( pSoldier != NULL )
05315             {
05316                   // OK, place in soldier...
05317                   if ( usItem == MONEY )
05318                   {
05319                         CreateMoney( gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].uiMoney, &(pSoldier->inv[ bLoop ] ) );
05320                   }
05321                   else
05322                   {
05323                         if ( pSoldier->ubProfile == MADLAB )
05324                         {
05325                               // remove attachments and drop them
05326                               OBJECTTYPE              Attachment;
05327 
05328                               for ( bLoop2 = MAX_ATTACHMENTS - 1; bLoop2 >= 0; bLoop2-- )
05329                               {
05330                                     // remove also checks for existence attachment
05331                                     if ( RemoveAttachment( pObject, bLoop2, &Attachment ) == TRUE )
05332                                     {
05333                                           // drop it in Madlab's tile
05334                                           AddItemToPool( pSoldier->sGridNo, &Attachment, 1, 0, 0, 0 );
05335                                     }
05336                               }
05337                         }
05338 
05339                         CreateItem( usItem, bStatus, &(pSoldier->inv[ bLoop ] ) );
05340                   }
05341             }
05342       }
05343 
05344       return( fReturnVal );
05345 }
05346 
05347 BOOLEAN RemoveObjectFromSoldierProfile( UINT8 ubProfile, UINT16 usItem )
05348 {
05349       INT8 bLoop;
05350       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
05351       BOOLEAN     fReturnVal = FALSE;
05352 
05353       if ( usItem == NOTHING )
05354       {
05355             return( TRUE );
05356       }
05357 
05358       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < 19; bLoop++)
05359       {
05360             if ( gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].inv[ bLoop ] == usItem )
05361             {
05362                   gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].inv[ bLoop ] = NOTHING;
05363                   gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].bInvStatus[ bLoop ] = 0;
05364                   gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].bInvNumber[ bLoop ] = 0;                     
05365 
05366                   fReturnVal = TRUE;
05367                   break;
05368             }
05369       }
05370 
05371       // ATE: Manage soldier pointer as well....
05372       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubProfile, FALSE );
05373 
05374       // Do we have a valid profile?
05375       if ( pSoldier != NULL )
05376       {
05377             // Remove item...
05378             RemoveInvObject( pSoldier, usItem );
05379       }
05380 
05381       return( fReturnVal );
05382 }
05383 
05384 
05385 void SetMoneyInSoldierProfile( UINT8 ubProfile, UINT32 uiMoney )
05386 {
05387       //INT8                                    bSlot;
05388       OBJECTTYPE              Object;
05389       //SOLDIERTYPE *         pSoldier;
05390       BOOLEAN                             fRet;
05391 
05392       // remove all money from soldier    
05393       do
05394       {
05395             fRet = RemoveObjectFromSoldierProfile( ubProfile, MONEY );
05396       }
05397       while ( fRet == TRUE );
05398 
05399       gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].uiMoney = 0;
05400 
05401       if (uiMoney > 0)
05402       {
05403             // now add the amount specified
05404             CreateMoney( uiMoney, &Object );
05405             PlaceObjectInSoldierProfile( ubProfile, &Object );
05406       }
05407 }
05408 
05409 INT8 FindObjectInSoldierProfile( UINT8 ubProfile, UINT16 usItem )
05410 {
05411       INT8  bLoop;
05412 
05413       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < 19; bLoop++)
05414       {
05415             if ( gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].bInvNumber[ bLoop ] > 0 )
05416             {
05417                   if ( gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].inv[ bLoop ] == usItem )
05418                   {
05419                         return( bLoop );
05420                   }
05421             }
05422       }
05423       return( NO_SLOT );
05424 }
05425 
05426 BOOLEAN ObjectExistsInSoldierProfile( UINT8 ubProfile, UINT16 usItem )
05427 {
05428       INT8  bSlot;
05429 
05430       bSlot = FindObjectInSoldierProfile( ubProfile, usItem );
05431       return( bSlot != NO_SLOT );
05432 }
05433 
05434 void RemoveInvObject( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usItem )
05435 {
05436       INT8 bInvPos;
05437 
05438       // find object
05439       bInvPos = FindObj( pSoldier, usItem );
05440       if (bInvPos != NO_SLOT)
05441       {
05442 
05443             // Erase!
05444             memset( &(pSoldier->inv[ bInvPos ]), 0, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
05445 
05446             //Dirty!
05447             DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
05448       }
05449 
05450 }
05451 
05452 INT8 CheckItemForDamage( UINT16 usItem, INT32 iMaxDamage )
05453 {
05454       INT8  bDamage = 0;
05455 
05456       // if the item is protective armour, reduce the amount of damage
05457       // by its armour value
05458       if (Item[usItem].usItemClass == IC_ARMOUR)
05459       {
05460             iMaxDamage -= (iMaxDamage * Armour[Item[usItem].ubClassIndex].ubProtection) / 100;
05461       }
05462       // metal items are tough and will be damaged less
05463 //    if (Item[usItem].fFlags & ITEM_METAL)
05464       if (Item[usItem].metal )
05465       {
05466             iMaxDamage /= 2;
05467       }
05468       else if ( usItem == BLOODCAT_PELT )
05469       {
05470             iMaxDamage *= 2;
05471       }
05472       if (iMaxDamage > 0)
05473       {
05474             bDamage = (INT8) PreRandom( iMaxDamage );
05475       }
05476       return( bDamage );
05477 }
05478 
05479 BOOLEAN CheckForChainReaction( UINT16 usItem, INT8 bStatus, INT8 bDamage, BOOLEAN fOnGround )
05480 {
05481       INT32 iChance;
05482 
05483       iChance = Explosive[Item[usItem].ubClassIndex].ubVolatility;
05484       if (iChance > 0)
05485       {
05486             
05487             // Scale the base chance by the damage caused to the item
05488             // (bigger the shock, bigger chance) and the condition of 
05489             // the item after being hit!
05490             if (fOnGround)
05491             {
05492                   // improve chance to make it practical to blow up explosives on the ground
05493                   iChance = 50 + (iChance - 1) * 10;
05494             }
05495 
05496             iChance = iChance * ( 100 + ( (100 - bStatus) + bDamage ) / 2 ) / 100;
05497             if ((INT32) PreRandom( 100 ) < iChance)
05498             {
05499                   return( TRUE );
05500             }
05501       }
05502       return( FALSE );
05503 }
05504 
05505 BOOLEAN DamageItem( OBJECTTYPE * pObject, INT32 iDamage, BOOLEAN fOnGround )
05506 {
05507       INT8        bLoop;
05508       INT8        bDamage;
05509 
05510 //    if ( (Item[pObject->usItem].fFlags & ITEM_DAMAGEABLE || Item[ pObject->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_AMMO) && pObject->ubNumberOfObjects > 0)
05511       if ( (Item[pObject->usItem].damageable  || Item[ pObject->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_AMMO) && pObject->ubNumberOfObjects > 0)
05512       {
05513 
05514             for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < pObject->ubNumberOfObjects; bLoop++)
05515             {
05516                   // if the status of the item is negative then it's trapped/jammed;
05517                   // leave it alone
05518                   if (pObject->usItem != NOTHING && pObject->bStatus[bLoop] > 0)
05519                   {
05520                         bDamage = CheckItemForDamage( pObject->usItem, iDamage );
05521                         switch( pObject->usItem )
05522                         {
05523                               case JAR_CREATURE_BLOOD:
05524                               case JAR:
05525                               case JAR_HUMAN_BLOOD:
05526                               case JAR_ELIXIR:
05527                                     if ( PreRandom( bDamage ) > 5 )
05528                                     {
05529                                           // smash!
05530                                           bDamage = pObject->bStatus[ bLoop ];
05531                                     }
05532                                     break;
05533                               default:
05534                                     break;
05535                         }
05536                         if ( Item[ pObject->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_AMMO  )
05537                         {
05538                               if ( PreRandom( 100 ) < (UINT32) bDamage )
05539                               {
05540                                     // destroy clip completely
05541                                     pObject->bStatus[ bLoop ] = 1;
05542                               }
05543                         }
05544                         else
05545                         {
05546                               pObject->bStatus[bLoop] -= bDamage;
05547                               if (pObject->bStatus[bLoop] < 1)
05548                               {
05549                                     pObject->bStatus[bLoop] = 1;
05550                               }
05551                         }
05552                         // I don't think we increase viewrange based on items any more
05553                         // FUN STUFF!  Check for explosives going off as a result!
05554                         if (Item[pObject->usItem].usItemClass & IC_EXPLOSV)
05555                         {
05556                               if (CheckForChainReaction( pObject->usItem, pObject->bStatus[bLoop], bDamage, fOnGround ))
05557                               {
05558                                     return( TRUE );
05559                               }
05560                         }
05561 
05562                         // remove item from index AFTER checking explosions because need item data for explosion!
05563                         if ( pObject->bStatus[bLoop] == 1 )
05564                         {
05565                               if ( pObject->ubNumberOfObjects > 1 )
05566                               {
05567                                     RemoveObjFrom( pObject, bLoop );
05568                                     // since an item was just removed, the items above the current were all shifted down one;
05569                                     // to process them properly, we have to back up 1 in the counter
05570                                     bLoop = bLoop - 1;
05571                               }
05572                         }
05573                   }
05574             }
05575 
05576             for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
05577             {
05578                   if (pObject->usAttachItem[bLoop] != NOTHING && pObject->bAttachStatus[bLoop] > 0)
05579                   {
05580                         pObject->bAttachStatus[bLoop] -= CheckItemForDamage( pObject->usAttachItem[bLoop], iDamage );
05581                         if (pObject->bAttachStatus[bLoop] < 1)
05582                         {
05583                               pObject->bAttachStatus[bLoop] = 1;
05584                         }
05585                   }
05586             }
05587       }
05588 
05589       return( FALSE );
05590 }
05591 
05592 void CheckEquipmentForDamage( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT32 iDamage )
05593 {
05594       INT8                    bSlot;
05595       BOOLEAN                 fBlowsUp;
05596       UINT8                   ubNumberOfObjects;
05597 
05598       if ( TANK( pSoldier ) )
05599       {
05600             return;
05601       }
05602 
05603       for (bSlot = 0; bSlot < NUM_INV_SLOTS; bSlot++)
05604       {
05605             ubNumberOfObjects = pSoldier->inv[bSlot].ubNumberOfObjects;
05606             fBlowsUp = DamageItem( &(pSoldier->inv[bSlot]), iDamage, FALSE );
05607             if (fBlowsUp)
05608             {
05609                   // blow it up!
05610                   if ( gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount )
05611                   {
05612                         IgniteExplosion( pSoldier->ubAttackerID, CenterX( pSoldier->sGridNo ), CenterY( pSoldier->sGridNo ), 0, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->inv[ bSlot ].usItem, pSoldier->bLevel );
05613                   }
05614                   else
05615                   {
05616                         IgniteExplosion( pSoldier->ubID, CenterX( pSoldier->sGridNo ), CenterY( pSoldier->sGridNo ), 0, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->inv[ bSlot ].usItem, pSoldier->bLevel );
05617                   }
05618 
05619                   // Remove item!
05620                   DeleteObj( &(pSoldier->inv[ bSlot ]) );
05621 
05622                   DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
05623             }
05624             else if ( ubNumberOfObjects != pSoldier->inv[bSlot].ubNumberOfObjects )
05625             {
05626                   DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
05627             }
05628       }
05629 }
05630 
05631 void CheckEquipmentForFragileItemDamage( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT32 iDamage )
05632 {
05633       // glass jars etc can be damaged by falling over
05634       INT8                    bSlot;
05635       UINT8                   ubNumberOfObjects;
05636       BOOLEAN                 fPlayedGlassBreak = FALSE;
05637 
05638       for (bSlot = 0; bSlot < NUM_INV_SLOTS; bSlot++)
05639       {
05640             switch( pSoldier->inv[bSlot].usItem )
05641             {
05642                   case JAR_CREATURE_BLOOD:
05643                   case JAR:
05644                   case JAR_HUMAN_BLOOD:
05645                   case JAR_ELIXIR:
05646                         ubNumberOfObjects = pSoldier->inv[bSlot].ubNumberOfObjects;
05647                         DamageItem( &(pSoldier->inv[bSlot]), iDamage, FALSE );
05648                         if ( !fPlayedGlassBreak && (ubNumberOfObjects != pSoldier->inv[bSlot].ubNumberOfObjects) )
05649                         {
05650                               PlayJA2Sample( GLASS_CRACK, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( MIDVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );
05651                               fPlayedGlassBreak = TRUE;
05652                               // only dirty once
05653                               DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
05654                         }
05655                         break;
05656                   default:
05657                         break;
05658             }
05659       }
05660 }
05661 
05662 
05663 BOOLEAN DamageItemOnGround( OBJECTTYPE * pObject, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel, INT32 iDamage, UINT8 ubOwner )
05664 {
05665       BOOLEAN                 fBlowsUp;
05666 
05667       fBlowsUp = DamageItem( pObject, iDamage, TRUE );
05668       if ( fBlowsUp )
05669       {
05670             // OK, Ignite this explosion!
05671             IgniteExplosion( ubOwner, CenterX( sGridNo ), CenterY( sGridNo ), 0, sGridNo, pObject->usItem, bLevel );
05672 
05673             // Remove item!
05674             return( TRUE );
05675       }
05676       else if ( (pObject->ubNumberOfObjects < 2) && (pObject->bStatus[0] < USABLE) )
05677       {
05678             return( TRUE );
05679       }
05680       else
05681       {
05682             return( FALSE );
05683       }
05684 }
05685 
05686 // is the item a medical kit/first aid kit item?
05687 INT8 IsMedicalKitItem( OBJECTTYPE *pObject )
05688 {
05689       // check item id against current medical kits
05690       if ( Item[pObject->usItem].medicalkit )
05691             return 1;
05692 
05693       //switch( pObject->usItem )
05694       //{
05695       //    case( MEDICKIT ):
05696       //          // medical bag, return 1
05697       //          return ( 1 );
05698       //    break;
05699       //}
05700 
05701       return( 0 );
05702 }
05703 
05704 void SwapHandItems( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
05705 {
05706       BOOLEAN           fOk;
05707 
05708       CHECKV( pSoldier );
05709       if (pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem == NOTHING || pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS].usItem == NOTHING)
05710       {
05711             // whatever is in the second hand can be swapped to the main hand!
05712             SwapObjs( &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]), &(pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS]) );
05713             DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
05714       }
05715       else
05716       {
05717             if (TwoHandedItem( pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS].usItem ) )
05718             {
05719                   // must move the item in the main hand elsewhere in the inventory
05720                   fOk = InternalAutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]), FALSE, HANDPOS );
05721                   if (!fOk)
05722                   {
05723                         return;
05724                   }
05725                   // the main hand is now empty so a swap is going to work...
05726             }
05727             SwapObjs( &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]), &(pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS]) );
05728             DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
05729       }
05730 }
05731 
05732 void SwapOutHandItem( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
05733 {
05734       BOOLEAN                 fOk;
05735 
05736       CHECKV( pSoldier );
05737 
05738       // puts away the item in the main hand
05739       if (pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem != NOTHING )
05740       {
05741             if (pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS].usItem == NOTHING)
05742             {
05743                   // just swap the hand item to the second hand
05744                   SwapObjs( &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]), &(pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS]) );
05745                   DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
05746                   return;
05747             }
05748             else
05749             {
05750                   // try placing it somewhere else in our inventory
05751                   fOk = AutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]), FALSE );
05752                   if (fOk)
05753                   {
05754                         DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
05755                   }
05756                   // otherwise there's no room for the item anywhere!
05757             }
05758       }     
05759 }
05760 
05761 void WaterDamage( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
05762 {
05763       // damage guy's equipment and camouflage due to water
05764       INT8        bLoop, bDamage, bDieSize;
05765       UINT32      uiRoll;
05766 
05767       if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER )
05768       {
05769             for ( bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_INV_SLOTS; bLoop++ )
05770             {
05771                   // if there's an item here that can get water damaged...
05772 //                if (pSoldier->inv[ bLoop ].usItem && Item[pSoldier->inv[ bLoop ].usItem].fFlags & ITEM_WATER_DAMAGES)
05773                   if (pSoldier->inv[ bLoop ].usItem && Item[pSoldier->inv[ bLoop ].usItem].waterdamages )
05774                   {
05775                         // roll the 'ol 100-sided dice
05776                         uiRoll = PreRandom(100);
05777 
05778                         // 10% chance of getting damage!
05779                         if (uiRoll < 10)
05780                         {
05781                               // lose between 1 and 10 status points each time
05782                               bDamage = (INT8) (10 - uiRoll);
05783 
05784                               // but don't let anything drop lower than 1%
05785                               pSoldier->inv[bLoop].bStatus[0] -= bDamage;
05786                               if (pSoldier->inv[bLoop].bStatus[0] < 1)
05787                               {
05788                                     pSoldier->inv[bLoop].bStatus[0] = 1;
05789                               }
05790                         }
05791                   }
05792             }
05793       }
05794       BOOLEAN camoWoreOff = FALSE;
05795       if (pSoldier->bCamo > 0 && !HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, CAMOUFLAGED ) )
05796       {
05797             // reduce camouflage by 2% per tile of deep water
05798             // and 1% for medium water
05799             if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER )
05800                   pSoldier->bCamo = __max( 0, pSoldier->bCamo - 2 );
05801             else
05802                   pSoldier->bCamo = __max( 0, pSoldier->bCamo - 1 );
05803 
05804             if ( (pSoldier->bCamo)== 0)
05805                   camoWoreOff = TRUE;
05806       }
05807 
05808       if (pSoldier->urbanCamo > 0 && !HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, CAMOUFLAGED_URBAN ) )
05809       {
05810             // reduce camouflage by 2% per tile of deep water
05811             // and 1% for medium water
05812             if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER )
05813                   pSoldier->urbanCamo = __max( 0, pSoldier->urbanCamo - 2 );
05814             else
05815                   pSoldier->urbanCamo = __max( 0, pSoldier->urbanCamo - 1 );
05816 
05817             if ( (pSoldier->urbanCamo)== 0)
05818                   camoWoreOff = TRUE;
05819       }
05820 
05821       if (pSoldier->desertCamo > 0 && !HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, CAMOUFLAGED_DESERT ) )
05822       {
05823             // reduce camouflage by 2% per tile of deep water
05824             // and 1% for medium water
05825             if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER )
05826                   pSoldier->desertCamo = __max( 0, pSoldier->desertCamo - 2 );
05827             else
05828                   pSoldier->desertCamo = __max( 0, pSoldier->desertCamo - 1 );
05829 
05830             if ( (pSoldier->desertCamo)== 0)
05831                   camoWoreOff = TRUE;
05832       }
05833 
05834       if (pSoldier->snowCamo > 0 && !HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, CAMOUFLAGED_SNOW ) )
05835       {
05836             // reduce camouflage by 2% per tile of deep water
05837             // and 1% for medium water
05838             if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER )
05839                   pSoldier->snowCamo = __max( 0, pSoldier->snowCamo - 2 );
05840             else
05841                   pSoldier->snowCamo = __max( 0, pSoldier->snowCamo - 1 );
05842 
05843             if ( (pSoldier->snowCamo)== 0)
05844                   camoWoreOff = TRUE;
05845       }
05846 
05847       if ( camoWoreOff )
05848       {
05849             // Reload palettes....
05850             if ( pSoldier->bInSector )
05851             {     
05852                   CreateSoldierPalettes( pSoldier );
05853             }
05854             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, Message[STR_CAMMO_WASHED_OFF], pSoldier->name );
05855       }
05856 
05857 
05858 
05859 
05860 
05861 
05862       if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pSoldier->bMonsterSmell > 0 )
05863       {
05864             if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER )
05865             {
05866                   bDieSize = 10;
05867             }
05868             else
05869             {
05870                   bDieSize = 20;
05871             }
05872             if ( Random( bDieSize ) == 0 )
05873             {
05874                   pSoldier->bMonsterSmell--;
05875             }           
05876       }
05877 
05878       DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
05879 }
05880 
05881 BOOLEAN ApplyCammo( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, OBJECTTYPE * pObj, BOOLEAN *pfGoodAPs )
05882 {
05883       INT8        bPointsToUse;
05884       UINT16      usTotalKitPoints;
05885 
05886   (*pfGoodAPs) = TRUE;
05887 
05888       if (!Item[pObj->usItem].camouflagekit )
05889       {
05890             return( FALSE );
05891       }
05892 
05893       if (!EnoughPoints( pSoldier, AP_CAMOFLAGE, 0, TRUE ) )
05894       {
05895     (*pfGoodAPs) = FALSE;
05896             return( TRUE );
05897       }
05898 
05899       usTotalKitPoints = TotalPoints( pObj );
05900       if (usTotalKitPoints == 0)
05901       {
05902             // HUH??? 
05903             return( FALSE );
05904       }
05905 
05906       //get total camo bonus for kit -- note that camo kits now require the camobonus tag to be set
05907       int itemCamo = Item[pObj->usItem].camobonus + Item[pObj->usItem].urbanCamobonus + Item[pObj->usItem].desertCamobonus + Item[pObj->usItem].snowCamobonus;
05908 
05909       int totalCamo = pSoldier->bCamo + pSoldier->wornCamo + pSoldier->urbanCamo+pSoldier->wornUrbanCamo+pSoldier->desertCamo+pSoldier->wornDesertCamo+pSoldier->snowCamo+pSoldier->wornSnowCamo;
05910       if ((totalCamo) >= 100)
05911       {
05912             // nothing more to add
05913             return( FALSE );
05914       }
05915 
05916       // points are used up at a rate of 50% kit = 100% cammo on guy
05917       // add 1 to round off
05918       bPointsToUse = (100 - (totalCamo) + 1 ) / 2;
05919       bPointsToUse = __min( bPointsToUse, usTotalKitPoints );
05920 
05921       //figure out proportions of each to be applied, one item can theoretically have more than one camouflage type this way
05922       int urban = (int)(Item[pObj->usItem].urbanCamobonus * bPointsToUse * 2 / 100 );
05923       int jungle = (int)(Item[pObj->usItem].camobonus * bPointsToUse * 2 / 100 );
05924       int desert = (int)(Item[pObj->usItem].desertCamobonus * bPointsToUse * 2 / 100 );
05925       int snow = (int)(Item[pObj->usItem].snowCamobonus * bPointsToUse * 2 / 100 );
05926 
05927       pSoldier->bCamo = __min( 100, pSoldier->bCamo + jungle );
05928       pSoldier->urbanCamo = __min( 100, pSoldier->urbanCamo + urban );
05929       pSoldier->desertCamo = __min( 100, pSoldier->desertCamo + desert );
05930       pSoldier->snowCamo = __min( 100, pSoldier->snowCamo + snow );
05931       
05932       UseKitPoints( pObj, bPointsToUse, pSoldier );
05933 
05934       DeductPoints( pSoldier, AP_CAMOFLAGE, 0 );
05935 
05936       // Reload palettes....
05937       if ( pSoldier->bInSector )
05938       {     
05939             CreateSoldierPalettes( pSoldier );
05940       }
05941 
05942       return( TRUE );
05943 }
05944 
05945 BOOLEAN ApplyCanteen( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, OBJECTTYPE * pObj, BOOLEAN *pfGoodAPs )
05946 {
05947       INT16       sPointsToUse;
05948       UINT16      usTotalKitPoints;
05949 
05950   (*pfGoodAPs) = TRUE;
05951 
05952       if (!Item[pObj->usItem].canteen )
05953       {
05954             return( FALSE );
05955       }
05956 
05957       usTotalKitPoints = TotalPoints( pObj );
05958       if (usTotalKitPoints == 0)
05959       {
05960             // HUH??? 
05961             return( FALSE );
05962       }
05963 
05964       if (!EnoughPoints( pSoldier, AP_DRINK, 0, TRUE ) )
05965       {
05966     (*pfGoodAPs) = FALSE;
05967             return( TRUE );
05968       }
05969 
05970   if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
05971   {
05972     if ( gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].bSex == MALE )
05973     {
05974               PlayJA2Sample( DRINK_CANTEEN_MALE, RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
05975     }
05976     else
05977     {
05978               PlayJA2Sample( DRINK_CANTEEN_FEMALE, RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
05979     }
05980   }
05981 
05982       sPointsToUse = __min( 20, usTotalKitPoints );
05983 
05984       // CJC Feb 9.  Canteens don't seem effective enough, so doubled return from them
05985       DeductPoints( pSoldier, AP_DRINK, (INT16) (2 * sPointsToUse * -(100 - pSoldier->bBreath) ) );
05986 
05987       UseKitPoints( pObj, sPointsToUse, pSoldier );
05988 
05989       return( TRUE );
05990 }
05991 
05992 #define MAX_HUMAN_CREATURE_SMELL (NORMAL_HUMAN_SMELL_STRENGTH - 1)
05993 
05994 BOOLEAN ApplyElixir( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, OBJECTTYPE * pObj, BOOLEAN *pfGoodAPs )
05995 {
05996       INT16       sPointsToUse;
05997       UINT16      usTotalKitPoints;
05998 
05999   (*pfGoodAPs) = TRUE;
06000 
06001       if (pObj->usItem != JAR_ELIXIR )
06002       {
06003             return( FALSE );
06004       }
06005 
06006       usTotalKitPoints = TotalPoints( pObj );
06007       if (usTotalKitPoints == 0)
06008       {
06009             // HUH??? 
06010             return( FALSE );
06011       }
06012 
06013       if (!EnoughPoints( pSoldier, AP_CAMOFLAGE, 0, TRUE ) )
06014       {
06015     (*pfGoodAPs) = FALSE;
06016             return( TRUE );
06017       }
06018 
06019       DeductPoints( pSoldier, AP_CAMOFLAGE, 0 );
06020 
06021       sPointsToUse = ( MAX_HUMAN_CREATURE_SMELL - pSoldier->bMonsterSmell ) * 2;
06022       sPointsToUse = __min( sPointsToUse, usTotalKitPoints );
06023 
06024       UseKitPoints( pObj, sPointsToUse, pSoldier );
06025 
06026       pSoldier->bMonsterSmell += sPointsToUse / 2;
06027 
06028       return( TRUE );
06029 }
06030 
06031 UINT32 ConvertProfileMoneyValueToObjectTypeMoneyValue( UINT8 ubStatus )
06032 {
06033       return( ubStatus * 50 );
06034 }
06035 
06036 UINT8 ConvertObjectTypeMoneyValueToProfileMoneyValue( UINT32 uiMoneyAmount )
06037 {
06038       return( (UINT8)( uiMoneyAmount / 50 ) );
06039 }
06040 
06041 BOOLEAN ItemIsCool( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
06042 {
06043       if (pObj->bStatus[0] < 60)
06044       {
06045             return( FALSE );
06046       }
06047       if ( Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_WEAPON )
06048       {
06049             if ( Weapon[ pObj->usItem ].ubDeadliness >= 30 )
06050             {
06051                   return( TRUE );
06052             }
06053       }
06054       else if ( Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_ARMOUR )
06055       {
06056             if ( Armour[ Item[ pObj->usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection >= 20 )
06057             {
06058                   return( TRUE );
06059             }
06060       }
06061 
06062       return( FALSE );
06063 }
06064 
06065 void ActivateXRayDevice( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
06066 {
06067       SOLDIERTYPE *     pSoldier2;
06068       UINT32                        uiSlot;
06069       INT8                          bBatteries;
06070 
06071       if ( Item[pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem].needsbatteries )
06072       {
06073             // check for batteries
06074             bBatteries = FindAttachedBatteries( &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]) );
06075             if ( bBatteries == NO_SLOT )
06076             {
06077                   // doesn't work without batteries!
06078                   return;
06079             }
06080 
06081             // use up 8-12 percent of batteries
06082             if ( Item[pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usAttachItem[bBatteries]].percentstatusdrainreduction > 0 )
06083                   pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].bAttachStatus[ bBatteries ] -= (INT8)( (8 + Random( 5 )) * (100 - Item[pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usAttachItem[bBatteries]].percentstatusdrainreduction)/100 );
06084             else
06085                   pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].bAttachStatus[ bBatteries ] -= (INT8)( (8 + Random( 5 )) );
06086             if ( pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].bAttachStatus[ bBatteries ] <= 0 )
06087             {
06088                   // destroy batteries
06089                   pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usAttachItem[ bBatteries ] = NOTHING;
06090                   pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].bAttachStatus[ bBatteries ] = 0;
06091             }
06092       }
06093       // first, scan through all mercs and turn off xrayed flag for anyone
06094       // previously xrayed by this guy
06095       for ( uiSlot = 0; uiSlot < guiNumMercSlots; uiSlot++ )
06096       {
06097             pSoldier2 = MercSlots[ uiSlot ];
06098             if ( pSoldier2 )
06099             {
06100                   if ( (pSoldier2->ubMiscSoldierFlags & SOLDIER_MISC_XRAYED) && (pSoldier2->ubXRayedBy == pSoldier->ubID) )
06101                   {
06102                         pSoldier2->ubMiscSoldierFlags &= (~SOLDIER_MISC_XRAYED);
06103                         pSoldier2->ubXRayedBy = NOBODY;
06104                   }
06105             }
06106       }
06107       // now turn on xray for anyone within range
06108       for ( uiSlot = 0; uiSlot < guiNumMercSlots; uiSlot++ )
06109       {
06110             pSoldier2 = MercSlots[ uiSlot ];
06111             if ( pSoldier2 )
06112             {
06113                   if ( pSoldier2->bTeam != pSoldier->bTeam && PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier2->sGridNo ) < XRAY_RANGE )
06114                   {
06115                         pSoldier2->ubMiscSoldierFlags |= SOLDIER_MISC_XRAYED;
06116                         pSoldier2->ubXRayedBy = pSoldier->ubID;
06117                   }
06118             }
06119       }
06120       pSoldier->uiXRayActivatedTime = GetWorldTotalSeconds();
06121 }
06122 
06123 void TurnOffXRayEffects( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
06124 {
06125       SOLDIERTYPE *     pSoldier2;
06126       UINT32                        uiSlot;
06127 
06128       if ( !pSoldier->uiXRayActivatedTime )
06129       {
06130             return;
06131       }
06132 
06133       // scan through all mercs and turn off xrayed flag for anyone
06134       // xrayed by this guy
06135       for ( uiSlot = 0; uiSlot < guiNumMercSlots; uiSlot++ )
06136       {
06137             pSoldier2 = MercSlots[ uiSlot ];
06138             if ( pSoldier2 )
06139             {
06140                   if ( (pSoldier2->ubMiscSoldierFlags & SOLDIER_MISC_XRAYED) && (pSoldier2->ubXRayedBy == pSoldier->ubID) )
06141                   {
06142                         pSoldier2->ubMiscSoldierFlags &= (~SOLDIER_MISC_XRAYED);
06143                         pSoldier2->ubXRayedBy = NOBODY;
06144                   }
06145             }
06146       }
06147       pSoldier->uiXRayActivatedTime = 0;
06148 }
06149 
06150 
06151 
06152 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
06153 void DumpItemsList( void )
06154 {
06155   CHAR8 zPrintFileName[60];
06156   FILE *FDump;
06157       UINT16 usItem;
06158       INVTYPE *pItem;
06159 
06160   // open output file
06161       strcpy(zPrintFileName, "ItemDump.txt");
06162   FDump = fopen(zPrintFileName, "wt");
06163 
06164   if (FDump == NULL)
06165     return;
06166 
06167       // print headings
06168       fprintf(FDump, "            ITEM              COOLNESS  VALUE\n");
06169       fprintf(FDump, "============================  ========  =====\n");
06170 
06171       for( usItem = 0; usItem < MAXITEMS; usItem++ )
06172       {
06173             pItem= &( Item[ usItem ] );
06174       
06175             if (pItem->ubCoolness > 0 )
06176             {
06177                   fprintf(FDump, "%28ls     %2d     $%4d\n", ItemNames[ usItem ], pItem->ubCoolness, pItem->usPrice );
06178             }
06179       }
06180 
06181   fclose(FDump);
06182 }
06183 #endif // JA2TESTVERSION
06184 
06185 
06186 // Snap: status modifiers for various item bonuses:
06187 
06188 // In JA Gold status above this limit does not affect item performance (for some items)
06189 const INT8 STANDARD_STATUS_CUTOFF = 85;
06190 
06191 // Scale bonus with item status
06192 INT16 BonusReduce( INT16 bonus, INT8 status, INT8 statusCutoff = STANDARD_STATUS_CUTOFF )
06193 {
06194       if ( bonus > 0 && status < statusCutoff && statusCutoff > 0 && statusCutoff <= 100 )
06195             return ( ( status * 100 ) / statusCutoff * bonus ) / 100;
06196       else // A penalty can't be reduced by status!
06197             return bonus;
06198 }
06199 
06200 // Scale bonus with item status. Status < 50% creates a penalty!
06201 INT16 BonusReduceMore( INT16 bonus, INT8 status, INT8 statusCutoff = 100 )
06202 {
06203       if ( bonus > 0 && status < statusCutoff && statusCutoff > 0 && statusCutoff <= 100 )
06204             return ( ( ( status * 100 ) / statusCutoff - 50 ) * bonus ) / 50;
06205       else // A penalty can't be reduced by status!
06206             return bonus;
06207 }
06208 
06209 // Some items either work or they don't...
06210 INT16 BonusOnOff( INT16 bonus, INT8 status )
06211 {
06212       if ( bonus > 0 )
06213             return (status >= 50) ? bonus : 0;
06214       else // A penalty can't be reduced by status!
06215             return bonus;
06216 }
06217 
06218 
06219 // Snap: a fast aimbonus check for AI
06220 BOOLEAN IsScoped( const OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
06221 {
06222       if ( Item[pObj->usItem].aimbonus > 0 || Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem].aimbonus > 0 )
06223             return TRUE;
06224 
06225       for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++)
06226       {
06227             if ( Item[pObj->usAttachItem[i]].aimbonus > 0 )
06228                   return TRUE;
06229       }
06230 
06231       return FALSE;
06232 }
06233 
06234 // Snap: get aim bonus for a single item
06235 INT16 GetItemAimBonus( const INVTYPE* pItem, INT32 iRange, UINT8 ubAimTime )
06236 {
06237       if ( iRange <= pItem->minrangeforaimbonus )     return 0;
06238 
06239       // reduce effective sight range by aimbonus% per extra aiming time AP
06240       // of the distance beyond minrangeforaimbonus.
06241       if ( pItem->aimbonus < 0)
06242             ubAimTime = 1;
06243 
06244       return ( pItem->aimbonus * ubAimTime      * ( iRange - pItem->minrangeforaimbonus ) ) / 100;
06245 }     
06246 
06247 INT16 GetAimBonus( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, INT32 iRange, UINT8 ubAimTime )
06248 {
06249       INT16 bns;
06250 
06251       bns = BonusReduceMore( GetItemAimBonus( &Item[pObj->usItem], iRange, ubAimTime ), pObj->bStatus[0] );
06252       bns += GetItemAimBonus( &Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem], iRange, ubAimTime );
06253 
06254       for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++)
06255       {
06256             bns += BonusReduceMore( GetItemAimBonus( &Item[pObj->usAttachItem[i]], iRange, ubAimTime ),
06257                   pObj->bAttachStatus[i] );
06258       }
06259 
06260       return( bns );
06261 }
06262 
06263 // Madd: check equipment for aim bonus (penalties)
06264 INT16 GetGearAimBonus( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT32 iRange, UINT8 ubAimTime  )
06265 {
06266       INT16 bns=0;
06267 
06268       for (int j = HELMETPOS; j <= HEAD2POS; j++) 
06269       {
06270             bns += GetItemAimBonus( &Item[pSoldier->inv[j].usItem], iRange, ubAimTime );
06271             for ( int i = 0; i < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++)
06272             {
06273                   bns += GetItemAimBonus(&Item[pSoldier->inv[j].usAttachItem[i]],iRange,ubAimTime);
06274             }
06275       }
06276 
06277       return( bns );
06278 }
06279 
06280 // Madd: check equipment for to hit bonus (penalties)
06281 INT16 GetGearToHitBonus( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
06282 {
06283       INT16 bns=0;
06284 
06285       for (int j = HELMETPOS; j <= HEAD2POS; j++) 
06286       {
06287             bns += Item[pSoldier->inv[j].usItem].tohitbonus;
06288             for ( int i = 0; i < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++)
06289             {
06290                   bns += Item[pSoldier->inv[j].usAttachItem[i]].tohitbonus;
06291             }
06292       }
06293 
06294       return( bns );
06295 }
06296 
06297 // Madd: check equipment for AP bonus (penalties)
06298 INT16 GetGearAPBonus( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
06299 {
06300       INT16 bns=0;
06301 
06302       for (int j = HELMETPOS; j <= HEAD2POS; j++) 
06303       {
06304             bns += Item[pSoldier->inv[j].usItem].APBonus;
06305             for ( int i = 0; i < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++)
06306             {
06307                   bns += Item[pSoldier->inv[j].usAttachItem[i]].APBonus;
06308             }
06309       }
06310 
06311       return( bns );
06312 }
06313 
06314 UINT32 FindRangeBonusAttachment( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
06315 {
06316       INT8  bLoop;
06317 
06318       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
06319       {
06320             if (Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].rangebonus > 0 )
06321             {
06322                   return( Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].uiIndex );
06323             }
06324       }
06325       return( NONE );
06326 }
06327 
06328 INT16 GetRangeBonus( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
06329 {
06330       INT8  bLoop;
06331       INT16 bns=0;
06332 
06333       bns = BonusReduce( Item[pObj->usItem].rangebonus, pObj->bStatus[0] );
06334       
06335       if ( pObj->ubGunShotsLeft > 0 )
06336             bns += Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem].rangebonus;
06337 
06338       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
06339       {
06340             if ( !Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].duckbill || ( Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].duckbill && pObj->ubGunAmmoType == AMMO_BUCKSHOT ))
06341                   bns += BonusReduce( Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].rangebonus, pObj->bAttachStatus[bLoop] );
06342       }
06343 
06344       return( bns );
06345 }
06346 
06347 
06348 INT16 LaserBonus( const INVTYPE * pItem, INT32 iRange, UINT8 bLightLevel )
06349 {
06350       // Snap: Reduce laser scope bonus at long ranges and high light levels
06351 
06352       if ( pItem->bestlaserrange == 0 || iRange <= pItem->bestlaserrange ) {
06353             // No penalty within this range
06354             return pItem->tohitbonus;
06355       }
06356       else {
06357             // Figure out max. visible distance for the laser dot:
06358             // day: 1.5*bestlaserrange, night: 2.5*bestlaserrange
06359             // iMaxLaserRange = bestlaserrange * ( 1.5 + ( bLightLevel - NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY )
06360             //                                 / ( NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_NIGHT - NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY ) )
06361             INT32 iMaxLaserRange = ( pItem->bestlaserrange*( 2*bLightLevel + 3*NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_NIGHT - 5*NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY ) )
06362                                  / ( 2 * ( NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_NIGHT - NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY ) );
06363 
06364             // Beyond bestlaserrange laser bonus drops linearly to 0
06365             INT16 bonus = ( pItem->tohitbonus * (iMaxLaserRange - iRange) )
06366                         / ( iMaxLaserRange - pItem->bestlaserrange );
06367             
06368             return (bonus > 0 ? bonus : 0);
06369       }
06370 }
06371 
06372 INT16 GetToHitBonus( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, INT32 iRange, UINT8 bLightLevel, BOOLEAN fProneStance )
06373 {
06374       INT16 bns=0;
06375 
06376       // Snap: bipod is effective only in the prone stance
06377 
06378       if ( fProneStance )
06379             bns += Item[pObj->usItem].bipod;
06380             
06381       bns += BonusReduceMore( LaserBonus( &Item[pObj->usItem], iRange, bLightLevel), pObj->bStatus[0] );
06382       bns += Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem].tohitbonus;
06383 
06384       for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++)
06385       {
06386             if ( fProneStance )
06387                   bns += Item[pObj->usAttachItem[i]].bipod;
06388 
06389             bns += BonusReduceMore( LaserBonus( &Item[pObj->usAttachItem[i]], iRange, bLightLevel), pObj->bAttachStatus[i] );
06390       }
06391 
06392       // Snap (TODO): add special treatment of laser scopes
06393       return( bns );
06394 }
06395 
06396 INT16 GetBurstToHitBonus( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, BOOLEAN fProneStance )
06397 {
06398       INT16 bns=0;
06399 
06400       // Snap: bipod is effective only in the prone stance
06401 
06402       if ( fProneStance )
06403             bns += Item[pObj->usItem].bipod;
06404 
06405       bns += BonusReduceMore( Item[pObj->usItem].bursttohitbonus, pObj->bStatus[0] );
06406       bns += Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem].bursttohitbonus ;
06407 
06408       for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++)
06409       {
06410             if ( fProneStance )
06411                   bns += Item[pObj->usAttachItem[i]].bipod;
06412 
06413             bns += BonusReduceMore( Item[pObj->usAttachItem[i]].bursttohitbonus, pObj->bAttachStatus[i] );
06414       }
06415 
06416       return( bns );
06417 }
06418 
06419 
06420 INT16 GetDamageBonus( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
06421 {
06422       INT8  bLoop;
06423       INT16 bns=0;
06424 
06425       bns = BonusReduce( Item[pObj->usItem].damagebonus, pObj->bStatus[0] );
06426       
06427       if ( pObj->ubGunShotsLeft > 0 )
06428             bns += Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem].damagebonus ;
06429 
06430       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
06431       {
06432             bns += BonusReduce( Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].damagebonus,
06433                   pObj->bAttachStatus[bLoop] );
06434       }
06435 
06436       return( bns );
06437 }
06438 
06439 
06440 INT16 GetMeleeDamageBonus( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
06441 {
06442       INT8  bLoop;
06443       INT16 bns=0;
06444 
06445       bns = BonusReduce( Item[pObj->usItem].meleedamagebonus, pObj->bStatus[0]);
06446       bns += Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem].meleedamagebonus ;
06447 
06448       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
06449       {
06450             bns += BonusReduce( Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].meleedamagebonus,
06451                   pObj->bAttachStatus[bLoop] );
06452       }
06453       return( bns );
06454 }
06455 
06456 
06457 INT16 GetPercentAPReduction( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
06458 {
06459       INT8  bLoop;
06460       INT16 bns=0;
06461 
06462       bns = BonusReduceMore( Item[pObj->usItem].percentapreduction, pObj->bStatus[0] );
06463       bns += Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem].percentapreduction;
06464 
06465       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
06466       {
06467             bns += BonusReduceMore( Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].percentapreduction,
06468                   pObj->bAttachStatus[bLoop] );
06469       }
06470 
06471       return( bns );
06472 }
06473 
06474 INT16 GetMagSizeBonus( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
06475 {
06476       INT8  bLoop;
06477       INT16 bns=0;
06478 
06479       bns = BonusOnOff( Item[pObj->usItem].magsizebonus, pObj->bStatus[0] );
06480 //    bns = bns + Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem].magsizebonus ;
06481 
06482       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
06483       {
06484             bns += BonusOnOff( Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].magsizebonus, pObj->bAttachStatus[bLoop] );
06485       }
06486       return( bns );
06487 }
06488 
06489 INT16 GetBurstSizeBonus( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
06490 {
06491       INT8  bLoop;
06492       INT16 bns=0;
06493 
06494       bns = BonusOnOff( Item[pObj->usItem].burstsizebonus, pObj->bStatus[0] );
06495       bns += Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem].burstsizebonus ;
06496 
06497       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
06498       {
06499             bns += BonusOnOff( Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].burstsizebonus, pObj->bAttachStatus[bLoop] );
06500       }
06501 
06502       return( bns );
06503 }
06504 
06505 INT16 GetRateOfFireBonus( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
06506 {
06507       INT8  bLoop;
06508       INT16 bns=0;
06509 
06510       bns = BonusReduceMore( Item[pObj->usItem].rateoffirebonus, pObj->bStatus[0] );
06511       bns += Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem].rateoffirebonus ;
06512 
06513       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
06514       {
06515             bns += BonusReduceMore( Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].rateoffirebonus, pObj->bAttachStatus[bLoop] );
06516       }
06517       return( bns );
06518 }
06519 
06520 INT16 GetAutoToHitBonus( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, BOOLEAN fProneStance )
06521 {
06522       INT16 bns=0;
06523 
06524       // Snap: bipod is effective only in the prone stance
06525 
06526       if ( fProneStance )
06527             bns += Item[pObj->usItem].bipod;
06528 
06529 
06530       bns += BonusReduceMore( Item[pObj->usItem].autofiretohitbonus, pObj->bStatus[0] );
06531 
06532       bns += Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem].autofiretohitbonus ;
06533 
06534       for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++)
06535       {
06536             if ( fProneStance )
06537                   bns += Item[pObj->usAttachItem[i]].bipod;
06538 
06539                   bns += BonusReduceMore( Item[pObj->usAttachItem[i]].autofiretohitbonus, pObj->bAttachStatus[i] );
06540       }
06541 
06542       return( bns );
06543 }
06544 
06545 INT16 GetPercentReadyTimeAPReduction( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
06546 {
06547       INT8  bLoop;
06548       INT16 bns=0;
06549 
06550       bns = BonusReduceMore( Item[pObj->usItem].percentreadytimeapreduction, pObj->bStatus[0] );
06551       bns += Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem].percentreadytimeapreduction;
06552 
06553       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
06554       {
06555             bns += BonusReduceMore( Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].percentreadytimeapreduction, pObj->bAttachStatus[bLoop] );
06556       }
06557 
06558       return( bns );
06559 }
06560 
06561 INT16 GetPercentAutofireAPReduction( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
06562 {
06563       INT8  bLoop;
06564       INT16 bns=0;
06565 
06566       bns = BonusReduceMore( Item[pObj->usItem].percentautofireapreduction, pObj->bStatus[0] );
06567       bns += Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem].percentautofireapreduction;
06568 
06569       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
06570       {
06571             bns += BonusReduceMore( Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].percentautofireapreduction, pObj->bAttachStatus[bLoop] );
06572       }
06573 
06574       return( bns );
06575 }
06576 
06577 INT16 GetPercentReloadTimeAPReduction( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
06578 {
06579       INT8  bLoop;
06580       INT16 bns=0;
06581 
06582       bns = BonusReduceMore( Item[pObj->usItem].percentreloadtimeapreduction, pObj->bStatus[0] );
06583       bns += Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem].percentreloadtimeapreduction;
06584 
06585       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
06586       {
06587             bns += BonusReduceMore( Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].percentreloadtimeapreduction, pObj->bAttachStatus[bLoop] );
06588       }
06589       return( bns );
06590 }
06591 
06592 INT16 GetPercentBurstFireAPReduction( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
06593 {
06594       INT8  bLoop;
06595       INT16 bns=0;
06596 
06597       bns = BonusReduceMore( Item[pObj->usItem].percentburstfireapreduction, pObj->bStatus[0] );
06598       bns += Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem].percentburstfireapreduction;
06599 
06600       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
06601       {
06602             bns += BonusReduceMore( Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].percentburstfireapreduction, pObj->bAttachStatus[bLoop] );
06603       }
06604       return( bns );
06605 }
06606 
06607 
06608 INT16 GetVisionRangeBonus( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
06609 {
06610       INT16 bns=0;
06611 
06612       for (int i = HELMETPOS; i < BIGPOCK1POS; i++)
06613       {
06614             // Snap (TODO): binoculars and such should not be active by default
06615             if ( (i == HANDPOS || i == SECONDHANDPOS) && (Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].usItemClass & IC_ARMOUR || Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].usItemClass & IC_FACE ))
06616             {
06617                   continue;
06618             }
06619 
06620             if (!IsWeapon(pSoldier->inv[i].usItem) || (IsWeapon(pSoldier->inv[i].usItem) && WeaponReady(pSoldier) ) )
06621             {
06622                   bns += BonusReduceMore( Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].visionrangebonus, pSoldier->inv[i].bStatus[0] );
06623             }
06624       }
06625 
06626       // Snap: check only attachments on a raised weapon!
06627       if ( WeaponReady(pSoldier) )
06628       {
06629             for (int i=0; i < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++)
06630             {
06631                   bns += BonusReduceMore( Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usAttachItem[i]].visionrangebonus, pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].bAttachStatus[i] );
06632             }
06633       }
06634 
06635       return( bns );
06636 }
06637 
06638 // Snap: Scale night vision bonus with light level
06639 INT16 NightBonusScale( INT16 bonus, UINT8 bLightLevel )
06640 {
06641       if ( bLightLevel > NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_NIGHT ) {
06642             return idiv( bonus * ( SHADE_MIN - bLightLevel ),
06643                   SHADE_MIN - NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_NIGHT );
06644       }
06645       else if ( bLightLevel > NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY ) {
06646             return idiv( bonus * (bLightLevel - NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY),
06647                   NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_NIGHT - NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY );
06648       }
06649       else return 0;
06650 }           
06651 
06652 INT16 GetNightVisionRangeBonus( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT8 bLightLevel )
06653 {
06654       INT16 bns=0;
06655 
06656       for (int i = HELMETPOS; i < BIGPOCK1POS; i++)
06657       {
06658             // Snap (TODO): binoculars and such should not be active by default
06659             if ( (i == HANDPOS || i == SECONDHANDPOS) && (Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].usItemClass & IC_ARMOUR || Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].usItemClass & IC_FACE ))
06660             {
06661                   continue;
06662             }
06663 
06664             if (!IsWeapon(pSoldier->inv[i].usItem) || (IsWeapon(pSoldier->inv[i].usItem) && WeaponReady(pSoldier) ) )
06665             {
06666                   bns += BonusReduceMore(
06667                         NightBonusScale( Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].nightvisionrangebonus, bLightLevel ),
06668                         pSoldier->inv[i].bStatus[0] );
06669             }
06670       }
06671 
06672       // Snap: check only attachments on a raised weapon!
06673       if ( WeaponReady(pSoldier) )
06674       {
06675             for (int i=0; i < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++)
06676             {
06677                   bns += BonusReduceMore(
06678                         NightBonusScale( Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usAttachItem[i]].nightvisionrangebonus, bLightLevel ),
06679                         pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].bAttachStatus[i] );
06680             }
06681       }
06682 
06683       return( bns );
06684 }
06685 
06686 INT16 GetCaveVisionRangeBonus( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT8 bLightLevel )
06687 {
06688       INT16 bns=0;
06689 
06690       for (int i = 0; i < BIGPOCK1POS; i++)
06691       {
06692             // Snap (TODO): binoculars and such should not be active by default
06693             if ( (i == HANDPOS || i == SECONDHANDPOS) && 
06694                      (Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].usItemClass & IC_ARMOUR || Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].usItemClass & IC_FACE ))
06695             {
06696                   continue;
06697             }
06698 
06699             if (!IsWeapon(pSoldier->inv[i].usItem) || (IsWeapon(pSoldier->inv[i].usItem) && WeaponReady(pSoldier) ) )
06700             {
06701                   bns += BonusReduceMore(
06702                         NightBonusScale( Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].cavevisionrangebonus, bLightLevel ),
06703                         pSoldier->inv[i].bStatus[0] );
06704             }
06705       }
06706 
06707       // Snap: check only attachments on a raised weapon!
06708       if ( WeaponReady(pSoldier) )
06709       {
06710             for (int i=0; i < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++)
06711             {
06712                   bns += BonusReduceMore(
06713                         NightBonusScale( Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usAttachItem[i]].cavevisionrangebonus, bLightLevel ),
06714                         pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].bAttachStatus[i] );
06715             }
06716       }
06717 
06718       return( bns );
06719 }
06720 
06721 INT16 GetDayVisionRangeBonus( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT8 bLightLevel )
06722 {
06723       INT16 bns=0;
06724 
06725       // Snap: Scale the bonus with the light level
06726 
06727       for (int i = 0; i < BIGPOCK1POS; i++)
06728       {
06729             // Snap (TODO): binoculars and such should not be active by default
06730             if ( (i == HANDPOS || i == SECONDHANDPOS) && 
06731                      (Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].usItemClass & IC_ARMOUR || Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].usItemClass & IC_FACE ))
06732             {
06733                   continue;
06734             }
06735 
06736             if (!IsWeapon(pSoldier->inv[i].usItem) || (IsWeapon(pSoldier->inv[i].usItem) && WeaponReady(pSoldier) ) )
06737             {
06738                   bns += BonusReduceMore( idiv( Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].dayvisionrangebonus
06739                         * (NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_NIGHT - bLightLevel), NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_NIGHT ),
06740                         pSoldier->inv[i].bStatus[0] );
06741             }
06742       }
06743 
06744       // Snap: check only attachments on a raised weapon!
06745       if ( WeaponReady(pSoldier) )
06746       {
06747             for (int i=0; i < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++)
06748             {
06749                   bns += BonusReduceMore( idiv( Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usAttachItem[i]].dayvisionrangebonus
06750                         * (NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_NIGHT - bLightLevel), NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_NIGHT ),
06751                         pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].bAttachStatus[i] );
06752             }
06753       }
06754 
06755       return( bns );
06756 }
06757 
06758 INT16 GetBrightLightVisionRangeBonus( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT8 bLightLevel )
06759 {
06760       INT16 bns=0;
06761 
06762       // Snap: Scale the bonus with the light level
06763 
06764       for (int i = 0; i < BIGPOCK1POS; i++)
06765       {
06766             // Snap (TODO): binoculars and such should not be active by default
06767             if ( (i == HANDPOS || i == SECONDHANDPOS) && 
06768                      (Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].usItemClass & IC_ARMOUR || Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].usItemClass & IC_FACE ))
06769             {
06770                   continue;
06771             }
06772 
06773             if (!IsWeapon(pSoldier->inv[i].usItem) || (IsWeapon(pSoldier->inv[i].usItem) && WeaponReady(pSoldier) ) )
06774             {
06775                   bns += BonusReduceMore( idiv( Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].brightlightvisionrangebonus
06776                         * (NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY - bLightLevel), NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY ),
06777                         pSoldier->inv[i].bStatus[0] );
06778             }
06779       }
06780 
06781       // Snap: check only attachments on a raised weapon!
06782       if ( WeaponReady(pSoldier) )
06783       {
06784             for (int i=0; i < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++)
06785             {
06786                   bns += BonusReduceMore( idiv( Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usAttachItem[i]].brightlightvisionrangebonus
06787                         * (NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY - bLightLevel), NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY ),
06788                         pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].bAttachStatus[i] );
06789             }
06790       }
06791 
06792       return( bns );
06793 }
06794 
06795 INT16 GetTotalVisionRangeBonus( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT8 bLightLevel )
06796 {
06797       INT16 bns = GetVisionRangeBonus(pSoldier);
06798 
06799       if ( bLightLevel > NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY ) 
06800       {
06801             if ( pSoldier->bLevel == 0 ) 
06802             {
06803                   bns += GetNightVisionRangeBonus(pSoldier, bLightLevel);
06804             }
06805             else 
06806             {
06807                   bns += GetCaveVisionRangeBonus(pSoldier, bLightLevel);
06808             }
06809       }
06810 
06811       if ( bLightLevel < NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_NIGHT ) 
06812       {
06813             bns += GetDayVisionRangeBonus(pSoldier, bLightLevel);
06814       }
06815 
06816       if ( bLightLevel < NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY ) 
06817       {
06818             bns += GetBrightLightVisionRangeBonus(pSoldier, bLightLevel);
06819       }
06820 
06821       return bns;
06822 }
06823 
06824 UINT8 GetPercentTunnelVision( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
06825 {
06826       UINT8 bns = 0;
06827 
06828       for (int i = HELMETPOS; i < BIGPOCK1POS; i++)
06829       {
06830             if ( (i == HANDPOS || i == SECONDHANDPOS) && (Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].usItemClass & IC_ARMOUR || Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].usItemClass & IC_FACE ))
06831             {
06832                   continue;
06833             }
06834 
06835             if ( !IsWeapon(pSoldier->inv[i].usItem) )
06836             {
06837                   bns = __max( bns, Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].percenttunnelvision );
