06838             }
06839       }
06840 
06841       // Snap: check only attachments on a raised weapon!
06842       if ( WeaponReady(pSoldier) )
06843       {
06844             if ( IsWeapon(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem) ) //if not a weapon, then it was added already above
06845                   bns += Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].percenttunnelvision;
06846 
06847             for (int i=0; i < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++)
06848             {
06849                   bns += Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usAttachItem[i]].percenttunnelvision;
06850             }
06851       }
06852 
06853       if ( PTR_OURTEAM ) // Madd: adjust tunnel vision by difficulty level
06854             return( bns );
06855       else
06856             return bns / gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel;
06857 }
06858 
06859 
06860 BOOLEAN HasThermalOptics( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
06861 {
06862 
06863       for (int i = 0; i < BIGPOCK1POS; i++)
06864       {
06865             if ( (i == HANDPOS || i == SECONDHANDPOS) && 
06866                      (Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].usItemClass & IC_ARMOUR || Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].usItemClass & IC_FACE ))
06867             {
06868                   continue;
06869             }
06870 
06871             if (!IsWeapon(pSoldier->inv[i].usItem) || (IsWeapon(pSoldier->inv[i].usItem) && WeaponReady(pSoldier) ) )
06872             {
06873                   if (Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].thermaloptics)
06874                         return TRUE;
06875             }
06876       }
06877 
06878       // Snap: check only attachments on a raised weapon!
06879       if ( WeaponReady(pSoldier) )
06880       {
06881             for (int i=0; i < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++)
06882             {
06883                   if ( Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usAttachItem[i]].thermaloptics )
06884                         return TRUE;
06885             }
06886       }
06887 
06888       return( FALSE );
06889 }
06890 
06891 
06892 INT8 FindHearingAid( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
06893 {
06894       for (INT8 i = 0; i < BIGPOCK1POS; i++)
06895       {
06896             if ( (i == HANDPOS || i == SECONDHANDPOS) && 
06897                      (Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].usItemClass & IC_ARMOUR || Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].usItemClass & IC_FACE ))
06898             {
06899                   continue;
06900             }
06901 
06902             if ( Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].hearingrangebonus > 0 )
06903             {
06904                   return( i );
06905             }
06906       }
06907       return( NO_SLOT );
06908 }
06909 
06910 INT16 GetHearingRangeBonus( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
06911 {
06912       INT16 bns = 0;
06913 
06914       for (int i = 0; i < BIGPOCK1POS; i++)
06915       {
06916             if ( (i == HANDPOS || i == SECONDHANDPOS) && 
06917                      (Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].usItemClass & IC_ARMOUR || Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].usItemClass & IC_FACE ))
06918             {
06919                   continue;
06920             }
06921 
06922             bns += BonusReduceMore( Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].hearingrangebonus, pSoldier->inv[i].bStatus[0] );
06923             /*for (UINT8 i=0;i<MAX_ATTACHMENTS;i++)
06924             {
06925                   if ( pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usAttachItem[i] != NONE && Item[pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usAttachItem[i]].hearingrangebonus  > 0 )
06926                         bns = bns + Item[pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usAttachItem[i]].hearingrangebonus  ;
06927             }*/
06928       }
06929       return( bns );
06930 }
06931 
06932 
06933 BOOLEAN IsDuckbill( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
06934 {
06935       INT8  bLoop;
06936 
06937       if (Item[pObj->usItem].duckbill || Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem].duckbill )
06938             return TRUE;
06939 
06940       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
06941       {
06942             if (Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].duckbill  )
06943             {
06944                   return( TRUE );
06945             }
06946       }
06947       return( FALSE );
06948 }
06949 
06950 
06951 UINT16 GetPercentNoiseVolume( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
06952 {
06953       UINT16 mod = 100 - BonusReduce( Item[pObj->usItem].percentnoisereduction, pObj->bStatus[0] );
06954       mod = mod * ( 100 - Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem].percentnoisereduction ) / 100;
06955 
06956       for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++)
06957       {
06958             mod = mod * ( 100 - BonusReduce( Item[pObj->usAttachItem[i]].percentnoisereduction, pObj->bAttachStatus[i] ) ) / 100;
06959       }
06960 
06961       return (mod > 0) ? mod : 0;
06962 }
06963 
06964 
06965 INT8 FindGasMask( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
06966 {
06967       INT8 bLoop;
06968 
06969       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < HANDPOS; bLoop++)
06970       {
06971             if ( Item[pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem].gasmask )
06972             {
06973                   return( bLoop );
06974             }
06975       }
06976       return( NO_SLOT );
06977 }
06978 
06979 
06980 BOOLEAN IsDetonatorAttached( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
06981 {
06982       INT8  bLoop;
06983 
06984       //if (Item[pObj->usItem].detonator)
06985       //    return TRUE;
06986 
06987       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
06988       {
06989             if (Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].detonator  )
06990             {
06991                   return( TRUE );
06992             }
06993       }
06994       return( FALSE );
06995 }
06996 
06997 BOOLEAN IsRemoteDetonatorAttached( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
06998 {
06999       INT8  bLoop;
07000 
07001       //if (Item[pObj->usItem].remotedetonator)
07002       //    return TRUE;
07003 
07004       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
07005       {
07006             if (Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].remotedetonator  )
07007             {
07008                   return( TRUE );
07009             }
07010       }
07011       return( FALSE );
07012 }
07013 
07014 BOOLEAN IsFlashSuppressor( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
07015 {
07016       INT8  bLoop;
07017 
07018       //Madd: tracers automatically negate any muzzle flash suppression due to inherent lighting effects
07019       if (Item[pObj->usItem].usItemClass == IC_GUN && AmmoTypes[pObj->ubGunAmmoType].tracerEffect && pSoldier->bDoBurst )
07020             return FALSE;
07021 
07022       if (Item[pObj->usItem].hidemuzzleflash )
07023             return TRUE;
07024 
07025       if ( Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem].hidemuzzleflash )
07026             return TRUE;
07027 
07028       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
07029       {
07030             if (Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].hidemuzzleflash  )
07031             {
07032                   return( TRUE );
07033             }
07034       }
07035       return( FALSE );
07036 }
07037 
07038 INT16 GetFlashSuppressorStatus( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
07039 {
07040       INT8  bLoop;
07041       INT16 p=100;
07042       if (Item[pObj->usItem].hidemuzzleflash )
07043             p=pObj->bStatus[0];
07044 
07045       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
07046       {
07047             if (Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].hidemuzzleflash  )
07048             {
07049                   p =p+ pObj->bAttachStatus[bLoop];
07050             }
07051       }
07052       p = min(p,100);
07053       return p;
07054 }
07055 
07056 BOOLEAN IsGrenadeLauncherAttached( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
07057 {
07058       INT8  bLoop;
07059 
07060       if (Item[pObj->usItem].grenadelauncher )
07061             return TRUE;
07062 
07063       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
07064       {
07065             if (Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].grenadelauncher )
07066             {
07067                   return TRUE;
07068             }
07069       }
07070       return FALSE;
07071 }
07072 
07073 INT8 FindAttachment_GrenadeLauncher( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
07074 {
07075       INT8  bLoop;
07076 
07077       if (Item[pObj->usItem].grenadelauncher )
07078             return 0;
07079 
07080       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
07081       {
07082             if (Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].grenadelauncher )
07083             {
07084                   return( bLoop );
07085             }
07086       }
07087       return( ITEM_NOT_FOUND );
07088 }
07089 INT8 GetGrenadeLauncherStatus( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
07090 {
07091       INT8  bLoop;
07092 
07093       if (Item[pObj->usItem].grenadelauncher  )
07094             return pObj->bStatus[0];
07095 
07096       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
07097       {
07098             if (Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].grenadelauncher )
07099             {
07100                   return( pObj->bAttachStatus[bLoop] );
07101             }
07102       }
07103       return( ITEM_NOT_FOUND );
07104 }
07105 UINT16 GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
07106 {
07107       UINT16      bLoop;
07108 
07109       if (Item[pObj->usItem].grenadelauncher  )
07110             return pObj->usItem;
07111 
07112       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
07113       {
07114             if (Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].grenadelauncher )
07115             {
07116                   return( (UINT16) Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].uiIndex );
07117             }
07118       }
07119       return( NONE );
07120 }
07121 
07122 
07123 INT8 FindFirstArmourAttachment( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
07124 {
07125       INT8  bLoop;
07126 
07127       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
07128       {
07129             if (Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].usItemClass == IC_ARMOUR && pObj->bAttachStatus[bLoop] > 0 )
07130             {
07131                   return( bLoop );
07132             }
07133       }
07134       return( ITEM_NOT_FOUND );
07135 }
07136 
07137 
07138 INT16 GetAttachedArmourBonus( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
07139 {
07140       INT8  bLoop;
07141       INT16 bns=0;
07142 
07143       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
07144       {
07145             bns += BonusReduce( Armour[Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].ubClassIndex].ubProtection,
07146                   pObj->bAttachStatus[bLoop] );
07147       }
07148       return( bns );
07149 }
07150 
07151 
07152 INT16 GetBulletSpeedBonus( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
07153 {
07154       INT8  bLoop;
07155       INT16 bns=0;
07156 
07157       bns = Item[pObj->usItem].bulletspeedbonus ;
07158       bns = bns + Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem].bulletspeedbonus ;
07159 
07160       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
07161       {
07162             bns = bns +Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].bulletspeedbonus  ;
07163       }
07164       return( bns );
07165 }
07166 
07167 
07168 BOOLEAN EXPLOSIVE_GUN ( UINT16 x)
07169 {
07170        DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("EXPLOSIVE_GUN x = %d",x));
07171 
07172       if ( Item[x].rocketlauncher || Item[x].cannon )
07173             return TRUE;
07174       else
07175             return FALSE;
07176 }
07177 INT8 FindRocketLauncherOrCannon( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
07178 {
07179       INT8 bLoop;
07180 
07181       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_INV_SLOTS; bLoop++)
07182       {
07183             if (Item[pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem].rocketlauncher || Item[pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem].cannon )
07184             {
07185                   return( bLoop );
07186             }
07187       }
07188       return( NO_SLOT );
07189 }

07346 
07347 UINT16 LowestLaunchableCoolness(UINT16 launcherIndex)
07348 {
07349       UINT16 i = 0;
07350       UINT16 lowestCoolness = 999;
07351 
07352       for( i = 0; i < MAXITEMS; i++ )
07353       {
07354             if ( Item[i].usItemClass  == 0 )
07355                   break;
07356 
07357             if( ValidLaunchable( i, launcherIndex ) && ItemIsLegal(i) && Item[i].ubCoolness <= lowestCoolness )
07358             {     
07359                   lowestCoolness = Item[i].ubCoolness;
07360             }
07361       }
07362       return lowestCoolness;
07363 }
07364 
07365 UINT16 PickARandomLaunchable(UINT16 itemIndex)
07366 {
07367       INT32 iLoop = 0;
07368       UINT16 usNumMatches = 0;
07369       UINT16 usRandom = 0;
07370       UINT16 i = 0;
07371       UINT16 lowestCoolness = LowestLaunchableCoolness(itemIndex);
07372       //DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("PickARandomLaunchable: itemIndex = %d", itemIndex));
07373 
07374       while( !usNumMatches )
07375       { //Count the number of valid launchables
07376             for( i = 0; i < MAXITEMS; i++ )
07377             {
07378                   if ( Item[i].usItemClass  == 0 )
07379                         break;
07380                   //Madd: quickfix: make it not choose best grenades right away. 
07381                   if( ValidLaunchable( i, itemIndex ) && ItemIsLegal(i) && Item[i].ubCoolness <= max(HighestPlayerProgressPercentage()/10,lowestCoolness) )
07382                         usNumMatches++;
07383             }
07384       }
07385       if( usNumMatches )
07386       {
07387             usRandom = (UINT16)Random( usNumMatches );
07388             for( i = 0; i < MAXITEMS; i++ )
07389             {
07390                   if ( Item[i].usItemClass  == 0 )
07391                         break;
07392 
07393                   if( ValidLaunchable( i, itemIndex ) && ItemIsLegal(i) && Item[i].ubCoolness <= max(HighestPlayerProgressPercentage()/10,lowestCoolness) )
07394                   {     
07395                         if( usRandom )
07396                               usRandom--;
07397                         else
07398                         {
07399                               return i;
07400                         }     
07401                   }
07402             }
07403       }
07404 
07405       return 0;
07406 }
07407 INT16 GetCamoBonus( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
07408 {
07409       INT8  bLoop;
07410       INT16 bns=0;
07411 
07412       bns = (INT16) (Item[pObj->usItem].camobonus);// * (WEAPON_STATUS_MOD(pObj->bStatus[0]) / 100)) ;
07413 
07414       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
07415       {
07416             if (!Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].camouflagekit)
07417                   bns += (INT16) (Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].camobonus);// * (WEAPON_STATUS_MOD(pObj->bAttachStatus[bLoop]) / 100));
07418       }
07419       return( bns );
07420 }
07421 INT16 GetUrbanCamoBonus( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
07422 {
07423       INT8  bLoop;
07424       INT16 bns=0;
07425 
07426       bns = (INT16) (Item[pObj->usItem].urbanCamobonus);// * (WEAPON_STATUS_MOD(pObj->bStatus[0]) / 100)) ;
07427 
07428       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
07429       {
07430             if (!Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].camouflagekit)
07431                   bns += (INT16) (Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].urbanCamobonus);// * (WEAPON_STATUS_MOD(pObj->bAttachStatus[bLoop]) / 100));
07432       }
07433       return( bns );
07434 }
07435 INT16 GetDesertCamoBonus( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
07436 {
07437       INT8  bLoop;
07438       INT16 bns=0;
07439 
07440       bns = (INT16) (Item[pObj->usItem].desertCamobonus);// * (WEAPON_STATUS_MOD(pObj->bStatus[0]) / 100)) ;
07441 
07442       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
07443       {
07444             if (!Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].camouflagekit)
07445                   bns += (INT16) (Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].desertCamobonus);// * (WEAPON_STATUS_MOD(pObj->bAttachStatus[bLoop]) / 100));
07446       }
07447       return( bns );
07448 }
07449 INT16 GetSnowCamoBonus( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
07450 {

07453 
07454       bns = (INT16) (Item[pObj->usItem].snowCamobonus);// * (WEAPON_STATUS_MOD(pObj->bStatus[0]) / 100)) ;
07455 
07456       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
07457       {
07458             if (!Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].camouflagekit)
07459                   bns += (INT16) (Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].snowCamobonus);// * (WEAPON_STATUS_MOD(pObj->bAttachStatus[bLoop]) / 100));
07460       }
07461       return( bns );
07462 }
07463 INT16 GetWornCamo( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
07464 {
07465       INT8  bLoop;
07466       INT16 ttl=0;
07467 
07468       for (bLoop = HELMETPOS; bLoop <= LEGPOS; bLoop++)
07469       {
07470             if ( pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem > NONE )
07471                   ttl += GetCamoBonus(&pSoldier->inv[bLoop]);
07472       }
07473 
07474       return __min( ttl, 100 );
07475 }
07476 INT16 GetWornUrbanCamo( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
07477 {
07478       INT8  bLoop;
07479       INT16 ttl=0;
07480 
07481       for (bLoop = HELMETPOS; bLoop <= LEGPOS; bLoop++)
07482       {
07483             if ( pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem > NONE )
07484                   ttl += GetUrbanCamoBonus(&pSoldier->inv[bLoop]);
07485       }
07486 
07487       return __min( ttl, 100 );
07488 }
07489 INT16 GetWornDesertCamo( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
07490 {
07491       INT8  bLoop;
07492       INT16 ttl=0;
07493 
07494       for (bLoop = HELMETPOS; bLoop <= LEGPOS; bLoop++)
07495       {
07496             if ( pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem > NONE )
07497                   ttl += GetDesertCamoBonus(&pSoldier->inv[bLoop]);
07498       }
07499 
07500       return __min( ttl, 100 );
07501 }
07502 INT16 GetWornSnowCamo( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
07503 {
07504       INT8  bLoop;
07505       INT16 ttl=0;
07506 
07507       for (bLoop = HELMETPOS; bLoop <= LEGPOS; bLoop++)
07508       {
07509             if ( pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem > NONE )
07510                   ttl += GetSnowCamoBonus(&pSoldier->inv[bLoop]);
07511       }
07512 
07513       return __min( ttl, 100 );
07514 }
07515 
07516 void ApplyEquipmentBonuses(SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier)
07517 {
07518       if ( pSoldier == NULL) return;
07519 
07520       INT16 newCamo = GetWornCamo ( pSoldier );
07521       INT16 oldCamo = pSoldier->wornCamo;
07522       if ( oldCamo != newCamo )
07523             pSoldier->wornCamo = (INT8)newCamo;
07524 
07525       INT16 newUrbanCamo = GetWornUrbanCamo ( pSoldier );
07526       INT16 oldUrbanCamo = pSoldier->wornUrbanCamo;
07527       if ( oldUrbanCamo != newUrbanCamo )
07528             pSoldier->wornUrbanCamo = (INT8)newUrbanCamo;
07529 
07530       INT16 newDesertCamo = GetWornDesertCamo ( pSoldier );
07531       INT16 oldDesertCamo = pSoldier->wornDesertCamo;
07532       if ( oldDesertCamo != newDesertCamo )
07533             pSoldier->wornDesertCamo = (INT8)newDesertCamo;
07534 
07535       INT16 newSnowCamo = GetWornSnowCamo ( pSoldier );
07536       INT16 oldSnowCamo = pSoldier->wornSnowCamo;
07537       if ( oldSnowCamo != newSnowCamo )
07538             pSoldier->wornSnowCamo = (INT8)newSnowCamo;
07539 
07540       if ( (newCamo > oldCamo || newUrbanCamo > oldUrbanCamo || newDesertCamo > oldDesertCamo || newSnowCamo > oldSnowCamo )&& pSoldier->bTeam == OUR_TEAM )
07541             DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_COOL1 );
07542 
07543       //Madd: do this regardless of camo.  This will need to be called to do custom part colours and new overlays anyway.
07544       if ( pSoldier->bInSector)
07545             CreateSoldierPalettes( pSoldier );
07546 
07547       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
07548 }
07549 
07550 UINT16 GetFirstExplosiveOfType(UINT16 expType)
07551 {
07552       for (int i=0;i<MAXITEMS;i++)
07553       {
07554             if ( (Item[i].usItemClass == IC_EXPLOSV || Item[i].usItemClass == IC_GRENADE) && Explosive[Item[i].ubClassIndex].ubType == expType )
07555                   return i;
07556       }
07557 
07558       return 0;
07559 }
07560 
07561 INT8 FindSunGoggles( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT16 bonusToBeat )
07562 {
07563       INT8  bLoop;
07564 
07565       for (bLoop = HANDPOS; bLoop <= SMALLPOCK8POS; bLoop++)
07566       {
07567             if (Item[pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem].brightlightvisionrangebonus > bonusToBeat && Item[pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem].usItemClass == IC_FACE )               
07568             {
07569                   return( bLoop );
07570             }
07571       }
07572       return( ITEM_NOT_FOUND );
07573 }
07574 
07575 INT8 FindNightGoggles( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT16 bonusToBeat  )
07576 {
07577       INT8  bLoop;
07578 
07579       for (bLoop = HANDPOS; bLoop <= SMALLPOCK8POS; bLoop++)
07580       {
07581             if (Item[pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem].nightvisionrangebonus > bonusToBeat && Item[pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem].usItemClass == IC_FACE )               
07582             {
07583                   return( bLoop );
07584             }
07585       }
07586       return( ITEM_NOT_FOUND );
07587 }
07588 
07589 INT16 GetMinRangeForAimBonus( OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
07590 {
07591       INT16 bns;
07592 
07593       bns = Item[pObj->usItem].minrangeforaimbonus;
07594       //bns += Item[pObj->usGunAmmoItem].minrangeforaimbonus;
07595 
07596       for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++)
07597       {
07598             bns += Item[pObj->usAttachItem[i]].minrangeforaimbonus;
07599       }
07600 
07601       return( bns );
07602 }
07603 
07604 UINT8 AllowedAimingLevels(SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier)
07605 {
07606       UINT8 aimLevels = 4;
07607       float iScopeBonus = 0;
07608       OBJECTTYPE obj = pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand]; 
07609       BOOLEAN allowed = TRUE;
07610       
07611       if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[TOPTION_AIM_LEVEL_RESTRICTION] && Weapon[obj.usItem].ubWeaponType != GUN_RIFLE && Weapon[obj.usItem].ubWeaponType != GUN_SN_RIFLE )
07612                   allowed = FALSE;
07613 
07614       if ( allowed && IsScoped( &obj ) )
07615       {
07616             iScopeBonus = ( (float)gGameExternalOptions.ubStraightSightRange * GetMinRangeForAimBonus(&obj) / 100 );
07617 
07618             if ( iScopeBonus >= ( (float)gGameExternalOptions.ubStraightSightRange * 0.3) ) // >= 30% of sight range (~4 tiles by default)
07619             {
07620                   aimLevels += 2;
07621             }
07622 
07623             if ( iScopeBonus >= ( (float)gGameExternalOptions.ubStraightSightRange * 0.6) ) // >= 60% of sight range (~9 tiles by default)
07624             {                 
07625                   aimLevels += 2;
07626             }
07627       }
07628 
07629       return aimLevels;
07630 }
07631 //Madd: added
07632 INT16 GetStealthBonus( OBJECTTYPE * pObj ) 
07633 {
07634       INT8  bLoop;
07635       INT16 bns=0;
07636 
07637       bns = (INT16) BonusReduce(Item[pObj->usItem].stealthbonus,pObj->bStatus[0]);
07638 
07639       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
07640       {
07641             bns += (INT16) BonusReduce(Item[pObj->usAttachItem[bLoop]].stealthbonus,pObj->bAttachStatus[bLoop]);
07642       }
07643       return( bns );
07644 }
07645 INT16 GetWornStealth( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
07646 {
07647       //note: Stealth bonus is capped at 100
07648       //note: Stealth is not a perk! Stealth bonus only applies to equipment, and stacks with camouflage
07649       //note: stealth bonus is not affected by terrain like the camo bonus, otherwise they're very similar
07650       //note: stealth bonus also affects noise made by characters walking
07651       INT8  bLoop;
07652       INT16 ttl=0;
07653 
07654       for (bLoop = HELMETPOS; bLoop <= LEGPOS; bLoop++)
07655       {
07656             if ( pSoldier->inv[bLoop].usItem > NONE )
07657                   ttl += GetStealthBonus(&pSoldier->inv[bLoop]);
07658       }
07659 
07660       return __min( ttl, 100 );
07661 }
Generated on Sat Sep 9 13:48:25 2006 for Build by  1.4.7
